Mon_DesDetail_115.ContentEN: As the elite ranks of soldiers, wardens have the authority to command regular troops and can relay alarm signals to alert others of incoming intruders.

Mon_DesDetail_6001001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids, with specialised limbs that allow them to easily cling to various surfaces. Their formidable jaws and claws were once considered a significant threat to travellers. While the howl of a wolf might allow room for escape, the hoarse roar of a Filthoid often signals an inevitable demise for the unarmed.

Mon_DesDetail_6002001.ContentEN: A common yet newer breed of Filthoid that emerged following the widespread adoption of firearms among humans. These creatures discharge hyperproliferative tissue from their gun-like arms instead of traditional ammunition. The specifics of their mutation remain elusive, but their adaptation to modern times is evident.

Mon_DesDetail_6003001.ContentEN: Among the most commonly encountered Filthoids, this type exhibits the most grotesque form of Deterioration. It is difficult to conceive the skeletal contortions necessary for a Charon to shrink from a human form to such a diminutive size — a likely factor in their ability to float and the reason they have been derogatorily labelled as \

Mon_DesDetail_6004001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids, known for extreme violence, possibly driven by past injustices suffered before their Deterioration or their robust constitution. Despite their slow, deceptively adorable appearance, they wield a destructive force potent enough to breach state-of-the-art armour.

Mon_DesDetail_6005001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids. These creatures camouflage themselves with hard, petal-like hyperplasia and wield sticky, corrosive secretions. They lie in ambush from a distance, creating a lingering nightmare for their victims that is impossible to shake off or escape from.

Mon_DesDetail_7001001.ContentEN: The standard snipers of the Legion, providing long-range fire support. Female snipers make up the majority of the Legion. They provide distant fire support with remarkable endurance, vigilance, and steadiness. Their tailored camo cloaks serve not only as effective concealment but also as a badge of their extraordinary skill.

Mon_DesDetail_7001005.ContentEN:
The target of this commission. \
They can enter Stealth state, making it difficult for opponents to detect them. When their HP is low, they can summon decoys to confuse opponents.

Mon_DesDetail_7002001.ContentEN: The standard offensive troops of the Legion, easily recognised by the distinctive scarlet etchings on their chest armour and their grim executioner helmets. Skilled in wielding former torture and execution tools, they cleave through enemies, rightfully earning the dreaded title of \

Mon_DesDetail_7002005.ContentEN:
The target of this commission. \
They can use robots to assist them in battle.

Mon_DesDetail_7003001.ContentEN: The standard expeditionary troops of the Legion. Proficient in various combat ranges, their bespoke heavy armour offers both formidable protection and essential support in harsh conditions. These troops are rumoured to appear even in the Empire's most remote wildernesses.

Mon_DesDetail_7003005.ContentEN:
The target of this commission. \
They can leave Landmines behind to disrupt enemies while escaping hunt.

Mon_DesDetail_7004001.ContentEN: The standard assault troops of the Legion, serving as guardians at the vanguard. Excel in close-range reconnaissance. Their hefty shields, a centuries-old standard, remain emblematic of their role.

Mon_DesDetail_7006001.ContentEN: The standard support devices of each legion. They are capable of hovering around the battlefield and healing wounded soldiers. It relies on a modular design, pieced together to achieve what seems like autonomous operational logic. Its widespread use confirms one of the Alchademy's key principles: that even repetitive and tedious processes can create extraordinary miracles.

Mon_DesDetail_7007001.ContentEN: The standard support devices of each legion. They are capable of briefly stalling and restricting enemies. It relies on a modular design, pieced together to achieve what seems like autonomous operational logic. Its widespread use confirms one of the Alchademy's key principles: that even repetitive and tedious processes can create extraordinary miracles.

Mon_DesDetail_7008001.ContentEN: The standard officers of the Legion. They have been selected for these roles because of their extraordinary prowess in combat, research, or command. Their bespoke weaponry, effective at various ranges, signifies their skill and status. While their specialities differ, their allegiance to the empire remains constant.

Mon_DesDetail_8001001.ContentEN: The standard gunners of the Resonance Guild. They prefer to stand before their enemies in neat and orderly formations rather than lurking in the shadows and firing at them. The stand in formation, firing under their leader's commands, sacrificing their own flesh and blood for God as they enact His justice.

Mon_DesDetail_8002001.ContentEN: The standard assault troops of the Resonance Guild. They wield silver straight swords, delivering the wrath of God to their enemies up close. They wear blessed chainmail, which wards off disaster with their strength of their faith. Alchemists once sought out the mystery behind the exceptional defensive capabilities of their chainmail, only to discover that it was made of ordinary iron.

Mon_DesDetail_8003001.ContentEN: The standard priests of the Resonance Guild. They have average combat abilities but strong protective abilities. The verses they continually recite shroud the battlefield when spoken through their special masks, inspiring the faithful of Elysia. It is said that even a mute person can be heard by God when wearing these masks, as long as their faith is devout enough.

Mon_DesDetail_8500001.ContentEN:
The Chief of the Empire's 13th Legion. A formidable force with unknown motives and a relentless determination to reclaim Berenica. \
Wields a whipsword capable of switching between two forms.

Mon_DesDetail_8501001.ContentEN: Endowed with remarkable resilience, this entity has triumphed across countless battlefields, enduring severe wounds. Far from being subdued by the jagged blades and scars it bears, these challenges have only bolstered its strength, transforming it into a more formidable harbinger of doom.

Mon_DesDetail_8502001.ContentEN:
The seed in the frozen soil that has forfeited the opportunity for a gentle descent into the night.\
Capable of terrestrial and aerial combat. When in mid-air, once all butterfly wings are shattered, she falls and enters the state of weakness exposure.

Mon_DesDetail_8503001.ContentEN:
A colossal Filthoid lurking in the depths of Glevum Pit, mechanically repeating the behaviour of tunnelling and devouring any glowing objects.\
Once all of its armour parts are shattered, it collapses and enters the state of weakness exposure.

Mon_DesDetail_8505001.ContentEN: The Warden of the Imperial Royal Military Prison wields her chains to chastise evil and her flames to defend justice.

Mon_DesDetail_9500001.ContentEN: A notorious and elusive master bandit!

Mon_DesDetail_9501001.ContentEN: The suspicious young man ahead is the thief who stole Margie's money bag. Go catch him now!

Mon_DesDetail_9801001.ContentEN: A beast that roams the northern regions of the Empire.

Mon_Description_6001001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids. They excel at rushing towards the target and tearing them to pieces.

Mon_Description_6002001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids. They excel at ranged suppression.

Mon_Description_6003001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids. They excel at assisting in ranged combat.

Mon_Description_6004001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids. They excel at destroying targets with its powerful body.

Mon_Description_6005001.ContentEN: One of the most common Filthoids. They excel at disturbing enemies from a distance.

Mon_Description_7001001.ContentEN: The standard snipers of Hyperborea. They excel at long-distance suppression.

Mon_Description_7002001.ContentEN: The standard offensive troops of Hyperborea. They excel at close-quarters combat.

Mon_Description_7003001.ContentEN: The standard expeditionary troops of Hyperborea. They are adaptable in diverse battlefield scenarios, excelling in extreme conditions.

Mon_Description_7004001.ContentEN: The standard assault troops of Hyperborea. They excel at close-range reconnaissance and defence against enemy attacks.

Mon_Description_7006001.ContentEN: The standard support devices of Hyperborea, excel at healing.

Mon_Description_7007001.ContentEN: The standard support devices of Hyperborea, excel at enemy containment.

Mon_Description_7008001.ContentEN: The standard officers of each legion. They are extremely skilled and excel at issuing comprehensive commands.

Mon_Description_8001001.ContentEN: The standard gunners of the Elysian Church. They excel at long-distance suppression.

Mon_Description_8002001.ContentEN: The standard offensive troops of the Elysian Church. They excel at close-quarters combat.

Mon_Description_8003001.ContentEN: The standard priests of the Elysian Church. They excel at supporting long-range combat.

Mon_Description_8500001.ContentEN: The Chief of the Hyperborean Empire's 13th Legion.

Mon_Description_8505001.ContentEN: Warden of the Royal Military Prison.

Mon_Description_9500001.ContentEN: A notorious and elusive master bandit!

Mon_Description_9501001.ContentEN: The <Highlight>suspicious young man</> ahead is the thief who stole Margie's money bag. Go catch him now!

Mon_Description_9801001.ContentEN: A beast that roams the northern regions of the Empire.

Mon_Guide_115_01.ContentEN: <Highlight>Patrolhawks</> are elite soldiers chosen from the Patrollers. Patrolhawks become vigilant when enemies approach and gradually ease off when threats recede.

Mon_Guide_115_02.ContentEN: When a <Highlight>Patrolhawk</> remains vigilant for too long, they will sound an <Highlight>alarm</> and initiate a hostage execution <Highlight>countdown</>.

Mon_Guide_7001005_01.ContentEN: <Highlight>Sniper Private - Stealth</> periodically enters [Stealth] mode, increasing Movement Speed for 4s.

Mon_Guide_7001005_02.ContentEN:
When <Highlight>Sniper Private - Stealth</> takes damage at below 80% Max HP, it enters [Stealth] mode. [Stealth]: Becomes blurred for #1s, making it difficult for hostile units to identify them; summons several identical decoys to confuse hostile units, but the decoys take increased damage. This effect can only be triggered once every #2s.\
When any of the decoys is defeated, <Highlight>Sniper Private - Stealth</> will be inflicted with [Slackness]. [Slackness]: Decreases Movement Speed for #3s.

Mon_Guide_7002005_01.ContentEN: When appearing in battle, <Highlight>Cleaving Private - Battlewise</> summons a <Highlight>[Healing Drone]</> and periodically summons a <Highlight>[Magnetix Drone]</> to assist in combat.

Mon_Guide_7002005_02.ContentEN:
<Highlight>Healing Drone</>: Continuously links <Highlight>Cleaving Private - Battlewise</>.\
The linked target gains Movement Speed and ATK boosts, and continually recovers HP.

Mon_Guide_7002005_03.ContentEN:
<Highlight>Magnetix Drone</>: Chases down hostile target and self-destructs, and then creates a [Magnetic Storm] centered on itself.\
[Magnetic Storm]: deals damage to and inflicts [Slowness] on hostile targets within range.\
[Slowness]: Reduces Movement Speed for #1 second. Deals damage to and inflicts [Paralysis] on targets within range.\
[Paralysis]: Unable to move or attack for #2s.

Mon_Guide_7003005_01.ContentEN: <Highlight>Expedition Private - Armed Assault</> periodically places a [Landmine] at their current location.

Mon_Guide_7003005_02.ContentEN: [Landmines] activate when hostile units enter their range and detonate after a brief delay, dealing damage and applying [Slackness] to hostile units nearby. [Slackness]: Loses Movement Speed for #1s.

Mon_Guide_7007002_01.ContentEN: Some <Highlight>Magnetix Drones</> will self-destruct upon approaching the vehicle, causing substantial damage to it.

Mon_Guide_7008001_01.ContentEN: Elite Sergeant can use <Highlight>Morale Boost</> to inspire allies around them.

Mon_Guide_7008001_02.ContentEN: When inspired by the allies, applies [High Morale]. [High Morale]: increases Movement Speed and damage dealt, and decreases damage taken.

Mon_Guide_7008001_03.ContentEN: When the Elite Sergeant is <Highlight>defeated</>, allies lose the [High Morale] effect.

Mon_Guide_8501002_01.ContentEN: Notoriously fierce, <Highlight>Battle Mavens</> use their aberrant abilities to relentlessly pursue their targets upon engagement.

Mon_Guide_9500001_01.ContentEN: <Highlight>Lulu Lunoloot</> appears briefly before attempting to flee. Defeat her quickly to secure a bountiful treasure hoard.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Blood_02.ContentEN: <Highlight>Primander - Decay</> periodically generates #1 [Decaying Swamps] around itself.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Blood_03.ContentEN: [Decaying Swamp]: Continuously damages enemies within its radius while simultaneously healing allies caught in the same area.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Burst_02.ContentEN:
<Highlight>Primander - Blast</> periodically triggers an explosion centred on itself, knocking back opponents nearby, dealing damage and applying [Burn].\
[Burn]: Deals damage every #1s for #2s.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Fade_02.ContentEN: <Highlight>Primander - Wither</> periodically summons 3 [Withering Beams]. The [Withering Beams] last for 10s and continually revolve around the Primander, dealing damage to targets on hit and lowering their Sanity.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Frozen_02.ContentEN:
When <Highlight>Primander - Frostbite</> is hit by a ranged weapon, it fires icicles towards the source of the attack, dealing damage to the target on hit and applying 1 stack of [Slowness].\
[Slowness]: Reduces ATK Speed and Movement Speed for #1s, up to #2 stacks.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Poison_02.ContentEN: <Highlight>Primander - Corrosion</> generates a pool of [Poison] under their feet at regular intervals. Opponents standing within the pool of [Poison] will have their DEF reduced and receive periodic damage. In addition, <Highlight>Primander - Corrosion</>'s presence speeds up the decreasing rate of Serum.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Revenge_02.ContentEN: When a <Highlight>Primander - Revenge</> is defeated, its allies nearby will be [Empowered]. [Empowered]: Gains Attack, Defence, Movement Speed, and ATK Speed for #1s.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Shield_02.ContentEN: <Highlight>Primander - Guard</> periodically summons a [Guardian Field] around itself. [Guardian Field] lasts for #1s and blocks all incoming hostile bullets and projectiles.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Thunder_02.ContentEN: <Highlight>Primander - Thunderclap</> periodically casts electric orbs centred around themselves.

Mon_Guide_Strong_Thunder_03.ContentEN: Every #1s, Electric Orbs deal damage to hostile units nearby. The orbs disappear upon being hit.

Name_200217.ContentEN: Fake It Till You Kick It

Name_200218.ContentEN: The Call From the Misty Sea

Name_200220.ContentEN: How the Team Got Its Name

NpcBiography_Information_Aier.ContentEN: Born into nobility, Elsa is a woman of etiquette and discipline. As a mother, she imparted these values to her daughter, Annie, hoping she would grow up to become a better person. However, Elsa never anticipated that her expectations would drive her daughter away. Despite a lingering fear that her runaway daughter might have met with misfortune, Elsa tirelessly continues her search for Annie.

NpcBiography_Information_Aima.ContentEN: Emma is unusually absent-minded today. Though she has never ventured beyond Icelake, she has visited the monument in the plaza at least fifty times. Normally, she would approach these rituals with solemn reverence. But every so often, in fleeting moments, she would yearn to break free from the repetitive ceremonies and wander to the far end of the square to see what new trinkets the old horned lady might be crafting in her quaint tent.

NpcBiography_Information_Alice_1.ContentEN: An amnesiac girl recently rescued by a kind-hearted Phoxhunter and brought to Icelake for recuperation. She's currently striving to remember who she is.

NpcBiography_Information_Alice_2.ContentEN: Alice, a young girl with a passion for adventure, always well-prepared for her expeditions, has recently faced an unexpected turn during one of her journeys – she found herself trapped in a blizzard alongside Annie, a runaway. Realising her life was drawing to a close, Annie gave her warm clothes to Alice, which enabled her escape from the snowy mountains. Alice, who later regained her lost memories after being rescued, remembered Annie's act of kindness and embarked on a new chapter in her life.

NpcBiography_Information_Alice_3.ContentEN: A girl who lost her memory in a blizzard on the mountain. Initially sceptical, she eventually accepted her identity as Annie and now seeks a reunion with her birth mother, Elsa, hopeful for a happy ending.

NpcBiography_Information_Anuo.ContentEN:
Arnold is, in some ways, one of the fortunate ones — growing up safely in an orphanage as a Charon child is a rare stroke of luck. But in other ways, he is deeply unfortunate — when the orphanage became overcrowded, he was cast out, left to fend for himself while still a child.\
\
Charons are known for their resilience, but even their hardy nature can't protect a child from the deathly cold nights of Icelake. Once out on his own, Arnold has spent countless hours strategising on how to survive the bitter cold of the night.\
\
With his few possessions, Arnold managed to scrape together some goods to sell outside the theatre to make ends meet, but business has been slow — the townsfolk of Icelake show little interest in the arts. There is one exception — a pompous nobleman who frequents the theatre. Arnold has a somewhat positive impression of him. This nobleman consistently supports Arnold's small venture and intriguingly, has never bought any fermented drinks. Driven by curiosity, Arnold once asked him about it. The nobleman, through elaborate explanations, shared that he had a severe intolerance to alcohol — even a mere touch on his lips could induce an unintended slumber.\
\
With this loyal patron's support, Arnold managed to scrape by until this brutally cold winter made survival even more challenging. His meagre savings are insufficient to purchase the necessary fuel to keep warm. A daring idea then took root in his desperate mind...\
\
One evening, he followed the nobleman home and slipped through a window left slightly ajar. Inside, the nobleman's residence was modest for his rank — no servants were in sight, and the hearth was barely warm. Yet, compared to the icy streets, it was a sanctuary. \
\
Arnold tiptoed into the kitchen and spiked the kettle with a bit of alcohol, then waited patiently for the nobleman to return from the theatre and take a sip. Once the nobleman fell deeply asleep, Arnold could finally bask in the warmth of the fire...

NpcBiography_Information_Bake.ContentEN:
Mr Buck is a man whose speech and demeanour are as poetic as the verses he adores, with a deep-seated passion for literature and art that pervades every aspect of his life. While it's natural for people to indulge in what brings them joy, but in Mr Bark's case, this passion has become somewhat of an obsession.\
\
As a lordling from a declining noble line, Mr Buck has just enough inheritance to keep himself fed and sheltered. The regulars at the local tavern often jest that without it, Mr Buck's penchant for flowery prose and lack of practical skills would inevitably lead him to a life under a bridge.\
\
It's a fair observation. Even in his beloved realm of creative writing, Mr Buck has struggled to leave a mark. His scripts, submitted with a hopeful heart to the Hegon Theater, have yet to grace the stage — and likely never will. Thus, Mr Buck spends his days lingering forlornly outside the theatre, reciting verses that echo the melancholy of autumn and the slow descent of leaves.\
\
Recently, Mr Buck has been pouring his soul into crafting a new tragedy, one enveloping themes of moonlight, graves, separated lovers, regrets, and the sombre intertwining of love and death. Perhaps overinvested in his work or wearied by the theatre's constant rejection, he has grown increasingly paranoid. He insists that he hears footsteps and detects odd scents in his room, oddities that coincide with mysterious bouts of deep sleep that steal away his creative nights.\
\
Despite these disturbances, Mr Buck hasn't actually lost anything of tangible value — arguably, his enforced regular sleep might even be seen as a positive development, given his otherwise nocturnal toils. Nonetheless, he is agitated, fervently seeking assistance to expose this \

NpcBiography_Information_Beilinda.ContentEN:
Belinda has erected her modest tent in a shabby back alley. There, she offers solace to downtrodden Charons by channelling messages from their departed loved ones, offering guidance for their future paths. It's not uncommon for many Charons to spend whole afternoons in her tent, sharing their woes as Belinda, with her grandmotherly warmth, offers them comfort for next to nothing. This scant income keeps her life simple and frugal.\
\
Belinda is always adorned with an assortment of homemade trinkets. Her nimble fingers transform discarded bits of glass, wire, and fabric into delicate artefacts. If you express interest, she won't hesitate to gift you one — recently, she has crafted and given away a doll to a little girl.\
\
Today, there are no visitors in Belinda's tent. She stays outside, peering around as if expecting someone yet to arrive.

NpcBiography_Information_Blue.ContentEN: Brunetto, an elder born on Purgatorio Island. Harbouring bright hopes for the future, Brunetto defied ancestral teachings to leave his homeland. Yet, fate handed him a raw deal, driving him to eke out a living through trickery.

NpcBiography_Information_Dadun.ContentEN:
Dutton, a sewage worker enveloped in a perpetual stench.\
In his early thirties, many in his birthplace would respectfully refer to him as Doctor Dutton, a source of pride for the local elders. He once attempted to save a pedestrian who fell ill on the street. But tragically, the effort failed, and he was faced with a colossal compensation claim that led to his dismissal from the hospital.\
Life has its cruel jests. Dutton, once a healer of people, found no decent work beyond his medical skills and eventually descended into the sewers. \

NpcBiography_Information_Dien.ContentEN:
Dean, a master in the art of the perfect amount of adulteration — how to lace fermented drinks without sending patrons to casualty was his family's craft. This trick of the trade had him in cahoots with every tavern owner in town, without exception — until he met Camilla.\
\
Money wasn't the issue for Dean, yet The Asphodel was the missing piece in his empire of adulteration, a niggling gap he was hell-bent on closing. After all, not just the tavern owners, but all boozers in Icelake were hooked on his cut-price tipple. Just a bit of discomfort for half the cost – why not?\
\
The vendors are happy, the customers are happy, and Dean's happy — a clear-cut case of a triple win. So why on earth wouldn't Camilla come on board?!\
\
That's a riddle Dean might never fathom.

NpcBiography_Information_Feiyi_1.ContentEN: A young girl who appears to be a student from the inner city. It's easy to notice her fine clothes juxtaposed against perpetually untidy hair. Despite her unmistakably Mortalan appearance, she fervently believes herself to be a Charon with horns.

NpcBiography_Information_Hainuo.ContentEN: Heino, a low-ranking soldier tasked with patrolling and maintaining order in Icelake. Known for his fiery temper, Heino harbours a deep-seated loathing for his own kind. From a young age, his aspiration was to join the army, believing it would secure him a comfortable life in the inner city. However, after more than a decade of dedicated service, he remains at the lower echelons of the military hierarchy. Frustrated by his lack of advancement, Heino attributes his stagnant career to his Charon heritage, which fuels his resentment. Consequently, he yearns to assimilate into Mortalan society, distancing himself from his roots. Utilizing his military status, he seizes every opportunity to assert his authority over other Charons.

NpcBiography_Information_Heerluo.ContentEN: An elusive trader who occasionally surfaces in the sewers. He operates within the clandestine confines of the city's black market. His very existence is a blatant defiance of imperial law, yet in a twisted way, he also completes it. Beneath the empire's shadow, he maintains those dark corners untouched by daylight, preserving a fragile yet precious sense of peace for those who dwell there.

NpcBiography_Information_Jiexi.ContentEN:
A ticket seller who serves the magnates, who recently chased away a vendor inquiring about the fare.\
Jessica dreams of savouring the luxury of a first-class carriage. She always envisions herself donning a gown, gracefully settling into a plush velvet seat, and delicately sipping fine wine handed to her by a steward. Yet, the harsh reality confines her outside the carriage, clutching a sheaf of tickets, forever denied access to that opulent world.

NpcBiography_Information_Kenong.ContentEN: One of the unemployed miners. Amidst an era where all major mines are fully equipped with modern detection gear, he still stubbornly keeps a flock of golden plume birds and treasures them more dearly than life itself. He believes that these birds with the ability to detect harmful gases will be the last lifeline for humanity when technology betrays them.

NpcBiography_Information_Laina.ContentEN:
Lina, a middle-aged woman of unshakable composure, seems untouched by the turmoil of the world.\
\
After fifteen years as a maid in the ducal palace of the capital, Lina was on the cusp of a promotion to head housekeeper. Yet, she chose to walk away at the height of her career and start anew in Icelake.\
\
Now, Ms Lina makes her living as a freelance housekeeper, providing top-notch, impartial service to anyone in need. She provides extensive services — from daily household chores and meal preparation to organising large banquets, caring for the disabled and elderly, and even managing sensitive tasks like body preparation, property rentals, pre-arranging gravesites, workers' compensation filings, and cremation arrangements. Despite frequent solicitations from local nobles who crave the opulent services she once rendered in the capital, Lina consistently declines, choosing instead to focus her efforts on aiding those most in need and discreetly supporting the Charon community.\
\
What few know is that her decision to leave the ducal household was triggered by an encounter with Henrik.\
\
Back then, Henrik was an itinerant doctor and was invited to consult at the ducal palace. One day, as Lina escorted Henrik back to his lodgings, a Charon collapsed in front of them — a common enough sight in the harsh winter that Lina had grown numb to such tragedies. Unlike her, Henrik immediately rushed to help, asking Lina to fetch some hot water for the stranger.\
\
As she assisted Henrik in caring for the pale, ailing girl, Lina felt a long-dormant compassion stir within her. She realised that, while her role was meant to be about caring for others, it often reduced her to merely cleaning up after the noble's messes, and her seemingly superior status and living conditions didn't seem to be worth it anymore. Working alongside someone with a heart of gold like Henrik, she felt deeply ashamed.\
\
Throughout Henrik's stay, Lina assisted him with his patients as much as she could, yearning to break free from the guilt that weighed on her, yet struggling to fully commit to change. Henrik, perceiving her inner conflict, did not probe further; instead, he left her with an address in Icelake as he departed, suggesting that should she seek a place of refuge and purpose, she would find it there.\
\
That place is now known to all as the Hypnos' House.

NpcBiography_Information_Lali.ContentEN:
Once a model worker in Glevum Pit, Larry's life unravelled when the Phoxene veins ran dry, leaving him jobless.\
Struggling to survive, he tried his hand at various ventures like other unemployed miners in Icelake, from small businesses to aquaculture and farming, only to end up bankrupt. Driven to despair, he and his miner buddies picked up their pickaxes one last time, spending their final coins on a few loaves of coarse rye bread before vanishing into the depths of the now-abandoned pit.\
A few weeks ago, Larry reemerged alone in Icelake, lugging a heavy sack of Phoxene. His friends, however, remained forever lost in the dark recesses of the pit.

NpcBiography_Information_Liao.ContentEN: Lio, a cleaner by the city gates, tasked with the grim cleanup after any skirmishes within the city. Initially, the sight of bloodshed tormented him, but over time he's grown numb to the violence. The toughest part, he finds, is scrubbing away the stubborn bloodstains. He quietly wishes for a swift, lethal blow to end the fights, as it would minimise the workload. After all, even a faint trace of uncleaned bloodstains would lead to him shedding some blood afterwards.

NpcBiography_Information_Luna.ContentEN: Luna, an apprentice healer who has lost the power of speech. Once a minstrel in Icelake, Luna was known for her bold belief in equality between Mortalans and Charons, insisting that both should coexist as equals. Her poignant lyrics one day ignited the fury of some bigots, who later brutally attacked her, slashing her throat and banishing her from the inner city. Despite the traumatic loss of her voice, Luna remains unrepentant about the views she expressed. A kind-hearted doctor living on the outskirts of Icelake took her in, and she has since devoted herself to learning the healing arts, determined to help the downtrodden in the slums and put her beliefs into action.

NpcBiography_Information_Mading.ContentEN:
He doesn't look like your typical slum dweller.\
\
Martin, sporting a slicked-back hairdo, donning a leather coat, and wafting a subtle scent of cologne, is busy showing off his \

NpcBiography_Information_Makusi.ContentEN: A chef from the inner city of Icelake, average in talent but extraordinarily diligent. Frustrated by his lack of progress in the kitchen, he left his restaurant job and embarked on a relentless quest to refine his recipes, determined to create dishes that would delight everyone.

NpcBiography_Information_Sangni.ContentEN:
Sunny, a 25-year-old governess to aristocratic children, hails from a once-prominent but now waning noble lineage. Unlike her peers, she harbours a true affection for the children and her vocation, championing the boundless creativity and imagination that she sees as a child's most treasured attribute. Yet, her unconventional methods have stirred discontent among the parents, who favour a curriculum steeped in Imperial Law and military preparations over what they deem as frivolous, aimless creations. Their firm disapproval has led to her imminent dismissal.\
Today, she conducts her final lesson.

NpcBiography_Information_Sanxiongdi.ContentEN: Hailing from Scarletriver, a trio of brothers so close they might as well be one. Whether they lack names or simply can't recall their own, they address each other as Bigger Bro, Big Bro, and Small Bro. Charmed by Outsider's eloquence, they've readily embraced both you and Outsider as their \

NpcBiography_Information_Shali.ContentEN:
The elderly maid traveling with Lady Hilin in Icelake.\
Despite initial reservations about this pursuit, she remains unwavering in her forty years of devotion, unable to deny any of her ladyship's requests.

NpcBiography_Information_Weier.ContentEN: Once a son-in-law to a clockmaker, Wells's timepieces used to be the toast of Icelake. However, over a decade ago, a cruel twist of fate stripped him of his status, family, and livelihood. He was cast out like an unwanted mongrel, sinking into a life of despondency, trying to find his only solace at the bottom of a bottle.

NpcBiography_Information_Xilin_1.ContentEN: A widowed noblewoman from Flagson Province. She has journeyed to Icelake in pursuit of a Charon man named Hamel Dickinson, her erstwhile love of forty years ago.

NpcBiography_Information_Xilin_2.ContentEN:
A widowed noblewoman from Flagson Province, whose days numbered.\
Her final wish is to see her teenage love one last time, though it's an unattainable dream.

NpcBiography_ProbeFailedTip1.ContentEN: You don't really know this person yet. Try chatting more first!

PET_401_PASSIVE.ContentEN: Umbro ATK +#1. Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx's], [Siren's], [Griffin's], [Typhon's], [Covenanter's], and [Arbiter's] by #2.

PET_401_SKILL.ContentEN:
Deals Umbro Damage equivalent to #1 of the main character's ATK to nearby enemies.\
Increases Morale by #2 for nearby teammate(s), enabling them to deal #3 of additional Umbro Damage for #4s.

PET_402_PASSIVE.ContentEN: Hydro ATK +#1. Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx's], [Siren's], [Griffin's], [Typhon's], [Covenanter's], and [Bahamut's] by #2.

PET_402_SKILL.ContentEN: For each [Summon] existing on the battlefield, increases damage dealt by nearby teammate(s) by #1 for #3s, up to a maximum of #2.

PET_403_PASSIVE.ContentEN: Pyro ATK +#1. Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx's], [Siren's], [Griffin's], [Typhon's], [Covenanter's], and [Ifrit's] by #2.

PET_403_SKILL.ContentEN: Restores #1 points of Sanity for nearby teammate(s).

PET_404_PASSIVE.ContentEN: Electro ATK +#1. Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx's], [Siren's], [Griffin's], [Typhon's], [Covenanter's], and [Summanus's] by #2.

PET_404_SKILL.ContentEN:
Grants nearby teammate(s) an Ultra Shield equivalent to #1 of their Max Shield.\
Regenerates an Ultra Shield equivalent to #2 of their Max Shield upon the next 3 shield breaks.

PET_405_PASSIVE.ContentEN: Anemo ATK +#1. Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx's], [Siren's], [Griffin's], [Typhon's], [Covenanter's], and [Hastur's] by #2.

PET_405_SKILL.ContentEN: Increases DEF by #1 and Berserker by #2 for nearby teammate(s) for #3s.

PET_406_PASSIVE.ContentEN: Lumino ATK +#1. Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx's], [Siren's], [Griffin's], [Typhon's], [Covenanter's], and [Helios's] by #2.

PET_406_SKILL.ContentEN: Deals Lumino Damage equivalent to #1 of the main character's ATK to nearby enemies, and inflicts a debuff that decreases ATK by #2, DEF by #3, and Movement Speed by #4 on the enemies for #5s.

PET_491_SKILL.ContentEN: Heals nearby allies by #1 of the main character's Max HP.

PET_492_SKILL.ContentEN: Deals damage equal to #1 of the main character's ATK to nearby enemies.

PROLOGUE_SELECTGUN_DESC_20298.ContentEN: Has an <Highlight>extremely rapid fire rate</>, capable of quickly neutralising enemies from a <Highlight>long distance</>.

PROLOGUE_SELECTGUN_DESC_20498.ContentEN: Has a <Highlight>slower fire rate</>, capable of <Highlight>firing multiple bullets at the same time</> to inflict substantial damage on <Highlight>nearby</> enemies.

Pack_Des_Draft_Melee.ContentEN: Gives 1 blueprint for a random melee weapon

Pack_Des_Draft_Mod_04.ContentEN: Gives 1 blueprint for a random Purple-tier Demon Wedge

Pack_Des_Draft_Range.ContentEN: Gives 1 blueprint for a random ranged weapon

Pack_Des_Mod_06.ContentEN: Gives 1 Golden-tier Character Demon Wedge Blueprint

Pack_Des_Mod_07.ContentEN: Gives 1 Golden-tier Melee Weapon Demon Wedge Blueprint

Pack_Des_Mod_08.ContentEN: Gives 1 Golden-tier Ranged Weapon Demon Wedge Blueprint

Pack_Des_Mod_10.ContentEN: Gives 1 Blue-tier Melee Weapon Demon Wedge

Pack_Des_Mod_11.ContentEN: Gives 1 Blue-tier Ranged Weapon Demon Wedge

Pack_Des_Resource_Fuma.ContentEN: Gives 1 blueprint for a random Track-Shift Module

Pack_Des_Shop_Exp_01.ContentEN: A regular supply package that contains some combat necessities

Pack_Des_Shop_Exp_02.ContentEN: A regular supply package that contains a large number of combat necessities

Pack_Des_Shop_Mod.ContentEN: A regular supply package that contains a large number of Carmine Globules

Pack_Name_Mod_Blue_Melee.ContentEN: Unknown Blue-tier Melee Weapon Demon Wedge

Pack_Name_Mod_Blue_Range.ContentEN: Unknown Blue-tier Ranged Weapon Demon Wedge

Pack_Name_Mod_Draft_Melee.ContentEN: Unknown Melee Weapon Demon Wedge Blueprint

Pack_Name_Mod_Draft_Range.ContentEN: Unknown Ranged Weapon Demon Wedge Blueprint

PartyReward_Description_110101.ContentEN: Beneath its bitter, inedible peel lie the sweet and sour grains of memory.

PartyReward_Description_110102.ContentEN: A broken feather, tinged with the salty tang of the sea and a faint trace of blood — evidence of a young girl's naivety and courage.

PartyReward_Description_110103.ContentEN: Even from within a cage, there are still those who gaze upon the horizon.

PartyReward_Description_110104.ContentEN: The fleeting moments of happiness are forever gone. But thankfully, there is always tomorrow.

PartyReward_Description_180101.ContentEN: A pile of spent casings, which, with a touch of imagination, transform into pistols, cannons, airships, and mighty robots — keys to unlocking a world of dreams.

PartyReward_Description_180102.ContentEN: Fairy tales don't always end in happiness. After the bird turned into a burning star, does she still weep in the night sky?

PartyReward_Description_180103.ContentEN: Though the cold rains of the past have yet to cease, she still feels warmth from another's palm.

PartyReward_Description_180104.ContentEN: How far must she journey before she pens a beautiful ending to this tale?

PartyReward_Description_210101.ContentEN: Drink it down. Swallow the bitterness in the glass, and embrace the sweetness of love.

PartyReward_Description_210102.ContentEN: The jellyfish twirls in the glass under the light, sinking silently into the depths, failing to find a companion before it dissipates upon reaching the sea floor.

PartyReward_Description_210103.ContentEN: Relationships often mirror this drink: starting with warmth, followed by bitterness, and ending with a chill. Like water and fire, some things were never meant to blend.

PartyReward_Description_210104.ContentEN: This drink is simple in appearance and straightforward in flavour, for true love requires no embellishments — it exists in the gaze of the beloved.

PartyReward_Description_230101.ContentEN: Down it goes! The tart sweetness pops on your tongue like children's laughter, crackling and bursting on the porch.

PartyReward_Description_230102.ContentEN: Sweet and salty aren't opposites, just as innocence and mischief can coexist.

PartyReward_Description_230103.ContentEN: The initial sourness knits your brow, but as your taste buds adjust, a smooth sweetness blooms — much like understanding the world: hope always follows the storm.

PartyReward_Description_310101.ContentEN: A fiery, bold drink for those who crave a stronger kick. The first sip sparks your appetite, the second ignites your mood — a perfect icebreaker.

PartyReward_Description_310102.ContentEN: What's shared over drinks stays at the bar — an unspoken rule of any good drinking session.

PartyReward_Description_310103.ContentEN: Icelake may be small — a tiny speck on the Empire's map; yet Icelake is vast — memories of it linger no matter how far one travels.

PartyReward_Description_310201.ContentEN: Beneath petals lie thorns, and beneath the hem of a maid's dress? Bullets.

PartyReward_Description_310202.ContentEN: Disguises aren't magic but an art form — capable of transforming not just your appearance, but also your state of mind.

PartyReward_Description_310203.ContentEN: Be grateful the scissors in the maid's hand target only withered flowers.

PartyReward_Description_310204.ContentEN: A cup of flower tea, a maid's solemn vow.

PartyReward_Description_310301.ContentEN: The names may differ, but every toy on this list promises a spectacular explosion.

PartyReward_Description_310302.ContentEN: A potent energy drink that sweeps away the fatigue of weary travellers. With a clear mind, the heart finally knows what it truly wants.

PartyReward_Description_310303.ContentEN: A drink with a powerful calming effect, perfect for soothing the nerves of those left waiting. Only after patient waiting does the heart know what it truly wants.

PartyReward_Description_310304.ContentEN: Filled with exploding tops, fireworks, and shattered stars, this giant toy chest at Snap 'n' Spark marks a fresh start.

PartyReward_Description_330101.ContentEN: After a long day's work scavenging Kossak's mansion, you and Margie have gathered a trove of treasures. Hopefully, they're worth the sore arms.

PartyReward_Description_330102.ContentEN: A composition written for the Charon community, long-forgotten in the dark. It wasn't until Margie spread its melody through Icelake that it found its true purpose again.

PartyReward_Description_330103.ContentEN: A thoughtful birthday gift from a doting father. This multifunctional helmet comes with its own little surprise.

PartyReward_Description_330104.ContentEN: This grey furball, speckled with black spots, recalls the sight of a proud cat with a lush tail strutting across the snowfields.

PartyReward_Description_420201.ContentEN: Forget the grind and shake off your weariness — start your well-deserved break with a chilled, sweet indulgence!

PartyReward_Description_420202.ContentEN: A high-end drink aged for 20 years, \

PartyReward_Description_420203.ContentEN: The pistol serves as both a symbol of responsibility, weighing heavily on a father's shoulders, and a badge of honour passed down through generations.

PartyReward_Description_420204.ContentEN: Sometimes, the best ideas strike while showering, sleeping, or sipping tea. The actions taken in pursuit of such inspiration might appear a little... eccentric to the outside world.

PartyReward_Description_430101.ContentEN: The 13th Legion stands as a symbol of authority, the vessel for the emperor's will and violence.

PartyReward_Description_430102.ContentEN: Habit is a powerful thing. It makes us accept the abnormal and drift even further from the norm.

PartyReward_Description_430103.ContentEN: Beneath the glory of this medal lies a path strewn with thorns.

PartyReward_Description_510101.ContentEN: This classic beverage was born from a mishap, yet became a staple across Atlasia for its versatile charm. After generations of refinement, it has transcended its original purpose of quenching thirst and staving off hunger, becoming a symbol of our pursuit of culinary delight.

PartyReward_Description_510102.ContentEN: Ripened by time and cloaked in snowy white, Twisty Pods quietly await harvest, offering nature's bounty.

PartyReward_Description_510103.ContentEN: Freshly squeezed Borealberry juice, with the tartness filtered away, leaving only rich sweetness. The real magic in making it even tastier is sharing it with your best friend!

PartyReward_Description_510104.ContentEN: One filbert per question — that's the deal you made with the girl. So when in doubt, why not ask the Magic Filbert?

PartyReward_Description_530101.ContentEN: Children huddle together, dreaming of futures just beyond their reach.

PartyReward_Description_530103.ContentEN: The coin has been tossed. No one can predict the outcome — heads or tails, death or rebirth.

PartyReward_Name_210103.ContentEN: Drink: A Song of Ice and Fire

PartyReward_Name_230104.ContentEN: Drink: Demon Tabethe the Red Hand

PartyTopic_Description_110101.ContentEN: She poured strange ingredients into the pot, mixing in the purest love and care.

PartyTopic_Description_110102.ContentEN: You are the reason I must be strong.

PartyTopic_Description_110103.ContentEN: This shore is my whole world, a cage forged just for me.

PartyTopic_Description_110104.ContentEN: All has ended, and all begins anew.

PartyTopic_Description_180101.ContentEN: She whispered her magical wishes to her friends.

PartyTopic_Description_180102.ContentEN: She sent her long-lost dreams skyward upon the stars.

PartyTopic_Description_180103.ContentEN: She buried her memories in distant lands.

PartyTopic_Description_180104.ContentEN: She entrusts her hopes for tomorrow to the blank pages.

PartyTopic_Description_210101.ContentEN: Thump, thump, thump — did you hear that? It's the sound of love flowing through.

PartyTopic_Description_210102.ContentEN: Love is meant to be tested. Rather than sweet nothings, a drop of poison feels like a far more honest trial. Whether forever apart or happily ever after — why not find out now?

PartyTopic_Description_210103.ContentEN: Even monsters have vulnerabilities. They aren't heartless demons — just lonely misfits lost among the crowd.

PartyTopic_Description_210104.ContentEN: Love is a blade that cuts through all barriers, whether across mountains, seas, or a single drop of lethal poison.

PartyTopic_Description_230101.ContentEN: Camouflage offers protection; mimicry punishes the wicked.

PartyTopic_Description_230102.ContentEN: Others may define good and bad, but it's up to you to decide right from wrong.

PartyTopic_Description_230103.ContentEN: Once you open your eyes, a broader world unfolds.

PartyTopic_Description_230104.ContentEN: Even in chaos, there is warmth to be found.

PartyTopic_Description_310101.ContentEN: Life is simple — eat to live, not the other way around. Keep that straight, and you'll be fine.

PartyTopic_Description_310102.ContentEN: There's something almost magical about high voltage — it dares you to flirt with danger and uncover its risky secrets.

PartyTopic_Description_310103.ContentEN: More sorrowful than losing one's home is seeing it intact but forever out of reach.

PartyTopic_Description_310201.ContentEN: A maid's duties cover every aspect of life — including a few that might involve a bit of... bloodshed.

PartyTopic_Description_310202.ContentEN: First impressions matter, and nothing speaks more directly than what you wear. Fashion, after all, is a timeless art.

PartyTopic_Description_310203.ContentEN: Snip, snip. Trim the flowers, and with them, trim away the woes.

PartyTopic_Description_310204.ContentEN: No matter how well you hide, \

PartyTopic_Description_310301.ContentEN: Everything he says circles back to explosions — that's one explosive way to make a first impression.

PartyTopic_Description_310302.ContentEN: An unexpected visit, an inconsistent conversation.

PartyTopic_Description_310303.ContentEN: They may be sworn enemies, but also inseparable halves of the same whole.

PartyTopic_Description_310304.ContentEN: Trapped in darkness, the warmth of each other is the only light that dispels the gloom.

PartyTopic_Description_330101.ContentEN: A good mood can work wonders on your efficiency, and the key to staying cheerful is knowing when to take care of yourself.

PartyTopic_Description_330102.ContentEN: Even discarded or forgotten items can find a new purpose.

PartyTopic_Description_330103.ContentEN: The bond between father and daughter goes beyond habits, profession, bloodline, and worldview — it also includes sharing the moniker \

PartyTopic_Description_330104.ContentEN: Paths diverge between a human and a cat. Perhaps it's best to embrace farewells with a smile and look forward to a reunion.

PartyTopic_Description_420201.ContentEN: When smart people speak, there's always an agenda behind their words. Efficiency is their craft, and in a way, that's its own form of honesty.

PartyTopic_Description_420202.ContentEN: A gentleman is not born but forged — shaped by education, refined by environment, and polished with a little family \

PartyTopic_Description_420204.ContentEN: One last dance before the clock strikes twelve.

PartyTopic_Description_430101.ContentEN: The true test of loyalty lies in the ever-present sword, ready to fall.

PartyTopic_Description_430102.ContentEN: War never truly ends — it merely changes form.

PartyTopic_Description_430103.ContentEN: Since humanity first roamed forests and plains, tools have ensured survival. Whether for creation or destruction, their purpose remains unchanged.

PartyTopic_Description_510101.ContentEN: Eating is the most basic of needs for all living creatures, but the art of eating is far from simple.

PartyTopic_Description_510103.ContentEN: Filbert may seem like an ordinary pig to others, but to Truffle, she means the world.

PartyTopic_Description_510104.ContentEN: Everyone defines happiness differently, but no matter what, a full stomach gives us the energy to chase it.

PartyTopic_Description_530101.ContentEN: It is not the length of life that matters, but how we choose to live it.

PartyTopic_Description_530102.ContentEN: Death is not the worst thing, as long as one is remembered.

PartyTopic_Description_530103.ContentEN: No one knows what tomorrow holds, yet even with life's uncertainties, we face the unknown, hoping for a better future.

PartyTopic_Name_180103.ContentEN: The Wish for a Bird's-Eye View

PartyTopic_Name_230103.ContentEN: The Line Between Good and Evil

PartyTopic_Name_310304.ContentEN: Eternal Light in the Black Box

Pet_IpDes_401.ContentEN:
With dual horns, Equinex haunts battlefields, ruins, or graveyards, and feeds on carrion. They are deemed as harbingers of doom in many places.\
\
Equinex deals damage to enemies, strengthens nearby teammate(s), and provides Umbro buff through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_402.ContentEN:
Floating through the air, Dripplet, with an affinity to water, normally curls its translucent body, making it nearly invisible in sunlight. Only when it rains does it unfurl gracefully, blossoming like an ethereal flower in mid-air.\
\
Dripplet strengthens nearby teammate(s) and provides Hydro buff through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_403.ContentEN:
Mostly comprised of heat-producing glands, Zippyro releases waves of intense heat whenever it opens its mouth.\
\
Zippyro restores Sanity for nearby teammate(s) and provides Pyro buff through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_404.ContentEN:
Commonly found in highlands, Cubolts were once hunted for their highly conductive fur. So when encountering humans, they curl into a ball and roll away at incredible speed.\
\
Cubolt grants protection to nearby teammate(s) and provides Electro buff through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_405.ContentEN:
A parasitic Geniemon that grows inside fungi, gradually taking control of its host. The puffing sound it makes is caused by wind passing through the hollow space between its body and the husk of its host.\
\
Shroomie strengthens nearby teammate(s) and provides Anemo buff through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_406.ContentEN:
Agile, mischievous, and greedy, Lumi are lovers of shiny things. If you spot one, check your valuables!\
\
Lumi deals damage to nearby enemies, weakens them and provides Lumino buff through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_407.ContentEN: An introverted, carrion-feeding Geniemon that indiscriminately hoards anything it can encompass, using some for sustenance while stashing others away as materials for its nest.

Pet_IpDes_408.ContentEN: A remarkably agile Geniemon. Its comically large ears not only fail to hinder its coordination but actually create a sleek, aerodynamic form that helps it move with incredible speed.

Pet_IpDes_409.ContentEN: A lazy but incredibly long-lived Geniemon that spends over 98% of its time in slumber. Perhaps that's the secret to its longevity.

Pet_IpDes_491.ContentEN:
Healing Drone is created from the whimsy of those who are both alchemists and Geniemon enthusiasts.\
\
Healing Drone heals nearby teammate(s) through Resonance Support.

Pet_IpDes_492.ContentEN:
Magnetix Drone is created from the whimsy of those who are both alchemists and Geniemon enthusiasts.\
\
Magnetix Drone deals damage to nearby enemies through Resonance Support.

QuestDesc_10020101.ContentEN:
On that fateful day at Purgatorio Island, luck favoured you, and you lived to see another day. Awakening anew, Berenica was gone, leaving you amidst an unfamiliar snowy landscape.\
A lady clad in red, who introduced herself as Camilla, together with a girl named Snow, invited you to come with them to Icelake.\
After considerable thought, you decided to join them...

QuestDesc_10020102.ContentEN:
On that fateful day at Purgatorio Island, luck favoured you, and you lived to see another day. Awakening anew, Berenica was gone, leaving you amidst an unfamiliar snowy landscape.\
A lady clad in red, who introduced herself as Camilla, together with a girl named Snow, invited you to come with them to Icelake.\
After considerable thought, you decided to join them...

QuestDesc_10020103.ContentEN: The overturned vehicle and scattered cargo on the bridge have attracted Filthoids. Repel these unwelcome visitors.

QuestDesc_10020104.ContentEN: Having successfully driven away the Filthoids, you and Snow continue your journey towards Icelake.

QuestDesc_10020105.ContentEN: Despite a slight hiccup with the guard checking for travel permits, Ms Camilla's savvy negotiations ensured your entry into Icelake.

QuestDesc_10020106.ContentEN:
Ms Camilla suggests you lodge at the Hypnos' House.\
Despite its eerie tales, you decide to delve deeper...

QuestDesc_10020107.ContentEN:
Ms Camilla suggests you lodge at the Hypnos' House.\
Despite its eerie tales, you decide to delve deeper...

QuestDesc_10020108.ContentEN:
Henrik, the owner of the Hypnos' House, is a brooding and aloof man.\
Persuaded by a spirited young girl, he reluctantly offers you shelter for the night.\
Time to head to the house mentioned by the girl.

QuestDesc_10020109.ContentEN:
Henrik, the owner of the Hypnos' House, is a brooding and aloof man.\
Persuaded by a spirited young girl, he reluctantly offers you shelter for the night.\
Time to head to the house mentioned by the girl.

QuestDesc_10020110.ContentEN: A rare moment of rest. Time to sort out your swirling questions and the situation at hand.

QuestDesc_10020111.ContentEN: You have some questions for Psyche.

QuestDesc_10020112.ContentEN:
Before embarking on your quest to find Berenica, you need to gather some funds and secure a travel permit.\
Psyche reveals that \

QuestDesc_10020201.ContentEN:
Before embarking on your quest to find Berenica, you need to gather some funds and secure a travel permit.\
Psyche reveals that \

QuestDesc_10020202.ContentEN:
Before embarking on your quest to find Berenica, you need to gather some funds and secure a travel permit.\
Psyche reveals that \

QuestDesc_10020203.ContentEN: In the square, you witnessed an atrocity — such is the norm for the \

QuestDesc_10020204.ContentEN:
The scavenger girl named Margie has encountered some difficulties.\
Ask about her situation.

QuestDesc_10020205.ContentEN:
The scavenger girl named Margie has encountered some difficulties.\
Ask about her situation.

QuestDesc_10020206.ContentEN:
The scavenger girl named Margie was robbed by a thief.\
Help her retrieve her money bag. Not just to help her, but to also pass Camilla's test.

QuestDesc_10020207.ContentEN:
A scavenger girl named Margie had her money bag stolen.\
After leaving The Asphodel, try asking around the square to see if anyone has spotted the thief.

QuestDesc_100202071.ContentEN:
An old man named Badi near the square claims to have seen the thief.\
He suggests searching around Bin #3.

QuestDesc_10020208.ContentEN:
An old man named Badi near the square claims to have seen the thief.\
He suggests searching around Bin #3.

QuestDesc_10020209.ContentEN:
Indeed, you found traces of the thief near the rubbish bin, leading to the rooftop. \
Head up there to investigate further.

QuestDesc_10020210.ContentEN: You've reached the rooftop. Search the area for signs of the thief.

QuestDesc_10020211.ContentEN:
You confronted the thief on the rooftop, but he fled abruptly.\
There's no time to lose — chase after him! Wait, something seems off near the manhole...

QuestDesc_10020212.ContentEN:
Following the trail into the sewers, the thief named Hal has left traps to slow you down.\
Find a way to disable these mechanisms and continue the chase.

QuestDesc_10020213.ContentEN:
You've managed to throw the switches, successfully lowering the water level. \
Time to resume the chase.

QuestDesc_10020214.ContentEN: You've found fresh footprints. The thief must be close. Follow them to continue.

QuestDesc_10020215.ContentEN:
At last, you've spotted the thief again. This time, he won't get away.\
Defeat the thief and capture him.

QuestDesc_10020221.ContentEN: You've completed Margie's request. Head back to The Asphodel for your reward.

QuestDesc_10020222.ContentEN: All Commissions for Phoxhunters are on the bulletin board in The Asphodel. Go check it out.

QuestDesc_10020223.ContentEN: Wells misunderstood you and embarrassed himself. He decided to buy you a drink to show his apologies...

QuestDesc_10020224.ContentEN: The Geniemons system is now available. Capture a Geniemon to aid you on your journey ahead.

QuestDesc_10020301.ContentEN:
Henrik, owner of the Hypnos' House, has placed a lucrative bounty for Phoxhunters to retrieve Crystallo of Stella from Glevum Pit.\
The bounty perfectly covers your travel expenses to the south, so you decide to take a chance...

QuestDesc_10020302.ContentEN:
Henrik, owner of the Hypnos' House, has placed a lucrative bounty for Phoxhunters to retrieve Crystallo of Stella from Glevum Pit.\
The bounty perfectly covers your travel expenses to the south, so you decide to take a chance...

QuestDesc_10020303.ContentEN:
Psyche decides to join our journey to show us the way to Glevum Pit.\
Set out with Psyche for Glevum Pit.

QuestDesc_10020304.ContentEN:
Glevum Pit's gates have long been closed.\
Search for an alternate passage.

QuestDesc_10020305.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020306.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020307.ContentEN:
You've successfully made it inside Glevum Pit, but the closed door is blocking your way forward.\
Take a look around; you might find a way to open the door.

QuestDesc_10020308.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
There are Filthoids standing in the way. Defeat them and move forward.

QuestDesc_10020309.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
Operate the device to open the door, and explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020310.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020311.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020312.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.\
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020313.ContentEN:
Your arrival has awakened the giant Filthoid dwelling in the depths of Glevum Pit.\
Now that it has come to this, the first order of business is to defeat it.

QuestDesc_10020314.ContentEN:
Beneath the fearsome corpse of the giant Filthoid lies a gem aglow with starlight.\
Pick it up and take it along.

QuestDesc_10020315.ContentEN:
Your first adventure in Glevum Pit concludes successfully — despite the unpleasant complications with Outsider.\
Outsider took the Crystallo of Stella. He seems eager to speak with you. You've agreed to meet him at his residence.

QuestDesc_10020316.ContentEN:
Your first adventure in Glevum Pit concludes successfully — despite the unpleasant complications with Outsider.\
Outsider took the Crystallo of Stella. He seems eager to speak with you. You've agreed to meet him at his residence.

QuestDesc_10020401.ContentEN:
Outsider requested an exclusive meeting, so Snow left first.\
According to Outsider, his home is in the slums, marked by a bird on the door.

QuestDesc_10020402.ContentEN: You were invited to a modest yet sweet \

QuestDesc_10020403.ContentEN: You were invited to a modest yet sweet \

QuestDesc_10020404.ContentEN:
In exchange for a travel permit, you were requested by Outsider to investigate the Hypnos' House under the pretext of delivering the Crystallo of Stella.\
But first, a well-deserved rest.

QuestDesc_10020405.ContentEN:
According to Outsider, the Hypnos' House run by Henrik may harbour horrible secrets — a Phoxhunter named Hunt is said to have gone missing within its walls.\
You decided to investigate this inn.

QuestDesc_10020406.ContentEN:
Henrik grudgingly opened the door because of the Crystallo of Stella.\
Time to delve inside for a probe.

QuestDesc_10020407.ContentEN:
Henrik went back to his office to verify the authenticity of the Crystallo. Now's the chance to explore the inn.\
Psyche just greeted you; attend to her first.

QuestDesc_10020408.ContentEN:
You received a gift from Psyche. She said that flowers would bring good luck.\
You've also learned that all lodgers at the Hypnos' House suffer from some kind of ailment, and Henrik seems to be secretly researching something.\
Better investigate some other areas of the inn.

QuestDesc_10020409.ContentEN: The lodgers of the Hypnos' House seem to be an unusual bunch. Ask around and find out what they know about Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020410.ContentEN:
You've learned that Henrik's locked office is off-limits within this building.\
You've learned that Henrik consistently goes out at 5 PM on the 20th of each month.\
You've confirmed that Hunt, the missing Phoxhunter, indeed once lodged here—\
Henrik should be back any minute now.

QuestDesc_10020411.ContentEN:
Though you couldn't get into the office, you've managed to gather some useful intel.\
Go back and share your findings with Outsider.

QuestDesc_10020412.ContentEN:
Though you couldn't get into the office, you've managed to gather some useful intel.\
Go back and share your findings with Outsider.

QuestDesc_10020501.ContentEN:
There's still plenty of time before the 20th arrives.\
Check The Asphodel's bulletin board and complete Commission: Mediation to gain some experience.

QuestDesc_10020502.ContentEN:
As you gradually settle into the city and learn the ropes of being a Phoxhunter...\
In Dismania, the Imperial Capital, the Legion is plotting something.

QuestDesc_10020503.ContentEN:
Outside Icelake, Outsider is busy laying traps on a clearing on the outskirts while waiting for you.\
You might want to see what he's up to.

QuestDesc_10020504.ContentEN: Per Outsider's instructions, defeat the approaching Filthoids to complete your combat training.

QuestDesc_10020505.ContentEN:
Outsider has somehow attracted a host of Filthoids. \
Well, no use complaining — just help him take care of them.

QuestDesc_10020505_1.ContentEN:
You agreed to meet Outsider for the Phoxhunter combat training on the outskirts, but Outsider has somehow attracted a host of Filthoids.\
Now that you've taken care of the Filthoids, go see what he is up to.

QuestDesc_10020506.ContentEN:
According to Outsider, the next round of combat training involves protecting this loudly blaring device.\
Simply clear out the Filthoids and prevent them from damaging it.

QuestDesc_10020507.ContentEN:
Henrik should be leaving the house soon.\
Join Snow near the Hypnos' House, who's been tasked with covertly watching Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020601.ContentEN:
Henrik should be leaving the house soon.\
Join Snow near the Hypnos' House, who's been tasked with covertly watching Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020602.ContentEN:
Henrik appears to be heading outside the city.\
Follow him to see what he's up to.

QuestDesc_10020603.ContentEN:
Henrik appears to be heading outside the city.\
Follow him to see what he's up to.

QuestDesc_10020604.ContentEN:
Outsider has infiltrated the locked room via the chimney.\
Explore the secrets of this room.

QuestDesc_10020605.ContentEN:
You and Snow discovered Henrik's box hidden under the water.\
The contents seem to have dissolved.\
Go back and see what Outsider has found out.

QuestDesc_10020606.ContentEN: Outsider sneaked into Henrik's office and discovered a document titled \

QuestDesc_10020607.ContentEN: You hear quiet sobbing coming from Psyche's room. Go check on her.

QuestDesc_10020608.ContentEN:
For some reason, Psyche seems upset, though Henrik claims she's just feeling a bit under the weather.\
Feeling the need for a private conversation, you invite her for a stroll by Lamenting Lake. It's just outside Icelake. Begin your walk with Psyche.

QuestDesc_10020609.ContentEN:
You notice Psyche's vision seems severely impaired, but she is reluctant to talk about it.\
Psyche wishes for you to accompany her to the old tree roots by Lamenting Lake, a place laden with her childhood memories.

QuestDesc_10020610.ContentEN: According to Psyche, a secret lies beneath these roots. It's time to unearth it.

QuestDesc_10020611.ContentEN:
Psyche gave you the camera she once buried as a child. She can no longer see, but she hopes you'll capture the world through its lens.\
It seems Psyche's got more on her mind. Walk with her by Lamenting Lake and hear her out.

QuestDesc_10020612.ContentEN:
Your conversation with Psyche has been abruptly interrupted by Henrik's arrival. You told Psyche that you'll be waiting by the signpost at 2 AM for her.\
Now, it's time to return to Icelake and prepare for her rescue.

QuestDesc_10020613.ContentEN: While returning to Icelake, you encounter a sketchy soldier. Alarmed by your presence, he attacks without warning...

QuestDesc_10020615.ContentEN:
Kevin confessed he was trying to secretly bury a Deteriorator, who used to be his neighbour. He begged you to keep it a secret.\
He also explained what \

QuestDesc_10020701.ContentEN:
Night has fallen. As promised, you're to meet Psyche by the signpost south of Hypnos' House at 2 AM. Outsider seems ready.\
There's no time to waste. Head to the rendezvous point now.

QuestDesc_10020702.ContentEN:
On your way to meet Psyche, a sudden scream came from the direction of Hypnos' House — it sounded like Snow.\
It sent a chill down your spine, urging you to investigate the source of the disturbance.

QuestDesc_10020703.ContentEN:
According to Snow, Psyche is exhibiting signs of Deterioration. Meanwhile, a boy from Hypnos' House implores you to help Henrik.\
Follow the boy into Hypnos' House to understand the situation fully.

QuestDesc_10020704.ContentEN: The usually locked office on the ground floor of Hypnos' House is now wide open, suggesting that Henrik's office is the epicentre of the ongoing incident.

QuestDesc_10020705.ContentEN:
Gravely injured, Henrik divulges the truth in his final moments, pleading with you to save Psyche, who has lost her senses. This is the collective wish of everyone at Hypnos' House.\
Snow directs you to where Psyche fled. Head to Lamenting Lake to find her.

QuestDesc_10020706.ContentEN:
Butterflies flutter along the path Psyche took, as if guiding you. \
Follow them to find her.

QuestDesc_10020707.ContentEN:
Following the butterflies, you arrive at Lamenting Lake, where raging winds seem intent on blocking your way. \
Fortunately, the gusts follow a pattern. Stay vigilant and carefully cross the icy lake.

QuestDesc_10020708.ContentEN:
Psyche's condition worsens. By the time you finally catch up to her, she has morphed into a Filthoid known as the Eclosioner.\
Defeat the Eclosioner and awaken Psyche from her slumber.

QuestDesc_10020709.ContentEN:
Psyche lies asleep at the eye of the storm. Amid the howling winds, you sense the cruelty of fate, yet your hands persist in their efforts. \
In the end, all you can offer is a bouquet for the slumbering girl.

QuestDesc_10020801.ContentEN: The blizzard suddenly lifts, and Psyche finds herself in a familiar place...

QuestDesc_10020802.ContentEN: A corridor woven from memories stretches before her. At the end lies a familiar yet strange shadow from the past.

QuestDesc_10020803.ContentEN:
The shadow relentlessly gnaws at Psyche's mind, but your voice calls her back.\
As her brand-new wings unfold, a quiet resolve settles in her heart.

QuestDesc_10020804.ContentEN:
Psyche's story concludes with a single bullet from the city's Escort.\
Rhythm, the Warrant Officer, mistook you for victims attacked by the Filthoid and now looks at you with concern.

QuestDesc_10020806.ContentEN: Following Charon tradition, you lay Psyche to rest in the water, allowing her soul to return to the Misty Sea.

QuestDesc_10020807.ContentEN:
Together with Outsider, you find a secluded spot near Lamenting Lake to bid Psyche a final farewell.\
You're certain she would have loved this place — a serene, beautiful resting spot away from sorrowful cries or the clamour of machinery. Only the gentle breeze offers its silent tribute.

QuestDesc_10020808.ContentEN:
Amid pain and farewells, the long day finally comes to an end.\
Sleep evades you tonight, so you plan to wander the city alone.

QuestDesc_10020809.ContentEN: Here, in the narrow space between reality and dreamland, passersby open their eyes, and echoes from clamorous deserts find their way back.

QuestDesc_10029701.ContentEN:
Raise your Trial Rank to progress in the main story.\
\
You can earn EXP by:\
1. Completing <H>Commissions</> (excluding Noctoyager Manual Commissions)\
2. Interacting with local residents and completing <H>Side Quests</>

QuestDesc_10029801.ContentEN:
Raise your Trial Rank to progress in the main story.\
\
You can earn EXP by:\
1. Completing <H>Commissions</> (excluding Noctoyager Manual Commissions)\
2. Interacting with local residents and completing <H>Side Quests</>

QuestDesc_10029901.ContentEN:
Raise your Trial Rank to progress in the main story.\
\
You can earn EXP by:\
1. Completing <H>Lunosmith's Demon Wedge 101</> tutorials\
2. Completing <H>Commissions</> (excluding Noctoyager Manual Commissions)\
3. Interacting with local residents and completing <H>Side Quests</>

READ_DESC_2000001.ContentEN: The statue's base is marked with time-worn inscriptions, the faded text hinting at a hymn of praise to a deity.

READ_DESC_2000002.ContentEN: A yellowed and somewhat damaged book about alchemy filled with annotations.

READ_DESC_2000003.ContentEN: An abandoned diary written with elegant handwriting but in a state of disrepair. Some parts are difficult to discern.

READ_DESC_2000004.ContentEN: An abandoned diary written with elegant handwriting but in a state of disrepair. Some parts are difficult to discern.

READ_DESC_2000005.ContentEN: An abandoned diary written with elegant handwriting but in a state of disrepair. Some parts are difficult to discern.

READ_DESC_2000006.ContentEN: A fragmented recording capturing the last exchange between Psyche and Henrik.

READ_DESC_2000007.ContentEN: A venerable medical tome detailing the causes, symptoms, and treatments of myriad diseases. Although many treatment entries remain unfilled, its cover boldly declares, \

READ_DESC_2000008.ContentEN: An old, much-thumbed tome with exotic binding. Its pages are fragile, as if a mere touch could cause them to fall apart. Upon closer inspection, it appears to be a text on pharmacology.

READ_DESC_2000009.ContentEN: A luxurious letter addressed to Henrik Ethelred, found in a drawer.

READ_DESC_2000010.ContentEN: An unposted letter, gathering dust atop the desk for reasons unknown.

READ_DESC_2000011.ContentEN: The latter half of this familial letter is smudged with water stains, rendering it illegible. The dusty page and the presence of the Hypnos' House eloquently speak of Henrik's choice at the time.

READ_DESC_2000012.ContentEN: A serial novel with a sloppy title, set against the backdrop of the decades-old war between Hyperborea and Elysium, centring on the adventures of a Hyperborean boy. It's a favourite among the Empire's youth.

READ_DESC_2000013.ContentEN: The diary of a traveller long exposed to the elements. Its pages mostly obscured by stains and smudges, only the most recent entries remain legible.

READ_DESC_2000014.ContentEN: Theo's comprehensive field notes that cover everything — the environment, plants, animals, and humans.

READ_DESC_2000015.ContentEN: Theo's comprehensive field notes that cover everything — the environment, plants, animals, and humans.

READ_DESC_2000016.ContentEN: Theo's comprehensive field notes that cover everything — the environment, plants, animals, and humans.

READ_DESC_2000017.ContentEN: A worn letter from Annie to her mother, frayed from time spent in a pocket but still readable.

READ_DESC_2000018.ContentEN: A journal unearthed at Glevum Pit, seemingly left behind in haste. Its pages reveal the author's profound remorse and some murky, possibly fabricated, secrets.

READ_DESC_2000019.ContentEN: A forty-year-old journal discovered on a secluded trail in the deepest reaches of Glevum Pit. The hasty writing reveals the simple yet intense desires of a young man.

READ_DESC_2000020.ContentEN: A rubbing of words deeply etched into a wall with fierce emotion. The carver's anger behind each letter feels almost alive.

READ_DESC_2000021.ContentEN: A rubbing of faintly legible text found in the crevices of a sewer wall, seemingly related to a question posed by someone living there.

READ_DESC_2000022.ContentEN: A rubbing of faintly legible text found in the crevices of a sewer wall, seemingly related to a question posed by someone living there.

READ_DESC_2000023.ContentEN:
An extravagantly worded flyer. Had you not witnessed the abandoned pit's sorry state for yourself, it might have fooled you for a moment. By taking this flyer, you spare someone from falling victim to a scam.\
As for the bait in the box — consider it a reward for your good deed and take it with pride.

READ_DESC_2000024.ContentEN: A crumpled letter, seemingly soaked before. The envelope bears no address, only the recipient's name.

READ_DESC_2000025.ContentEN:
The pages have yellowed with age yet remain undamaged. Someone must've kept it with care.\
The cover features a portrait of a grey-haired woman, a pristine white flower blooming in her left eye.\
The back cover bears the emblem of The Forsakens and the inscription: \

READ_DESC_2000026.ContentEN: A rejected application, dated a year and a half ago.

READ_DESC_2000027.ContentEN: A conversation carried out via passed notes. The worn paper suggests this exchange took place some time ago.

READ_DESC_2000028.ContentEN: The content of this journal suggests a certain laxity in the discipline within The Forsakens.

READ_DESC_2000029.ContentEN: A rejected application, dated two years ago.

READ_DESC_2000030.ContentEN: The only holiday the soldiers stationed at the fortress are allowed to celebrate.

READ_DESC_2000031.ContentEN: A crisp new evacuation notice that starkly deviates from the empire's usual formatting.

READ_DESC_2000032.ContentEN:
Combat logs from the simulation console at Lonza Fortress. They meticulously detail the Imperial soldiers' performances in simulated battles, with candid assessments and suggestions for each squad.\
The narrative shifts abruptly in the last entries, suggesting they were authored by someone from The Forsakens rather than the Legion.

READ_DESC_2000033.ContentEN:
An informal register of military dogs maintained by an Imperial dog handler, carefully hidden deep inside a chariot's storage compartment.\
Water damage has blurred the last few entries.

READ_DESC_2000034.ContentEN:
An emergency medical log stripped of formalities. It succinctly details the condition of casualties and the emergency treatments administered.\
The handwriting on the page listing remaining medical supplies grows increasingly frantic as supplies dwindle, clearly mirroring the writer's escalating anxiety.

READ_DESC_2000035.ContentEN: Transcripts of a discussion within The Forsakens about a new recruit who joined after the occupation of the fortress.

READ_DESC_2000036.ContentEN: A lost journal that belongs to someone from The Forsakens. According to the entries, the owner might be a healer.

READ_DESC_2000037.ContentEN: A neatly written letter that lies open on the desk, already read. It is addressed to Henrik Ethelred.

READ_DESC_2000038.ContentEN: A disordered heap of overdue notices scattered across the desk, all urging Henrik to settle his debts. It's evident that Hypnos' House has been under financial strain for some time.

READ_DESC_2000041.ContentEN: A folder unearthed from the archives. It bears Psyche's photo and details her time at Hypnos' House.

READ_DESC_2000042.ContentEN: A folder unearthed from the archives. It bears Elisa's photo and details her time at Hypnos' House.
