READ_TEXT_2000001.ContentEN:
Fusa, the Goddess of Fate —\
... of the Stellar Path, and the architect of the Threads of Destiny. \
As the dome and ... bear witness, we offer you our devout hymns. \
\
The radiance we see among the sprays of water was ... bestowed by you... \
Your believers gather at the hidden reefs, travelling to the edges of this remote island. \
People of ... bear witness to the revelation,\
swearing to manifest their faith with the divine instruments. \
And so, the frozen melodies begi... to play. \
\
The first melody arises from the ... caves,\
where the daylight spills out in rich waves.\
The ... stone forms an elegant visage,\
and destiny softly breathes within the encircling columns. \
\
The second ... is in a cavern with cascading waterfalls,\
where the years have smoothed the cliffs ...\
and the waters descending from the Nine Heavens have transformed into stained glass.\
It is a place of scattered hymns, ... this sanctuary. \
\
The third melody sings of an ascending corridor,\
extending to ... constellations, and the sun and moon.\
Catching glimpses of stars beyond the constellations,\
weaving a curtain that envelops all of Atlasia. \
\
Fusa, the stargazing Goddess—\
Here we pay homage to you.\
May you protect your faithful believers,\
and grant us impeccable ... luck and happiness!

READ_TEXT_2000002.ContentEN:
...\
All readers know that the author has always lived a solitary life. \
The benefits of solitude are obvious. Firstly, we can crush and refine precious gems purchased at great expense without hesitation, and without worrying about these valuable materials being used as gifts to win the favour of others. \
(Note: Of course, gems can only fulfil their true value in the hands of an alchemist.)\
Secondly, those who live alone will have more energy to experiment with the wonders of alchemy, rather than feeling deep regret upon finding their first strand of grey hair, and realising that one should not have been overly obsessed with fruitless love like the author. \
(Note: This sounds somewhat extreme, but in today's Empire, who isn't extreme?) \
And lastly, maintaining a solitary life can also prevent some unfortunate events from happening, like the following: \
Along the northern border of the Siberian Empire, there is a city called Icelake (Note: My teacher once went there, supposedly to visit a doctor named Enrique, but unfortunately I didn't inquire further), which produces Crystallo of Stella. It has a cold climate that makes it suitable for conducting research into the fire element. \
And the protagonist of this incident? Poor Vagim. He was one of the many alchemists in this region who specialised in the use of fire. He was 40 years old at the time, an age when many alchemists eventually achieved success. However, his greatest achievement at that time was not in alchemy but in having a child who was too clever and had a great interest in alchemy. \
(Annotation: A bit too harsh.)\
One winter morning, at the insistence of young Igor, Vagim took his son to the alchemy workshop. Naturally, the presence of a child, which are unpredictable, dangerous, and uncontrollable creatures, resulted in an explosive situation in the alchemy workshop. \
The events that followed were not witnessed by anyone, but based on eyewitness testimonies and an analysis of the scene, it is believed that the following occurred: \
Vagim prepared the most materials: Beast Wax, a small amount of Phoxene powder, and a heating crucible. Under his guidance, young Igor followed the classic process and proportions, causing a small and continuously burning fireball to appear in the crucible. \
(Note: This is very basic, but this successful attempt shows that the child had some talent.)\
For a child, Igor did remarkably well, and Vagim must have thought so too because he instantly praised his son. But unfortunately, this misled the young Igor, who thought that as long as he created a large enough fireball, he would receive even more praise. \
So, while Vagim was focused on preparing his own experiment, Igor, probably with the intention of surprising his father, added an entire block of Beast Wax to the crucible. \
(Note: Although understandable, this act was completely unforgivable.)\
\
On that day, Icelake experienced its largest fire since its founding. And the epicenter of the fire was Vagim's workshop. The likely cause was the excessive addition of experimental reactants. Any novice alchemist who had thoroughly read the “Alchemist Safety Guidelines” would not have made such a mistake. However, we cannot blame a child for this. Without a doubt, Vagim was the one responsible for this incident. \
It can only be said that, as an alchemist, maintaining a solitary life is a virtue that benefits both scientific endeavours and the greater good of society. \
(Note: This is a painful lesson, so I should also be more careful in future.)

READ_TEXT_2000003.ContentEN:

September 14th\
I should be safe here. \
After all, ever since Brendan's expeditionary forces withdrew from here hundreds of years ago, this place has been an uninhabited island abandoned by the Church and ignored by the Empire. It's not marked .... on ordinary maps either. \
I can finally get a good night's sleep. ... must be exhausted by now as well. \
Tomorrow, I need to hide ... more discreetly and thoroughly explore the island. \
If I remember correctly, Brendan's expeditionary forces seemed to ... discover a massive temple. If I can find the ruins of that temple, then I can use it to shelter from the elements ...\
\
September 15th\
I only discovered this island is inhabited today. How unexpected. \
Their accents have started to differ slightly from the common tongue, but we can still communicate in a simple manner. They claim to be descendants of fishermen from the Empire who came here to avoid conscription. \
I'm not surprised by their ... looks. They're probably worried I'll inform the Empire that ... , and attract imperial troops. \
Hah! When it comes to avoiding the Empire, I... Well, it's better to steer clear of them as much as possible. It would be bad if I brought them into this mess.\
\
...

READ_TEXT_2000007.ContentEN:
...\
Deterioration predominantly afflicts Charon individuals between the ages of seventeen and twenty. The cause remains unknown, and the condition is invariably fatal.\
In the early stages, the patient's physiological indicators show no significant abnormalities. However, as the condition progresses, burnt-like markings, known as Deterioration Imprints, begin to manifest on the skin, with their location and pattern varying among individuals.\
By the middle stage, the patient's bodily functions rapidly deteriorate. Externally, they may still appear normal, but internally, their tissues begin to mutate, resembling those of Filthoids. Eventually, the mutation exceeds the body's limits, leading to an irreversible collapse, marking the terminal phase of the disease. At this point, grotesque external hyperplasia occurs, erasing any traces of their former human form. <H>As the final phase sets in, the human existence ceases entirely</>, giving way to a nascent, predatory Filthoid emerging from their former shell.\
It seems almost like a cruel <H>curse</>: those once blind may gain extraordinary sight as Filthoids, and the anaemic might manipulate their own blood as a weapon. Only in this monstrous form do they attain bodies capable of enduring such afflictions.\
...

READ_TEXT_2000010.ContentEN: <D>Your kindness is appreciated, but my mind is made up. Please proceed with the sale — it's for the children. </>A tenant has moved in. The sale can wait for now.

READ_TEXT_2000011.ContentEN:
Kid, I've heard the Legion has recently intensified their inspections. What you are doing now is growing more perilous. Perhaps it's time to drop it and permanently shut down the Hypnos' House.\
I've always believed that Hayley's dignified death as a human being under your care was the best ending she could have hoped for. I also understand the significance of you opening the Hypnos' House right after you returned from Scarletriver and offering help to the kids who are suffering from Deterioration.\
But I've already lost my daughter and my granddaughter. I cannot bear the thought of losing you, my son-in-law, the only family I have in this world now...

READ_TEXT_2000013.ContentEN:
Day 4: The blizzard has erased my tracks. I'm lost in the mountains... with no way back...\
\
Day 7: With my last bit of strength, I made it to the mountain top. The blizzard's too intense; I can't find a way down. Met some other lost travellers up here... Hard to say how long they will last...\
\
Day 8: Late into the night. Finally managed to get a fire going in a cave, safe from the wolves for now. She's stopped bleeding, but fallen into a feverish coma... It's so cold. When will this blizzard end... Such a pity that a beautiful and well-bred lady should meet her end in this godforsaken place with me.\
\
Day 9: The weather's let up a little. Found a way down the mountain. Carrying her on my back, she miraculously came to. I promised her that we'd make it back alive together.\
\
Day 9: She's become too weak to even sip water. She said she was cold; I felt the same. Cold and exhausted, we drifted to sleep in each other's arms...\
\
Day 10: She'll never wake up again. Her last message, written in blood on the snow, will forever haunt me: \

READ_TEXT_2000014.ContentEN:
Spotted an unusually large rat by the sewer. He had lots of cool scars and a weird little bottle strapped to his back. Could he be the legendary Rat Warrior from those tales?\
...\
At 3:10 PM, the Rat Warrior showed up again by the sewer. He was slow today, but not hurt – he was just waiting for other little rats to catch up. It seems he is not just a brave warrior, but also a dependable leader!\
...\
Awww! My Rat Warrior got caught by a beggar and made into a kebab!

READ_TEXT_2000015.ContentEN:
The horns of the Charons come in various colours and shapes. Does this have something to do with their intelligence?\
...\
The Charon man in the square seems nice, but he spends all day talking to toy figures – too immature to be an observation subject.\
...\
The receptionist lady at the inn has really long, beautiful horns. I've decided to observe her closely to explore the relationship between horn shape and intelligence.\
...\
Finally gathered the courage to say hi to her today, but she just walked away like I wasn't there! New hypothesis: the longer the horns, the ruder the Charon!\
...\
Met a polite Charon with just one short horn. I knew I was right! Marked as a primary observation subject.

READ_TEXT_2000017.ContentEN:
Dear Mother,\
I'm not sure if this letter will ever make its way to you, but writing it now takes me back to the crazy mix of fear, thrill, and excitement I felt leaving home. Thanks to you, I've read extensively and learned about the many wonders out there in the world. However, it was under your watchful eye that I was denied the chance to experience these wonders, constrained to live as you desired. But now, having left home, things are different. The vibrant winds, the beautiful flowers, and the joys and sorrows of my journeys have deepened my understanding and appreciation of this colourful world. Recently, I've even made it near some snowy mountains – sights I've never seen before. So, I guess I will not go back home. You can think of this as the follies of youth if it makes you feel better.\
With love,\
Annie

READ_TEXT_2000018.ContentEN:
...\
Oh, how I regret it... I should never have told Hans those tales!\
Like the one about a gem trader and a few bandits who were trapped in a cave deep in the mountains and died there a hundred years ago, or the story about the miner who, twenty years ago, ran off with the mine director's daughter, only to be killed and his body dumped in the forbidden zone deep within the pit, becoming a ghost that haunts the area...\
Weren't these just old tales the miners made up to pass the time!? Why did Hans take them so seriously that he stole the key, ran into the forbidden zone, and never came back!?\
Curse his curiosity... No, it was my fault... If only I hadn't filled his head with those cursed, eerie stories... It's all my fault...

READ_TEXT_2000019.ContentEN:
April 14th\
Many supervisors at Glevum Pit have been reassigned to other pits. No one's on night watch today, lucky me!\
\
April 18th\
The soil here is unusually soft — I managed to dig down three metres in just one night! I've blocked the entrance with some old crates that have been lying around for over half a year. No one's going to notice they're missing.\
My love, I know you think the legend about the gemstone is just a myth, but this is our only chance.\
Wait for me, Hilin.\
\
April 19th\
Feeling a bit off lately — dizzy, vision blurry, not much of an appetite. Must be the wound acting up.\
Gotta suck it up. Time is ticking.\
I saw a silverback vole just now. What a tough little creature. They can even make a home in a place like this.\
\
April 23th\
Rough day. I finally made it deeper into the mountain, but now there's this massive rock wall in my way. Good thing I packed extra picks.\
The pain's getting worse — it's like it's in my bones now. I can barely stomach any food.\
My lantern's gone out, so I'm scribbling this in the dark — she's definitely going to make fun of my handwriting when she sees this.\
But I've gotta keep a record of all this, so when I make it big, this'll all be part of my story.\
\
April 24th\
I did it!\
Honey, I'm so pumped right now! I just wanna see you and yell this good news right in your ear! While fumbling around in the dark, I found three skeletons and some stones — these must be the gems! It all adds up with that old tale about the gem trader and the bandits!\
I'm gonna make it big!\
Soon, I'll be rolling in it. And once I'm loaded, your dad can't say no to us anymore, and you won't have to marry that guy you don't even know.\
\
\
\
April \

I C ant g et O...\
Go tta Go ba...\
G em ... Cysta... \
Wann... S ee H er

I huffed and puffed my way up here, expecting a shiny treasure, and what do I find? Mushrooms.\
Yes, mushrooms!!! Of all things — why mushrooms!!?

\
People dump their filth and sins <H>into the gutters</>, burying them underground, comforting themselves with the illusion that nothing ever happened. Naturally, they remain blind to the <H>rats</> and hatred festering from them.

READ_TEXT_2000024.ContentEN:
My Dearest,\
It's been too long. I am writing this letter from Lonza Fortress in Hyperborea, no longer as an imperial soldier.\
After you left, I tried to move on as they told me to — but I couldn't. The Misty Sea took you from me, and cleared the fog that once clouded my vision. Suddenly, the world's true face and the grotesque truths behind the doctrines I once revered became clear. The splendid crown we once worshipped was merely a mirage, and I have now seen through it.\
In my awakening, I joined The Forsakens. Just today, I ended the life of the imperial officer who ruined you.\
I once vowed to follow you into the Misty Sea after avenging your death. But since joining The Forsakens, I've come to realize that the rot beneath the Empire's gleaming facade is even more horrifying than I had imagined. Our people are suffering, stripped of dignity, powerless against the abuse and oppression, for their vision is still obscured by the mist.\
I cannot, in good conscience, depart from this world as it is. Forgive me for not fulfilling my promise sooner. No one should endure the cruelty we face. I must fight for a future where all Charons live with dignity in the light.\
\
I will never forget you, and my love for you burns as fiercely as ever. When the war is over and our people are truly free... I promise, I will come to you.

READ_TEXT_2000025.ContentEN:
To all the proud Charons, do you still remember—\
\
From the trunk of Laerad, our saga sprouted; from the embrace of the Misty Sea, our souls rise and rest. We are the cherished children of Father Ask and Mother Embla, endowed with powerful physiques, majestic horns, and indomitable spines.\
\
Yet, the Hyperborean Empire has unjustly maligned us, trampling our dignity, tarnishing our reputation, and stripping away our rights, driving us into shadows of fear and oppression to make us forget who we truly are.\
\
To all the brave and resilient Charons, despite the oppression and humiliation inflicted upon us—\
The call to arms has sounded, and the hour of awakening has come.\
We seek no false mercy from the tyrants; we scorn the crumbs from our oppressors. Born free, we are entitled to all the happiness the world has to offer.\
\
To each valiant warrior of The Forsakens—\
May you be blessed with the courage and wrath of Ask, to rise ever mightier against the mightiest foes;\
May you be graced with the compassion and gentleness of Embla, to nurture solidarity and fight with one heart and one mind.\
Let your pulses quicken and hearts swell with the tides of triumph,\
And may we one day meet in a land where our brightest dreams shine realized!

READ_TEXT_2000026.ContentEN:
[Reason for Request]\
Manpower shortage for fortress mechanism maintenance\
[Details of Request]\
Requesting the assignment of 14 technicians from the Aeolipile Alchademy for maintenance duties as follows: 5 technicians to service the central turret's firing and positioning modules. 3 technicians to maintain the fluid transfer well. 4 technicians to oversee the upkeep of supply transport routes. 2 technicians to conduct tests on the water pump control systems.\
\
[Decision]\
Request denied\
[Reason]\
The Aeolipile Alchademy has determined that the maintenance tasks described are of low complexity and do not require specialized technicians. These tasks can be adequately completed by the fortress's existing logistical staff.\
\
[Additional Remarks]\
To manage the manpower shortage, the command group recommends dividing the maintenance tasks based on their level of confidentiality. Classified tasks should be managed by military logistics personnel. Non-classified tasks may involve conscripting able-bodied Charon civilians from nearby villages under the Wartime Emergency Conscription Act. \
Should our current personnel be unable to perform classified maintenance, these conscripted Charon citizens may be assigned as needed, with all subsequent procedures handled according to confidentiality protocols.

READ_TEXT_2000027.ContentEN:
Buddy, you okay? You've been yawning a ton.\
I had to stay up till 3 AM for extra target practice because my shooting scores were terrible :'‑(\
That's rough... But you better watch it — if the officer catches you, you're screwed.\
I'm trying to hold it in, but can't help it :(\
Remember that Charon who talked back to the officer the other day? The one that fixed the tracks — do you know where he ended up?\
Yeah, I heard he wrapped up his work early so they sent him back :‑| \
Nah. We're low on fuel, there's no way they'd waste resources sending someone out of the fortress.\
Where's he then? :‑o\
I saw a human finger in the military dogs' food bowl yesterday. What do you think?\
!!? Okay, okay, I'm wide awake now! No more horror stories!

READ_TEXT_2000029.ContentEN:
[Reason for Request]\
There are recognized safety hazards with the current design of the sewer drainage system. A few days ago, a patrol soldier accidentally activated a mechanism in Reservoir #3, causing the water level to rise above the critical threshold. This triggered an electrical fault and resulted in injuries. \
[Details of Request]\
Requesting technical support from the Aeolipile to refine and improve the operational mechanisms of the drainage system.\
\
[Decision]\
Request denied\
[Reason]\
The fortress has functioned for decades without such incidents, suggesting that the recent incident is attributed to individual error rather than a systemic issue.\
\
[Additional Remarks]\
This request has been forwarded to the Commission for Discipline Inspection. Effective immediately, new regulations have been added to the fortress's operational guidelines: Any unauthorised operation or mishandling of drainage mechanisms will result in a demotion by one military rank.

READ_TEXT_2000030.ContentEN:
In accordance with headquarters' orders, all non-Charon soldiers are granted a half-day leave on Triumph Day. Specific leave schedules will be communicated by your respective units.\
Important Note: Soldiers taking leave are required to attend the celebration ceremony at the simulated battlefield during one of the designated time slots below. Failure to participate will be recorded as an absence:\
Morning leave: 09:00 to 11:00\
Afternoon leave: 15:00 to 17:00\
\
Charon soldiers will adhere to their regular duties as per the temporary defence deployment and are exempt from participating in the ceremony.

READ_TEXT_2000031.ContentEN:
Personnel not assigned to combat duties are required to finalise their handovers within the day and prepare for immediate evacuation. Ensure that all sensitive documents are securely removed.\
Patients and the injured will be evacuated on the first available transport. Subsequent evacuations will proceed in an orderly fashion according to senior command directives. Personal belongings should be kept to a minimum. Please notify your superior in advance if special arrangements are needed.\
Transport vehicle storage is reserved primarily for fuel and medical supplies. Heavy weapons should be transported only if deemed essential.

Score: 3:1\
Observations: The 7th Squad has shown significant improvements in combat capabilities, demonstrating solid team cohesion and defensive stability. However, their offensive efficiency requires enhancement — focusing on combined arms proficiency is recommended. The 3rd Squad displayed courage and decisiveness but lacked finesse. Prioritising defensive capabilities and intensifying physical training is advisable.\
\
March 24th\
Participants: 2nd Squad vs. 4th Squad\
Score: 2:2\
Observations: The 2nd Squad executed a clear strategy, capitalising on their captain's exceptional skills through adaptive formations. However, their over-reliance on one individual poses risks. Developing broader tactical plans that don't hinge on the captain's presence is advisable. The 4th Squad maintained a controlled combat rhythm and executed their strategies with precision, yet their overall approach was overly cautious. Exploring more aggressive tactics could enhance their performance in dynamic combat scenarios.\

READ_TEXT_2000035.ContentEN:
Katya Oen, 23 years old, originally from a family of engineers in Dismania. Both parents are Laurelled Charons at the Aeolipile. Six years ago, driven by compassion for other Charons and a rebellion against parental expectations, you left home to pursue mechanical engineering independently, aiming to alleviate the plight of the impoverished Charons. While promoting compact heating devices in Ovis, you were captured by Hyperborean soldiers during a labour conscription raid. After ten months of forced labour at Lonza Fortress, you were liberated by The Forsakens during our breach of the fortress. You've been recuperating under our care for over a month now, and your physical and mental health have largely stabilised. Our investigations have confirmed that...\
\
Katya: Wow, thanks for raking over my tragic backstory right to my face — your group sure knows how to make a girl feel welcome!\
\
Gracia: Thanks. We've verified all the information you provided. It's been confirmed that you're not an Imperial spy but the sole survivor among the labourers at Lonza Fortress. You are free to go now.\
\
Katya: That's it? Nothing else you want to discuss with me?\
\
Gracia: No, that's all.\
\
Katya: Isn't this the part where you all start tearing up and say something like, \

READ_TEXT_2000036.ContentEN:
...\
Today, I had to say a heartrending goodbye to little Joe Frank. After he coughed up the last bit of blood in his lungs, he quietly drifted off in my arms, reuniting with his parents in the Misty Sea.\
While there's a faint solace in knowing his suffering has ended, rage consumes me over the horrors he endured. He was only 10 years old — how could the Hyperborean soldiers be so cruel to him after his parents died from exhaustion and illness!? When we discovered him, he was severely emaciated, weighing a mere 15 kilograms. It seemed as though a mere gust of wind could claim his fragile life. But what enraged me most was that his chest had been filled with blood — a clear sign of recent severe trauma.\
D*mn those Hyperborean monsters! I can't even begin to imagine the brutality he must have suffered! I curse the mercilessness of fate — why couldn't we have found him just one day sooner? One day, and that fatal blow to his chest wouldn't have happened. He could have been playing with toys, giggling, like any other carefree 10-year-old. And I detest my own incompetence most of all — despite exhausting every healing spell I knew, I couldn't save him. Before we left for Lonza Fortress, I promised his grandfather I'd bring him back safe and sound, but now...\
...

READ_TEXT_2000037.ContentEN: ...My dear friend, I'm retiring next year, and I have little confidence that the new head of the Security Bureau will look out for Hypnos' House the way I have all these years. I fear you will need to be even more discreet and cautious moving forward...

READ_TEXT_2000040.ContentEN:
I see the sun sear the earth\
I see birds plummet from the skies\
I see bullet wounds gushing blood\
I see the grave open its dark maw\
I see maggots gnaw at the dead\
I see the Misty Sea whisper in the end\
It beckons, enfolds me\
Guiding me towards eternal nihility

READ_TEXT_2000041.ContentEN:
Name: Psyche Frey\
Age: 17\
Symptoms: Intermittent blindness\
\
...\
When Psyche arrived, her Deterioration had already progressed to the mid-stage. Yet, she greeted everyone with such warmth. I wish I could believe the diagnosis was wrong — that she wasn't suffering from Deterioration, and that her life could somehow get back on track.\
...\
She keeps the flowers her parents brought her by her bedside, even though it leaves her barely any space to sleep or even stand.\
...\
I cleared out a better-lit room on the second floor. Hopefully, Psyche and her flowers will be more comfortable there.\
...\
She really loves flowers. Every day, she tends to them with care and shares them with the other children. If it weren't for the shadow of Deterioration, she would have taken care of the Flower of Solicitude even better than her parents ever did.\
...\
Today, Psyche gave me a flower too. Her peaceful smile reminded me of you, Hayley...\
...\
Psyche saw me frowning over the finances today and wouldn't stop pestering me until I told her about Hypnos' House's financial struggles.\
(Note: Must reply to the buyer soon. Can't let the children keep worrying about this.)\
...\
Psyche cleaned out the old house and even rented it to some kid with a shady background... I just hope that kid doesn't stir up trouble for Hypnos' House.\
...\
<H>Psyche told me she wished to live longer as a human — even if just for one more day. I was both relieved and furious to hear that. I felt relieved because Psyche finally opened up, after trying to be strong for so long.</>\
<H>I felt furious because of that blasted kid! I don't know what that little rascal said to her, but giving false hope to someone who's destined to leave the world soon — that's the cruellest thing one could do.</>\
<H>If you don't have what it takes to save Psyche, then leave her alone!</>\
(Note: The anti-Deterioration drug is nearly ready. Fate... please have mercy on her for once...)\
...

READ_TEXT_2000042.ContentEN:
Name: Elisa Taylor\
Age: 17\
Symptoms: Fading sense of taste\
\
...\
Unlike many of the other children, who cried constantly, Elisa has been eerily calm — almost aloof. When discussing her loss of taste, she dismissively remarked that food was merely sustenance and that flavour meant nothing to her. She even told her mother not to bother bringing her here, stating she'd be fine with a swift end at the hands of the soldiers. Elisa accepted her fate with unsettling tranquility, as if she'd been preparing for death her entire life.\
...\
Elisa seems to enjoy writing. Every day, she sits by the window, scribbling poems. Her poems are cryptic and difficult to understand, but the wording suggests her mental state is far from stable.\
...\
After a long conversation with Psyche, Elisa smiled — a rare sight. Until then, I feared her illness had taken away her ability to smile.\
...

READ_TEXT_2000043.ContentEN:
Name: Hunt Clark\
Age: 18\
Symptoms: Intermittent deafness\
\
...\
Emotionally, Hunt has been relatively stable, largely due to Mia's unwavering support. By the time he arrived, his Deterioration had already reached an advanced stage. Today, when I had to tell him his time was running out, this young man, taller than me, broke down, crying and pleading for a chance at life. He's only eighteen — with loving parents, devoted mentors, and a newfound love. It broke my heart, but I had to steel myself and remind him of the harsh reality: this is his destined fate. In truth, I was preparing to restart trials for an anti-Deterioration drug, but with high risks and no guarantees, I couldn't give him false hope. The cruellest thing in this world isn't despair — it's offering hope, only to take it away later.\
...\
Mia clutched the pocket watch Hunt had given her, tears streaming down her face as she softly hummed a tune, even though Hunt could no longer hear her. He passed away with a faint smile, seemingly at peace. I believe he didn't suffer, but he left so suddenly — before I could find the Crystallo of Stella to complete the drug...

READ_TEXT_20602.ContentEN:
January 1st\
Today, ▇▇▇▇ gave me some Phoxene shards as \

READ_TEXT_20603.ContentEN:
Dear Berry,\
\
If you are reading this letter, it means you've returned after all.\
You've always been a good girl, and I trust you had your reasons for coming back.\
I've left some supplies for you, buried <H>near the airship</> — they should be enough to get you both off Purgatorio Island.\
I wish you the best on your journey. Stay safe.

READ_TEXT_20604.ContentEN:
The Goddess of Fate weaves the stars into their paths, gifting us with guiding lights that lead us towards eternal bliss.\
Yet, in our times, humanity has strayed from Her teachings. We have forsaken the bonds of love and compassion, choosing instead to arm ourselves with cold steel against our own kin. Our sacred lands have crumbled, and even Her sanctuaries have been defiled.\
Should this be the ordeal She has devised — a sombre prelude to the dawn — then to you, the destined one who will one day reach this place, I offer a blessing that transcends time.\
\
In <H>a place overlooked by Her gaze</>, I have hidden the final legacy of an age when humanity cherished love and solidarity.\
May Her tender threads of fate lead you to the true dawn.

READ_TEXT_20605.ContentEN:
Time, ever so precious, slips swiftly by,\
And the changes that ensue leave us with a sigh.\
In the distant corners of memory,\
Beyond the emerald hills and crystal-clear waters,\
Having pierced the veil of countless illusions—\
I am guided by a divine light.\
At the journey's end, the ultimate truth awaits.\
Where trees stand barren and flowers wilt,\
In lands devoid of life and hope,\
Silently, a new cycle takes root.

READ_TEXT_20608.ContentEN:
Sorry, babe, there's been a hiccup at home, so I can't take you to the inner city this month as I promised. But hang tight, I'll come for you as soon as I sort things out. Trust me one more time, okay?\
As a little something to make it up to you, I've hidden some cash <H>under the grass on the left side of the pathway</> to the inner city. Don't forget to pick it up. Love you!\
\
<W>You liar! You jerk! Every time you lie to me, you just throw money at me like I'm some kind of pet you own! I'd rather starve or drop dead in the street than take another coin from you! You can rot with your filthy money for all I care!</>

READ_TEXT_20609.ContentEN:
Hey there! Are you tired of struggling to make ends meet?\
Sick of breaking your back every day for a pittance, only to be treated like dirt?\
Do you feel like, no matter how hard you try, you just can't catch a break?\
Don't beat yourself up — it's not your fault. What you're lacking isn't skill, but a stroke of luck! All you need is the right opportunity, and you could be the next bigshot!\
And guess what? It's your lucky day! Just last month, the chief engineer of our Legendary Mining Alliance unveiled a new mining marvel, ten years in the making! It is user-friendly, boasts an impressive battery life, and the cherry on top — it can automatically extract microscopic Phoxene particles — invisible to the naked eye — and turn them into solid Phoxene! With this revolutionary technology, we can breathe new life into the exhausted mines and bring Icelake's mining industry back from the brink!\
\
We're on the lookout for partners right now! Opportunities like this come once in a lifetime!\
Want in? Solve the puzzle below for a chance to join our elite team!\
\
(Beneath the text is a simple map of the slums with a Phoxene symbol marking a spot — it appears to be near <W>a pile of old junk by the roadside rubbish bin</>.)

READ_TEXT_20610.ContentEN:
Someone found my secret stash last time...\
This time, I consulted a professional, who suggested I hide it somewhere outside the city, perhaps <H>behind a waterfall</>.\
Sure, Phoxene won't go bad in water, but what if the box gets mouldy or rots from the moisture? Then my stash would literally be \

READ_TEXT_20611.ContentEN:
Hey, wanna play a game?\
If you can find the <H>biggest gem</> around here, I'll give you a reward!

READ_TEXT_20612.ContentEN:
<W>There are no 100 pieces of Phoxene here.</>\
\
(Beneath this message, some squiggly lines attempt to outline the mine's paths. The spot marked with a red circle appears to be <H>near the mine's entrance</>.)

READ_TEXT_20613.ContentEN:
I've seen it with my own eyes — blue light coming from <H>under that fallen pillar</>! But they're supposed to be red lights! There's definitely something weird going on!\
It must be haunted by the ghost of some worn-out miner... No wonder no one's bothered to fix it for so long...

READ_TEXT_20614.ContentEN:
Hello, stranger, I am an explorer.\
This cavern is absolutely enchanting, like something out of a fairy tale where snow fairies might live! The massive, crystal-clear ice pillars, the rugged old roots of a withered Heaventree, and the complex terrain that twists and turns like a natural labyrinth... it'll take your breath away!\
If you've made it this far, don't give up now — the scenery up there is even more spectacular! I've left a gift and some provisions for you at the <H>cavern's summit</>. Keep going — you're almost there.\
May you discover the same thrill of adventure that drives me. As long as there's life in you, let the journey never end!

READ_TEXT_20620.ContentEN:
The fortress won't hold much longer... Don't be a fool and stay behind just because of orders. You're not even on the official roster — no one will notice if you're gone.\
There are spare supplies <H>near the airship</>. Take what you need and head home!\
\
(The bottom half of the page is unreadable from dark red splodges.)

READ_TEXT_20621.ContentEN:
Temporary Supply Pick-up Point:\
\
<H>Beneath the control console by the viewing window on the engine room's outer perimeter.</>

RESOURCE_DESC_100.ContentEN:
High-grade Phoxene derived from Phoxene Plumule.\
Like precious metals, they function as common currency across Atlasia, accepted universally for trade.

RESOURCE_DESC_10001.ContentEN: A weathered old bough, snapped by fierce winds, bearing the scars of erosion that seem to have sapped it of all life.

RESOURCE_DESC_10002.ContentEN: Originating from the Hyperborean Empire, powered by Phoxichor, this apparatus generates tremendous gusts. On grand occasions, these artificial winds elevate petals, banners, and the very grandeur of the empire.

RESOURCE_DESC_10003.ContentEN: A butterfly navigating the ocean through air currents. Even in still weather, it can glide across the ocean via the currents generated from flapping its delicate wings — a small marvel with the ability to command the winds.

RESOURCE_DESC_10004.ContentEN: Originating from Huaxu, this colossal and weighty arrow defies even the fiercest storms. One can scarcely conceive who might wield such a bolt, yet its meteor-like trail across the heavens shall be indelibly etched in the memory of any witnesses.

RESOURCE_DESC_10005.ContentEN: Scales from a desert lizard, specially structured to endure scorching heat without harm. This trait adds credence to the fabled kinship between lizards and dragons, though the latter, a creature of beauty, dwells only in the realms of myth and fantasy.

RESOURCE_DESC_10006.ContentEN: The eternal flame of sanctity, a beacon signifying that Khemet endures as long as this fire burns. To the desert folk, offering fire is a gesture of everlasting friendship.

RESOURCE_DESC_10007.ContentEN: Shackles of exceptional make, forged over ages and impervious to heat, crafted to bind even the wildest of captives.

RESOURCE_DESC_10008.ContentEN: A lava stone gradually losing its heat, sheathed in a crust of cooled black rock; one can get fleet glimpses of its subsiding magma inside.

RESOURCE_DESC_10009.ContentEN: Luca's distinctive blue pearls, typically irregularly shaped when harvested from azure shells, the spherical, plump varieties being rarer. Visitors to Luca should beware of cheap, dyed imitations.

RESOURCE_DESC_1001.ContentEN: An hourglass captures not just sand, but the passage of time and cherished memories. It bears witness to countless stories and soothes age-old regrets.

RESOURCE_DESC_10010.ContentEN: Highly absorbent resin, also known as a water-retaining agent, widely used in sectors like agriculture, forestry, horticulture, and construction. Although the Luca people have long utilized similar techniques for fish preservation, systematic study and mass production only started under the aegis of the Empire.

RESOURCE_DESC_10011.ContentEN: Originating from the Hyperborean Empire, this compact water purifier, standard issue for the imperial expeditionary forces, is employed to purify water on the march, safeguarding soldiers' health.

RESOURCE_DESC_10012.ContentEN: Ice harvested from the far north, exceedingly rare and clear as crystal, glinting like dew. Its process of melting and refreezing mirrors the tears on the Creator's lashes.

RESOURCE_DESC_10013.ContentEN: This apparatus channels thunderstorms beneath the earth. It is an innovation from Huaxu, a realm where the yearning for the heavens surpasses terrestrial confines.

RESOURCE_DESC_10014.ContentEN: A special mineral that fell to the ground on a stormy night, with mirror-like facets and subtle purple currents flickering within.

RESOURCE_DESC_10015.ContentEN: Wool of golden hue, reminiscent of mythical treasures. It's true that golden sheep are real, and for those with ample means, their wool can be woven into sweaters. Yet, this golden fleece is susceptible to static, making the wearer spark with movement.

RESOURCE_DESC_10016.ContentEN: Lightning ensnared by the people of Huaxu, continuing its restless dance within the bottle. This craft traces back two centuries to the priest who braved the Thunder Plains alone, anointing himself as the hunter.

RESOURCE_DESC_10017.ContentEN: A monocle that comes with various exquisite chains, favoured by Aethyrie's scholarly elite, hence dubbed \

RESOURCE_DESC_10018.ContentEN: Bestowed by the Elysian Church, adorned only by those of esteemed reverence, its interlaced flowers and foliage represent devotion and allegiance, embodying a faith as pure as gold.

RESOURCE_DESC_10019.ContentEN: An Elysian Church classic, penned in verse for singing. It embodies divine teachings chronicled by pontiffs over the years, an aged print from bygone days.

RESOURCE_DESC_1002.ContentEN:
It's a bit of a mystery why a luno at the age of Snow's Granny has taken a fancy to toy hammers. Perhaps it's a smith's quirk?\
Offering up toy hammers can bump you up the forging schedule. She swears it's just proper respect for the elderly, not bribery!

RESOURCE_DESC_10020.ContentEN: Scales symbolizing equality and justice, essential in the Elysian Church rituals. Should divine favour shift, the scales would tilt. Fortunately, the grace of the Great Nine has remained unchanged.

RESOURCE_DESC_10021.ContentEN: A dagger mottled with rust, its elegant engravings a testament to its owner's nobility; perhaps a personal possession of a soul fallen on ancient battlefields.

RESOURCE_DESC_10022.ContentEN: In Aethyrie, obsidian symbolizes the inspiration of the night. Each Charon scholar from Aethyrie receives this key upon graduation. The significance known only to its bearer.

RESOURCE_DESC_10023.ContentEN: The Selenism, renouncing the Great Nine to embrace the \

RESOURCE_DESC_10024.ContentEN: A sealed vessel originating from the Hyperborean Empire, containing the cellular essence of Filthoids. Before opening, it's an absolute black box, potentially defying expectations but also capable of bringing unforeseen wonders or horrors.

RESOURCE_DESC_1003.ContentEN: An hourglass captures not just sand, but the passage of time and cherished memories. It bears witness to countless stories and soothes age-old regrets.

RESOURCE_DESC_101.ContentEN:
A standard coin used across all of the Atlasia Continent.\
Low in value but essential for daily transactions.

RESOURCE_DESC_1011101.ContentEN:
A sigil for summoning Combat Partners. It is a staff to lean on in a battle, a pact of companionship, and an oath unspoken.\
Heartfelt prayers shall be answered, and the desired one shall appear by your side.

RESOURCE_DESC_102.ContentEN:
Condensed liquid globules designed to empower Demon Wedges. If Daimons are the demons roaming the mortal realm, then this material surely serves as a feast of power dedicated to them.\
Developed by the Hyperborean Spathatoi Alchademy, these globules were inspired by ancient tablets unearthed by the Archaeological Association — the cryptic inscriptions on these tablets are believed to conceal mysterious powers.

RESOURCE_DESC_104.ContentEN: A valuable currency, exchangeable for a variety of rewards.

RESOURCE_DESC_110.ContentEN: Grains of sand rest quietly inside the bottle. To keep them from slipping through your fingers, you've sealed them in glass.

RESOURCE_DESC_12041.ContentEN: Crafted with precision from the blueprint of Lilac Rifle. Sturdy and robust, it doubles effectively as a blunt instrument or a throwable weapon when out of bullets.

RESOURCE_DESC_12064.ContentEN: Crafted with precision from the blueprint of Arclight Apocalypses. Like a tightly coiled spring, a mere touch on the string is enough to unleash a torrent of pent-up energy.

RESOURCE_DESC_12065.ContentEN: Crafted with precision from the blueprint of Arclight Apocalypses. The graceful curve not only withstands immense stress but also enhances the bow's resilience, ensuring efficient and precise energy transfer.

RESOURCE_DESC_12066.ContentEN: Crafted with precision from the blueprint of Arclight Apocalypses. The graceful curve not only withstands immense stress but also enhances the bow's resilience, ensuring efficient and precise energy transfer.

RESOURCE_DESC_12067.ContentEN: Crafted with precision from the blueprint of Arclight Apocalypses. With an ideal blend of rigidity and flexibility, it balances precision and strength, steering each arrow with the accuracy of a seasoned navigator, calibrating its trajectory.

RESOURCE_DESC_19000.ContentEN: Interwoven emotions converge in this realm, weaving a tapestry of myriad minds.

RESOURCE_DESC_19001.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Joy is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19002.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Sorrow is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19003.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Fear is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19004.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Anger is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19005.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Trust is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19006.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Inner Peace is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19007.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Confusion is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_19008.ContentEN: In this realm where emotions converge, here, Desire is woven.

RESOURCE_DESC_200.ContentEN: A highly valuable ornate statue specially designed for holding Crystallo.

RESOURCE_DESC_20001.ContentEN: Keratin grown from the skin of Filthoids, forming their hardest armor. Processed with special techniques, it can be used for protection in weapons and armor.

RESOURCE_DESC_20002.ContentEN: A shattered Sal Volatile bottle with deep scratches and bullet holes. Its contents leaked out but the glass bottle can be recycled.

RESOURCE_DESC_20003.ContentEN: Cleansing Water used by the Elysian Church devotees to cleanse their hands before ceremonies, usually kept in blessed containers inside temples.

RESOURCE_DESC_20004.ContentEN: Carried by Hyperborean soldiers, engraved with their name, rank, legion, and enlistment date. If a soldier falls in battle, their legion uses the name plate to identify them, and it is sent back to their hometown as a mark of honour.

RESOURCE_DESC_20005.ContentEN: Natural stone powder, commonly used as a consumable in alchemy and construction. The type of ore varies in color due to geographical differences, making it a primary material for paint pigments.

RESOURCE_DESC_20006.ContentEN: Parchment scrolls carried by Elysian knights, inscribed with blessings and prayers. Knights draw strength from these blessings in battle.

RESOURCE_DESC_20007.ContentEN:
A roll of cable with a Hyperborean mark, collected in a somewhat brutal way. \
Be careful of electric shocks before the sparks die out.

RESOURCE_DESC_20008.ContentEN: Solid crystals harvested from rare Filthoids. Commonly used for intricate research into the biology of these enigmatic creatures.

RESOURCE_DESC_20009.ContentEN:
Common wild plants. The flowers are usually muti-petaled, bright red, and glossy. They are hardy, drought-resistant, and adaptable, hence widespread across the continent. \
They are said to be the tears Father Ask shed for the deceased Mother Embla during his journey to find her in Charon's mythology.

RESOURCE_DESC_2001.ContentEN: It's the testament to your journey through thick and thin, the echoes of your laughter and tears, and the essence of your hard-earned wisdom — remember? You are neither frail nor alone.

RESOURCE_DESC_20010.ContentEN:
A creeping plant commonly found in shaded areas, highly flexible with intertwined fibers. After processing, they are used in various applications, and they are durable and resistant to wear. \
Said to be the inspiration for cable design.

RESOURCE_DESC_20011.ContentEN: A thick grease extracted from Filthoids. Its viscosity often correlates with the Filthoid's strength.

RESOURCE_DESC_20012.ContentEN: Produced from the Elysian Church. Their knight's standard attire has a fine chainmail made of numerous delicate chains. The clanking of the chainmail is the best declaration of battle as the knights march.

RESOURCE_DESC_20013.ContentEN: A currency unique to the Lunos, often given as a thank-you gift by those seeking help.

RESOURCE_DESC_20014.ContentEN: Snowswift is a bird native to cold regions, commonly seen around Icelake. Known for their blistering speed in flight, these elusive creatures are rarely spotted by the naked eye, except during snowfalls when they perch quietly on branches or nestle in their nests. Historically, their tough feathers were prized for crafting traditional quills. Today, however, only a handful of traditionalists and those less fortunate continue to use these economical, albeit less durable, feather pens.

RESOURCE_DESC_20015.ContentEN: A replaceable metal armor from the Hyperborean Empire on soldiers' standard uniforms, usually fitted at joints, with excellent shock resistance, and has been mass-produced. Two spare armors are now standard for a Hyperborean Assault Soldier.

RESOURCE_DESC_20016.ContentEN: Produced from the Elysian Church, a shield-shaped ornament worn by the Elysian Church soldiers. It's believed to be imbued with divine blessings, symbolizing the will to protect the church.

RESOURCE_DESC_20017.ContentEN: Produced from Hyperborea. Ensuring the legion's mobility has always been a key subject to the Aeolipile. Vehicle armor, serving as an external accessory, withstands extreme weather and allows the vehicle to hold up longer under gunfire. It can be quickly removed for full-speed advance.

RESOURCE_DESC_20018.ContentEN:
The Statue of the Goddess of Fate built by the Elysian Church, now too damaged to discern its original form, but still exuding elegance among its ruins. \
Over time, new sprouts grow here. Under the decoration of vitality, myths never seem to fade.

RESOURCE_DESC_20019.ContentEN: A concentrated combustion aid developed by the Alchemy Academy. A pungent, colorless liquid dyed red to denote danger. Used only in military or industrial settings. A few spoonfuls can send a fireplace's flames roaring up the chimney, and that's definitely an unwanted spectacle.

RESOURCE_DESC_20020.ContentEN: A common industrial material. A viscous white latex-like liquid that maintains a balance in temperature. Given the unpredictability of terrain and climate on adventures, carrying a few cans is wise. The manufacturer recently introduced fruit and floral scents, so consumers are hereby warned to beware of accidental ingestion.

RESOURCE_DESC_20021.ContentEN: Candles used in church ceremonies, accompanied by devoutly crafted candlesticks. Though their burn time is brief, their light suffices to illuminate the face of divine.

RESOURCE_DESC_20022.ContentEN:
One of the alchemical products of the Hyperborean Empire. A liquid metal that seems like it could flow through your fingers at any moment. Made using a complex purification process. It's usually employed in the military industry.\
If you can't handle their melting point, it is recommended not to heat them recklessly.

RESOURCE_DESC_20023.ContentEN: A special product from the other side of the desert. It can be crafted into exquisite decorations or used to strengthen components. The final quality depends on how much real sand gets mixed in during transportation—since it is hard to distinguish between the two, deal with trusted merchants if necessary.

RESOURCE_DESC_20024.ContentEN:
A tentacle obtained from Filthoids, must be cleaned of mucus before use. They are very tough and have strong adhesive properties, sometimes used as fixation devices. \
\
These walking materials are everywhere, but not many can make them lie still on the chopping board.

RESOURCE_DESC_20025.ContentEN: A precision instrument made by the Hyperborean Empire, still intact despite being covered in scratches and pry marks.

RESOURCE_DESC_20026.ContentEN:
A book with intricate decorations, appears to be a valuable collection of poems, but is actually a codebook for deciphering internal legion radio communications. \
Unfortunately, the inner pages are damaged, leaving only some irrelevant secret codes that can't really be used to decrypt telegrams.

RESOURCE_DESC_20027.ContentEN: Produced from the Elysian Church, a honey-like oily liquid that increases the sharpness of cold weapons and also maintains firearms. Almost every soldier of the assembly carries a few bottles with them, and during breaks, they can be seen carefully applying the potion to their weapons and silently reciting prayers for repelling enemies.

RESOURCE_DESC_20028.ContentEN: Produced from the Hyperborean Empire, a type of modified bullet that can explode. Equipped with a variety of interchangeable heads for different functional needs, experts can use different bullet characteristics to explode exactly where they want.

RESOURCE_DESC_20029.ContentEN: A widely used auxiliary bracket equipped with various clasps for a stable structure, allowing craftsmen to fix weapons on it for adjustment.

RESOURCE_DESC_20030.ContentEN: A specialized spraying device for equipment, used to uniformly apply rust-proofing agents to extend the durability of equipment, and increase the performance of some weapons. Mixing it up with serum injectors can have severe consequences, so it must be used with caution.

RESOURCE_DESC_20031.ContentEN: A polymer made from the concentrated tissues of Filthoids, resembling a tumor and surrounded by some tentacles, supposedly. The methods of producing and using Filthoid polymers apparently originated from the Spathatoi.

RESOURCE_DESC_20032.ContentEN: A cold liquid collected from the north, stored in special containers. Even at room temperature, ice crystals form on the surface of the container. This notion, often found in poetry, is now used as a coolant.

RESOURCE_DESC_20033.ContentEN:
A sigil for cancelling summons.\
The companionship might be fleeting, yet the friendship endures. Perhaps the next reunion is merely a heartbeat away.

RESOURCE_DESC_2007.ContentEN: A book about the use of weapons, it looks very thick, and this accumulation will turn into your strength.

RESOURCE_DESC_201.ContentEN: Produced from the Hyperborean Empire, a precision instrument very similar to a toolbox. When its gears start to move, the Demon Wedge placed inside will be modified to better suit the user's state. Because it acts directly on the user, this style has higher precision, and after use, it can further enhance the user's abilities.

RESOURCE_DESC_2011.ContentEN: A single sheet of music, recording heroic epics passed among minstrels, filled with many handwritten annotations and modifications. To fully express their views, poets didn't hesitate to use tiny writing to exchange and debate in every blank space on the paper, where numerous perspectives are established and then overturned, making reading the entire piece a thrilling experience.

RESOURCE_DESC_202.ContentEN: Produced from the Hyperborean Empire, a precision instrument very similar to a toolbox. When its gears start to move, the Demon Wedge placed inside will be modified to better suit the user's state. This style has good detection capabilities for various types of weapons, and its use can further increase the weapon's abilities.

RESOURCE_DESC_203.ContentEN: Everything is destined to burn, to be devoured and reduced to ashes, ultimately sinking into the abyss.

RESOURCE_DESC_204.ContentEN: An energy booster developed by the Alchemy Academy of Hyperborea, commonly found in military packs.

RESOURCE_DESC_205.ContentEN: What remains of a forebear's shattered lantern, the holy blessings bestowed on it long since eroded by the abyss.

RESOURCE_DESC_20500.ContentEN: A little key that someone left behind. It can be used to open a locked chest.

RESOURCE_DESC_20510.ContentEN: Judging from its texture, it seems to be a fragment coming from the Statue of the Goddess of Fate in Arcane Ruins of Purgatorio Island. Maybe something good would happen once it's used to fix the statue.

RESOURCE_DESC_20511.ContentEN: Primitive ores scattered in the wild; might be somewhat valuable with some forging.

RESOURCE_DESC_20512.ContentEN: A silver coin without owner. It's hard to find its owner.

RESOURCE_DESC_20513.ContentEN: Though not precious in the eyes of the refining market, these clear and sparkling ores hold the heart's true value, which can become the first piece of jewelry given to a beloved one.

RESOURCE_DESC_20514.ContentEN: An old shield. It was discarded for no reason.

RESOURCE_DESC_20515.ContentEN: A long lost medal. Its former owner once used it to exchange current coins.

RESOURCE_DESC_20516.ContentEN: When it comes to waste items, the first things that always come to mind are empty bottles and cans. Collecting a small amount and selling them can help people maintain basic food and clothing, but that's all it can do.

RESOURCE_DESC_20517.ContentEN: It can be used to make simple tools or for heating, the most basic things for survival in the wilderness.

RESOURCE_DESC_20518.ContentEN: A gemstone that has rested on the hand of a goddess statue on Purgatorio Island for a very long time. If it could speak, it would surely have many stories to tell, but it is, in fact, just a radiant and splendid gem.

RESOURCE_DESC_206.ContentEN:
The commissions from the Noctoyager Manual offer a 300% increase in rewards compared to regular ones.\
As your team, The Noctoyagers, gains prominence among the Phoxhunters, the number of commissions you are entrusted with grows. While this entails heavier responsibilities, it also leads to more rewarding payouts.

RESOURCE_DESC_207.ContentEN:
The commissions from the Noctoyager Manual offer a 1000% increase in rewards compared to regular ones.\
As your team, The Noctoyagers, gains prominence among the Phoxhunters, the number of commissions you are entrusted with grows. While this entails heavier responsibilities, it also leads to more rewarding payouts.

RESOURCE_DESC_208.ContentEN:
The commissions from the Noctoyager Manual offer a 2000% increase in rewards compared to regular ones.\
As your team, The Noctoyagers, gains prominence among the Phoxhunters, the number of commissions you are entrusted with grows. While this entails heavier responsibilities, it also leads to more rewarding payouts.

RESOURCE_DESC_209.ContentEN:
The commissions from the Noctoyager Manual offer a 5000% increase in rewards compared to regular ones.\
As your team, The Noctoyagers, gains prominence among the Phoxhunters, the number of commissions you are entrusted with grows. While this entails heavier responsibilities, it also leads to more rewarding payouts.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000001.ContentEN: A box of paper stars crafted from expired tickets. It's said that a certain number of these can bless one's wishes and dreams, though this seems not to be the case.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000002.ContentEN: A piece of worn clothing, hiding a palm-sized diary within its thin lining. The name \

RESOURCE_DESC_3000003.ContentEN: A worn adventure novel depicting the protagonist and his lean horse conquering a castle to find treasure.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000004.ContentEN: A wire sculpture of Berenica in profile, skillfully capturing her defining features.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000005.ContentEN: A standard-issue medical kit used by the Legion. It contains the essentials for treating minor battlefield injuries, but offers little help for more severe trauma.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000006.ContentEN: A cherished keepsake Avar always carries, showing him with his daughter Daphne as a child. Though yellowed with age, their bright smiles remain unmistakable.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000007.ContentEN: Once a cherished keepsake Avar carried with him, featuring a blissful moment of him with his daughter Daphne as a child. Now, their bright smiles are smeared by dark, dried bloodstains.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000008.ContentEN: A flower given to you by Psyche, with the warmth of her touch still lingering on the stem.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000009.ContentEN: A seemingly simple prescription that conceals a dangerous secret — seditious text hidden on the back. If ever discovered by Imperial eyes, it could spell disaster.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000010.ContentEN: An abstract portrait gifted to you by Faye, who insists it's your likeness. The interplay of red and white might vaguely suggest a human form, gender indistinguishable, but if Faye sees you in it, then so be it. Perhaps the aesthetic sensibilities of Inner City denizens are an acquired taste.

RESOURCE_DESC_3000011.ContentEN: An intricately crafted key, oddly familiar yet unplaceable. Its origin remains elusive, but perhaps one day, at the right moment, it will unlock a long-buried secret.

RESOURCE_DESC_30001.ContentEN: Gelatinous substance for crafting Track-Shift Modules. With a pure, water-soluble composition that deactivates at high temperatures, it demands exacting storage conditions. Its utility makes it worth carrying though.

RESOURCE_DESC_30002.ContentEN: Material for crafting Weapon Track-Shift Modules. These specially treated magnets respond to diverse metal components at unique frequencies, allowing seasoned users to discern the most subtle irregularities in weaponry through their vibrations.

RESOURCE_DESC_3001.ContentEN:
Used for re-rolling following a failed Impression Check in Hyperborea.\
Human interactions are invariably fraught with difficulties. Face them head-on and try again.

RESOURCE_DESC_3002.ContentEN:
A treat favoured by Geniemons, ideal for their capture.\
True to its name, if these creatures could speak, they would surely exclaim, \

RESOURCE_DESC_3003.ContentEN:
A treat most-favoured by Geniemons, ideal for their capture.\
True to its name, if these creatures could speak, they would surely exclaim, \

RESOURCE_DESC_30101.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of the waters of Lamenting Lake.

RESOURCE_DESC_30102.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of sea salt.

RESOURCE_DESC_30103.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of timber.

RESOURCE_DESC_30104.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of peas.

RESOURCE_DESC_30105.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of dunes.

RESOURCE_DESC_30106.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of red clay.

RESOURCE_DESC_30107.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of rouge.

RESOURCE_DESC_30108.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of the feathers of a raven.

RESOURCE_DESC_30109.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues akin to those of a thunderstorm on the horizon.

RESOURCE_DESC_30110.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues as mesmerizing as the galaxy.

RESOURCE_DESC_30111.ContentEN: A dye made by blending various raw materials, capable of producing hues reminiscent of wheat fields.

RESOURCE_DESC_40001.ContentEN: A vial of Sal Volatile, an essential in any first aid kit. In moments of faintness from illness or pain, it can grant a brief lucidity.

RESOURCE_DESC_40003.ContentEN: A supply crate brimming with bullets, which both saves and ends lives on the battlefield.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010001.ContentEN: A subspecies of butterfly in Atlasia, its verdant hue heralds the arrival of spring.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010002.ContentEN: A subspecies of butterfly in Atlasia, its indigo hue is pure and striking.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010003.ContentEN: This clear, tasteless spring water is believed to be a divine gift in Elysium, said to cleanse the soul and wash away worldly impurities.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010004.ContentEN:
A type of fungus capable of surviving in extreme cold. Its appearance often leads people to mistake it for a pile of unmelted snow. Its toxins can cause hallucinations if ingested, and in severe cases, can be life-threatening.\
\
DO NOT EAT! DO NOT EAT! DO NOT EAT!

RESOURCE_DESC_4010005.ContentEN: A liquid derived primarily from Phoxene, serving as the most important energy source powering the entire Hyperborean Empire. Its uses extend far beyond what is commonly known.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010006.ContentEN: A common flower found across Atlasia, used in both medicine and as a natural dye.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010007.ContentEN: Shells are washed up on the beach every day, but finding one intact and vibrantly coloured is always a small stroke of luck.

RESOURCE_DESC_4010008.ContentEN: This cold-loving freshwater plant is known as the \

RESOURCE_DESC_4020001.ContentEN: Sizable brown nuts, also edible — if one can crack their rock-hard shell like a rodent.

RESOURCE_DESC_4020002.ContentEN: A rarer variant of Ironshell Nuts, also edible. They are richer in oil content than the common variety. When roasted, they burst open, making them a popular snack among kids.

RESOURCE_DESC_4020003.ContentEN: A silvery mineral with a metallic lustre that ranges from black to silver depending on its purity. It is widely used in the manufacture of dyes and pigments.

RESOURCE_DESC_4020004.ContentEN: A rarer variant of Silverite, mixed with impurities that unexpectedly enhance its lustre. It is widely used in the manufacture of dyes and pigments.

RESOURCE_DESC_5000000.TextMapContent: 可用作稀有魔之楔的强化

RESOURCE_DESC_ACTION.ContentEN: A standby animation that can be equipped to your Tactical Backpack.

RESOURCE_DESC_CANCELPHANTOM.ContentEN:
A sigil for retracting a summoning. \
Although the gathering is brief, the longing does not cease, and perhaps the next reunion is just a blink away.

RESOURCE_DESC_PHANTOM.ContentEN:
A sigil for summoning Combat Partners. It is a staff to lean on in a battle, a pact of companionship, and an oath unspoken.\
Heartfelt prayers shall be answered, and the desired one shall appear by your side.

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_30001.ContentEN: Can be used for crafting Track-Shift Modules

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_30002.ContentEN: Can be used for crafting Weapon Track-Shift Modules

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_BONUSTICKET.ContentEN: Used for Commissions in Noctoyager Mannual.

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_CHARPOL.ContentEN: Adjusts Character Demon Wedge Slot Track

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_DYE.ContentEN: Changes the colour of specific items

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_INVITE.ContentEN: Unlocks Sojourns in Ripples of Talk

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_TIANFUCOIN.ContentEN: Lights up the blessings of the Lantern in Maze of Missteps

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_WEAPONPOL.ContentEN: Adjusts Weapon Demon Wedge Slot Track

RESOURCE_FUNCTION_ZHUIMI.ContentEN: Grants one chance of Chrono Retrace.

RESOURCE_NAME_41005.ContentEN: Cat in a Box - Leaden Grey

RESOURCE_NAME_41006.ContentEN: Cat in a Box - White Sakura

RESOURCE_TEXT_104.ContentEN: A priceless gift for participants of the 1st Closed Beta Test.

RESOURCE_TEXT_19000.ContentEN: The spectrum of human emotions is born from our journeys, which, with the passage of time, gently fade into recollections. When the mood is aptly set, the mere presence of a token can conjure the memories it holds, bringing them to life before us.

RESOURCE_TEXT_19001.ContentEN: The spectrum of human emotions is born from our journeys, which, with the passage of time, gently fade into recollections. When the mood is aptly set, the mere presence of a token can conjure the memories it holds, bringing them to life before us.

RESOURCE_TEXT_2001.ContentEN:
Go to them, find solace amongst the banished souls.\
Endure the twilight's cleansing, navigate through the boundless gloom,\
Together, towards the dawn of a new day.\
— ???

RESOURCE_TEXT_20026.ContentEN:
Once you've familiarised yourself with the info, you might get rid of the used pages and repurpose the rest as a regular notebook.\
\
\

RESOURCE_TEXT_20033.ContentEN:
Child, do not revel in companionship nor weep at parting, for we are but fleeting moments in time.\
\
— Lady Nifl, Ferrywoman of the Misty Sea

RESOURCE_TEXT_30002.ContentEN:
How fascinating! These little parts might seem dull to you at the moment, but once the fuse is lit, they will roar in the most spectacular way! \
\
— Oliver, Bomb Expert

RESOURCE_TEXT_5000000.TextMapContent: 分解魔之楔后获得的稀有材料

RLBlessing_Desc_101.ContentEN:
<Highlight>Normal Attack</> from melee weapons deals <Highlight>$1</> more damage, with a <Highlight>$2</> chance to inflict 1 stack of <Highlight>Pyroclasm</> on the target(s) for <Highlight>$3</>s, up to <Highlight>20</> stacks.\
<Highlight>[Pyroclasm]</>: Increases Damage Taken by <Highlight>5%</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_102.ContentEN:
<Highlight>Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, and Sliding Attack</> from melee weapons deal <Highlight>$1</> more damage, with a <Highlight>$2</> chance to inflict 1 stack of <Highlight>Pyroclasm</> on the target(s) for <Highlight>$3</>s, up to <Highlight>20</> stacks.\
<Highlight>[Pyroclasm]</>: Increases Damage Taken by <Highlight>5%</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_103.ContentEN: Restores <Highlight>$1</> HP for each enemy defeated within an <Highlight>8-metre</> radius around the character.

RLBlessing_Desc_104.ContentEN: Each Melee Weapon attack deals an additional damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1</> of the attack damage. It deals higher additional damage when performing <Highlight>Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, and Sliding Attack</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_105.ContentEN:
Every <Highlight>$1</>s, inflicts 1 stack of <Highlight>Pyroclasm</> on target(s) within an <Highlight>8</>-metre radius for <Highlight>$2</>s, up to <Highlight>20</> stacks.\
<Highlight>[Pyroclasm]</>: Increases Damage Taken by <Highlight>5%</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_106.ContentEN: Melee Weapon attack deals an additional damage equivalent to <Highlight>$2</> of the attack damage when the attack causes the target's HP to drop below <Highlight>$1</>. This effect can trigger once every <Highlight>$3</>s on the same target.

RLBlessing_Desc_107.ContentEN: The fewer enemies within an <Highlight>8</>-metre radius around your character, the higher the damage, up to a maximum of <Highlight>$1</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_108.ContentEN:
Can no longer acquire projectiles from Ammo Supply Chests.\
Melee Weapon Damage <Highlight>+$1</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_109.ContentEN:
Melee Weapon attack has a <Highlight>$1</> chance to inflict <Highlight>$2</> stacks of <Highlight>Pyroclasm</> on the target(s) for <Highlight>$3</>s, up to <Highlight>20</> stacks. CD: <Highlight>$4</>s.\
<Highlight>[Pyroclasm]</>: Increases Damage Taken by <Highlight>5%</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_110.ContentEN: Melee Weapons deal <Highlight>$2</> more damage against target(s) inflicted with more than <Highlight>$1</> stacks of <Highlight>Pyroclasm</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_111.ContentEN: Increases Melee Weapon damage based on your combo level. Each combo level boosts damage by <Highlight>$1</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_201.ContentEN: There is a <Highlight>#1</> chance not to consume Ammo when reloading.

RLBlessing_Desc_202.ContentEN: Every <Highlight>$1</>s, the next shot from any Ranged Weapon deals <Highlight>$2</> more damage.

RLBlessing_Desc_203.ContentEN: Reduces Damage Taken by <Highlight>$1</> for <Highlight>$2</>s when reloading.

RLBlessing_Desc_204.ContentEN: Successfully picking up any loot increases Ranged Weapon Damage by <Highlight>$1</> for <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_205.ContentEN: Successful pickup of any loot restores <Highlight>$1</> points of <Highlight>HP</> and <Highlight>$2</> points of <Highlight>Sanity</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_206.ContentEN: Increases Auto-Pickup Range. After each pick-up, grants immunity to Hitstun for <Highlight>$1</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_207.ContentEN: Ranged Weapon attacks have a <Highlight>$1</> chance to generate an Ammo Supply Chest.

RLBlessing_Desc_208.ContentEN: Melee Weapon Damage <Highlight>-$1</>, but Ranged Weapon CRIT Chance <Highlight>+#1</> and CRIT Damage <Highlight>+#2</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_209.ContentEN: Ranged Weapon attack has a <Highlight>$1</> chance to shoot <Highlight>3</> hydro projectiles, each dealing damage equivalent to <Highlight>$2 of the character's Attack</>. CD: <Highlight>$3</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_210.ContentEN: After reloading, increases the first hit damage dealt by any Ranged Weapon by <Highlight>$1</>. CD: <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_211.ContentEN: For targets more than <Highlight>8 metres</> away, the more times they are hit by Ranged Weapons, the higher damage they take from Ranged Weapons, up to a maximum of <Highlight>$1</> boost.

RLBlessing_Desc_308.ContentEN: Highly increases Max HP and Max Shield

RLBlessing_Desc_406.ContentEN: Character's Umbro ATK +<Highlight>#1</>. Upon landing from a height, deals Smash Damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1</> of the character's Attack to nearby enemies.

RLBlessing_Desc_501.ContentEN: Increases characters' Helix Leap Speed by <Highlight>$1</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_502.ContentEN: After performing Dodge or Helix Leap, releases a shockwave on the spot, dealing damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1 of the character's Attack</>. CD: <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_503.ContentEN: When hitting a target with a ranged weapon, there is a <Highlight>$1</> chance to slow down the target by <Highlight>30%</> for <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_504.ContentEN: When performing Helix Leap, increases overall damage by <Highlight>$1</> for <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_505.ContentEN: Damage <Highlight>+$1</>. For every <Highlight>1%</> increase in Helix Leap Speed, additionally increases Damage by <Highlight>+$2</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_506.ContentEN: Upon performing Helix Leap, fires <Highlight>3</> Anemo projectiles at the nearest Abyssoid(s), each dealing damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1 of the character's Attack</>. CD: <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_507.ContentEN: Melee Weapon attack has a <Highlight>$1</> chance to generate <Highlight>1</> wind field, dealing damage equivalent to <Highlight>$2 of the character's Attack</> to enemies within an <Highlight>8-metre</> radius.

RLBlessing_Desc_508.ContentEN: Performing Helix Leap can deals damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1 of the character's Attack</>. CD: <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_509.ContentEN: After performing Dodge or Helix Leap, there's a <Highlight>$1</> chance to release an enhanced Anemo projectile, immobilising the Abyssoid(s) for <Highlight>5</>s. Against control-immune Abyssoid(s), deals damage equivalent to <Highlight>$2 of the character's Attack</>. CD: <Highlight>$3</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_510.ContentEN: Anemo projectiles generated by performing Helix Leap have <Highlight>much stronger Stance Weakening effects</>, and deal <Highlight>$1</> more damage to control-immune enemies.

RLBlessing_Desc_511.ContentEN: Nocturne Moth Lampwicks deal <Highlight>$1</> more damage.

RLBlessing_Desc_601.ContentEN: Weapon attacks have a <Highlight>$1</> chance (halved for Ranged Weapons) to spawn <Highlight>1</> [Glimmerfly]. Up to <Highlight>3</> [Glimmerflies] can exist at the same time, each lasting for <Highlight>30</>s, auto-targeting enemies to deal damage equivalent to <Highlight>1000% of the character's Attack</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_602.ContentEN: Every <Highlight>$1</>s, spawns <Highlight>1</> [Glimmerfly]. Up to <Highlight>3</> [Glimmerflies] can exist at the same time, each lasting for <Highlight>30</>s, auto-targeting enemies to deal damage equivalent to <Highlight>1000% of the character's Attack</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_603.ContentEN: When taking damage, there's a <Highlight>$1</> chance to spawn <Highlight>1</> [Glimmerfly]. Up to <Highlight>3</> [Glimmerflies] can exist at the same time, each lasting for <Highlight>30</>s, auto-targeting and dealing damage equivalent to <Highlight>1000% of the character's Attack</> to the enemies.

RLBlessing_Desc_604.ContentEN:
Reduces Damage Taken by <Highlight>$1</> when not having any [Glimmerflies].\
With at least 1 [Glimmerfly] present, reduces Damage Taken by <Highlight>$2</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_606.ContentEN: Upon disappearing, [Glimmerfly] unleashes a powerful attack to the target(s), dealing damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1 of the character's Attack</> with a <Highlight>4</>-metre AoE.

RLBlessing_Desc_607.ContentEN: [Glimmerfly] attacks become AoE attacks. Their explosions deal damage equivalent to <Highlight>$1 of the character's Attack</> to enemies within a <Highlight>2</>-metre radius.

RLBlessing_Desc_608.ContentEN: With at least 1 [Glimmerfly] present, increases damage by <Highlight>$1</>, until no [Glimmerflies] remain.

RLBlessing_Desc_609.ContentEN: When <Highlight>3</> or more [Glimmerflies] are present, their attack interval is greatly shortened for <Highlight>$1</>s. CD: <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_611.ContentEN: Increases Damage Taken of target attacked by [Glimmerfly] by <Highlight>$1</> for <Highlight>5</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_701.ContentEN: When taking damage at below <Highlight>$1</> HP, Damage Taken <Highlight>-$2</> for <Highlight>$3</>s. CD: <Highlight>$4</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_702.ContentEN: After taking damage, the next <Highlight>1</> attack deals <Highlight>$1</> more damage. CD: <Highlight>$2</>s.

RLBlessing_Desc_703.ContentEN: Each enemy defeated increases Max HP by <Highlight>$1</>, up to a maximum of <Highlight>$2</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_704.ContentEN: At below <Highlight>$1</> Max HP, restores <Highlight>$2</> points of Sanity every <Highlight>2s</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_705.ContentEN: Being attacked when HP is below <Highlight>$1</> or taking damage that causes an HP loss higher than <Highlight>$2</> of Max HP restores <Highlight>$3</> of Max HP per second for <Highlight>$4</>s. This effect is not stackable.

RLBlessing_Desc_706.ContentEN: At below <Highlight>70%</> Max HP, for every <Highlight>10%</> HP loss, increases damage by <Highlight>$1</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_707.ContentEN: Using character skill instantly restores <Highlight>$1</> of Max HP.

RLBlessing_Desc_708.ContentEN: Max damage taken per hit will not exceed <Highlight>#1</> of Max HP.

RLBlessing_Desc_709.ContentEN: When taking damage, gain the following effects for <Highlight>$1</>s: Max HP +<Highlight>100%</>; for every <Highlight>$2</> Max HP, increases damage by <Highlight>1%</>, up to a maximum of <Highlight>$3</> boost. CD: <Highlight>$4s</>.

RLBlessing_Desc_710.ContentEN: Every <Highlight>$1</>s, deals damage equivalent to <Highlight>$2</> of the Lampwick owner's Max HP to enemies within a <Highlight>12-metre</> radius.

RLBlessing_Desc_711.ContentEN: At above <Highlight>$1</> Max HP, loses <Highlight>$2</> HP per second; otherwise, restores <Highlight>$3</> HP per second and increases the effect of <Highlight>Berserker</> by <Highlight>#1</>.

RLTalent_Desc_207.ContentEN: Grants <Highlight>200</> Embers at the start of a new exploration

RLTalent_Desc_208.ContentEN: Grants <Highlight>1 Blue or Purple-tier Artefact</> of your choice at the start of a new exploration

RLTreasure_Desc_10101.ContentEN: Gain <Highlight>1</> additional [Refresh] attempt when selecting a Lampwick.

RLTreasure_Desc_10103.ContentEN: When HP drops below <Highlight>30%</>, immune to Hitstun, and Damage Taken <Highlight>-50%</> for <Highlight>3</>s. This effect can be triggered once every <Highlight>30</>s.

RLTreasure_Desc_10104.ContentEN: Each enemy defeated restores HP equivalent to <Highlight>2%</> Max HP.

RLTreasure_Desc_10105.ContentEN: The holder of this pass enjoys a <Highlight>20%</> discount at the Mysterious Merchant's stall.

RLTreasure_Desc_10201.ContentEN: Increases Melee Weapon damage by <Highlight>15%</>. Each hit from Charged Attack or Plunging Attack further increases the damage bonus by <Highlight>1%</>, up to a maximum of <Highlight>60%</>.

RLTreasure_Desc_10202.ContentEN: Increases Ranged Weapon damage by <Highlight>15%</>. Further increases the damage bonus by <Highlight>1%</> when shooting in mid-air, up to a maximum of <Highlight>60%</>.
