RLTreasure_Desc_10301.ContentEN: Gain 1 stack that increases Damage Skill by <Highlight>2.5%</> every time more than <Highlight>5</> points of Sanity is consumed, up to 50 stacks. This effect lasts throughout the battle.

RLTreasure_Desc_10303.ContentEN: Gain <Highlight>2</> Artefacts of either <Highlight>Blue-tier</> or <Highlight>Purple-tier</> Artefacts.

RLTreasure_Desc_10304.ContentEN: A legendary scholar's Artefact that significantly boosts the CRIT Chance of Ranged Weapons.

RLTreasure_Desc_11101.ContentEN:
<Highlight>Damage +50%</>, but Skill Efficiency <Highlight>-50%</>.\
After collecting the full set (<Highlight>4</> pieces) of the Penitent Knight's Artefacts, the penalty is removed, and each Artefact additionally <Highlight>increases Damage by 50%</>.

RLTreasure_Desc_11201.ContentEN: <Highlight>Damage +75%</>, but Melee Weapon Damage <Highlight>-50%</>. After collecting the full set (<Highlight>4</> pieces) of the Penitent Knight's Artefacts, the penalty is removed, and each Artefact additionally <Highlight>increases Damage by 50%</>.

RLTreasure_Desc_11202.ContentEN: <Highlight>Damage +75%</>, but Ranged Weapon Damage <Highlight>-50%</>. After collecting the full set (<Highlight>4</> pieces) of the Penitent Knight's Artefacts, the penalty is removed, and each Artefact additionally <Highlight>increases Damage by 50%</>.

RLTreasure_Desc_11301.ContentEN: <Highlight>Damage +100%</>, but Damage Taken <Highlight>+50%</>. After collecting the full set (<Highlight>4</> pieces) of the Penitent Knight's Artefacts, the penalty is removed, and each Artefact additionally <Highlight>increases Damage by 50%</>.

RL_Event307_Select_2.ContentEN: Gain 1 <Highlight>Blue-tier Artefact</> or <Highlight>Purple-tier Artefact</> and <Highlight>200 Embers</>

RougeLike_Room_B_Fail.ContentEN: You have been consumed by the Abyssoids

RougeLike_Room_EB_Fail.ContentEN: You have been consumed by the Abyssoids

SKILL_10101_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing CRIT Damage with this weapon, there is a <H>#2</> chance to restore <H>#1</> point of Sanity.

SKILL_10102_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Range +<H>#1</>. When a Lumino character deals additional damage with any weapon, there is a <H>#2</> chance to grant nearby teammate(s) 1 stack that increases CRIT Damage by <H>#3</> for <H>#4</> seconds, up to <H>#5</> stacks. This effect can only be triggered once every second.

SKILL_10103_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing Charged Attack using this weapon, there is a <H>#1</> chance to not consume any Combo Points.

SKILL_10104_DESC.ContentEN: DEF +<H>#1</>. When triggering Bonus Effects using this weapon, there's a <H>#3</> chance to reduce the target's Shield by <H>#2</> of the user's DEF.

SKILL_10105_DESC.ContentEN: When performing Charged Attack using this weapon, there is a <H>#1</> chance to decrease the CD of Resonance Support by <H>#2</>s.

SKILL_10201_DESC.ContentEN: Trigger Probability +<H>#1</>. When a Hydro character performs Normal Attack using this weapon, gains 1 stack that increases ATK Speed by <H>#2</> for #3s, up to #4 stacks. When switching to another weapon, immediately removes this effect.

SKILL_10202_DESC.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to targets inflicted with Bonus Effects by <H>#1</>.

SKILL_10203_DESC.ContentEN: Plunging Attack Speed +<H>#1</>. When an Electro character performs Plunging Attack using this weapon, gains 1 stack that increases CRIT Chance by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s, up to 10 stacks. When switching to another weapon, immediately removes this effect.

SKILL_10204_DESC.ContentEN: Berserker +<H>#1</>. Decreases Anemo characters' Ultimate Skill damage by #2, but increases their Skill Damage by <H>#3</> for <H>#4</>s after using their Ultimate Skill. Each time the user dealing skill damage or ranged weapon damage can extend this effect by #5s.

SKILL_10206_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing CRIT Damage using this weapon, there is a <H>#1</> chance to reload the ranged weapon Magazine to maximum by consuming the Ammo.

SKILL_10301_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Damage +<H>#1</>. When attacking with this weapon, the wielder gains 1 stack that increases their periodic damage by <H>#3</> and Incoming Healing by <H>#2</> for <H>#4</>s, up to 10 stacks.

SKILL_10302_DESC.ContentEN: When triggering bonus effects, there is a <H>#1</> chance to increase the Combo Level to maximum.

SKILL_10501_DESC.ContentEN: Trigger Probability +<H>#1</>. When an Electro character triggers a bonus effect using this weapon, they gain 1 stack that increases their Skill Damage by <H>#2</> throughout the battle, up to #3 stacks. Each time the wielder deals skill damage, 1 stack is removed.

SKILL_10601_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with this weapon, increases Damage Dealt by <H>#1</>; every Combo Level additionally increases the damage by <H>#1</>.

SKILL_110101_DESC.ContentEN: Rush forward, dealing AoE Damage 4 times along the way with [Ymir].

SKILL_110102_DESC.ContentEN: Switches the melee weapon to [Ymir] and casts 1 Swordwave. When performing Normal Attack using [Ymir], unleashes Swordwaves in the attacking direction and constantly consumes Sanity, during which Benerica is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. Once Sanity reaches 0 or the skill is used again, [Ymir] is sheathed.

SKILL_110103_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with a sword, there is a chance to restore Berenica's Sanity.

SKILL_110104_DESC.ContentEN: After using [Netherflames], the next use of [Faintlight] will not consume Sanity.

SKILL_180101_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Lumino Damage to enemies within range in front. When using this skill in [Boisterous Tea Party], Damage Dealt increases, and the damage range expands to the same range of [Boisterous Tea Party].

SKILL_180102_DESC.ContentEN:
[Boisterous Tea Party] starts.\
During [Boisterous Tea Party], using the skill again will switch the field effects in the order of the [Tea Party Guests]—[Nightingale], [Hound], [Unicorn], and [Butterfly].\
Using the skill again outside the range of [Boisterous Tea Party] will relocate it to Fina's current location.\
During [Boisterous Tea Party], a long press will early end the skill.

SKILL_180103_DESC.ContentEN: Fina gains a Lumino Damage bonus that lasts throughout the battle. Each time [\

SKILL_20201_DESC.ContentEN: While shooting using this weapon, the user gains 1 stack that increases their ATK Speed by <H>#1</>, up to <H>#2</>stacks. The effect duration refreshes with each stack gained. When switching to another weapon, immediately removes this effect.

SKILL_20203_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Duration +<H>#1</>. When a Pyro character deals damage using this weapon, increases the Dual Pistols damage by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s.

SKILL_20205_DESC.TextMapContent: 使用此武器射击时，基于该武器触发概率，额外发射1枚子弹，该子弹不消耗备弹，命中时，在目标位置触发1次爆炸伤害

SKILL_20301_DESC.ContentEN: Morale +<H>#1</>. When a Pyro character dodges, gains 1 stack that increases Skill Damage and ranged weapon damage by <H>#2</> for #3s, up to <H>#4</> stacks.

SKILL_20303_DESC.ContentEN: After switching to this weapon in battle, increases the user's ATK, up to <H>#1</>, with the increase effect weakening over time. When switching to another weapon, immediately removes this effect.

SKILL_20401_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with this weapon, the closer to the target, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#1</>.

SKILL_20402_DESC.ContentEN: Smash ATK +<H>#1</>. The projectile it shoots attaches to the target and explodes after 3s. Projectiles attached to one another in the same position will stack up, increasing the damage and the range of the incoming explosion. When 1/2/3 projectiles are stacked, it deals <H>#2</>/<H>#3</>/<H>#4</> of the original damage.

SKILL_20403_DESC.ContentEN: Once the projectiles are fired, they follow the crosshair. When dealing damage using this weapon, the further away from the target, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#1</>.

SKILL_20501_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage using this weapon, the more the percentage of the remaining projectiles left in Magazine, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#1</>.

SKILL_20502_DESC.ContentEN: CRIT Chance +<H>#1</>. Fires a beam that ricochets off the enemy and hits up to 4 nearby enemies. When a Hydro character deals CRIT damage using this weapon, grants an Ultra Shield equal to <H>#2</> of the user's ATK to nearby teammate(s) and increases their Damage Dealt by <H>#3</> for <H>#4</>s. This effect can only be triggered once per second.

SKILL_20503_DESC.ContentEN: When triggering bonus effects, there is a <H>#1</> chance to reload 1 projectile.

SKILL_20504_DESC.ContentEN: Multishot +<H>#1</>. When dealing damage with this weapon, the lower the percentage of remaining projectiles left in Magazine, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#2</>. The Damage Increase reaches the maximum when the percentage is less than #3.

SKILL_20507_DESC.ContentEN: CRIT Damage +<H>#1</>. For each projectile added to Magazine, increases Damage Dealt by <H>#2</>, up to <H>#3</>.

SKILL_20601_DESC.ContentEN: For each enemy hit by a single arrow it shoots, the damage it deals is increased by <H>#1</>, with a maximum increase of <H>#2</>.

SKILL_20602_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Efficiency +<H>#1</>. When an Anemo character uses a skill, their nearby teammate(s) will be granted one of the following enhancements for 2s: Attack +<H>#3</>, DEF +<H>#4</>, Skill Damage +<H>#5</>, Skill Duration +<H>#6</>, or Skill Range +<H>#7</>.

SKILL_210101_DESC.ContentEN: Summons 1 [Summon: Aurelia Aurita]. A maximum of 3 can exist at the same time.

SKILL_210102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Hydro Damage to surrounding enemies; the damage is increased based on the number of [Poison of Love] stacks inflicted on the enemies.

SKILL_210103_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with melee weapon and [Summon: Aurelia Aurita] attacks, inflicts 1 stack of [Poison of Love] on the target(s), up to 6 stacks.

SKILL_210104_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing damage with Normal Attack using a melee weapon, there's a chance to deal additional damage once, which is equivalent to the total damage of all [Poison of Love] stacks inflicted on the target.\
Dealing damage with [Lada Lovedew] will always trigger this effect.

SKILL_230101_DESC.ContentEN: Commands all [Summon: Tentacles] to attack 1 time and increases the damage from this attack. Heals Tabethe and her nearby teammate(s), and attacks from Tabethe and her nearby teammate(s) will deal additional Hydro Damage for a period of time.

SKILL_230102_DESC.ContentEN: Summons 9 [Summon: Tentacles] around Tabethe and refreshes the remaining duration of all existing [Summon: Tentacles].

SKILL_230103_DESC.ContentEN:
Dealing CRIT Damage with a ranged weapon has a chance to summon 1 [Summon: Tentacle] near the target, which can only be triggered once per second.\
A maximum of 18 [Summon: Tentacles] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_230104_DESC.ContentEN: When summoning [Summon: Tentacles], Tabethe gains 1 stack that increases her CRIT Chance, up to 10 stacks.

SKILL_240101_DESC.ContentEN: Summons 1 [Summon: Yunchi]. A maximum of 2 [Summon: Yunchi] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_240102_DESC.ContentEN: Fully restores HP and Shield for Fushu and all her nearby teammate(s). Applies [Nine-Needle Therapy] to nearby teammate(s) and increases Fushu's ATK Speed.

SKILL_240103_DESC.ContentEN: Increases the Sanity Recovery of Fushu and all her nearby teammate(s).

SKILL_240104_DESC.ContentEN: After Fushu and nearby teammate(s) consume a certain amount of Sanity, their Skill Damage increases. The higher the Skill Efficiency, the lower the Sanity cost required to trigger the effect.

SKILL_310101_DESC.ContentEN: Fires a specially enhanced projectile with [Hansel and Gretel], dealing Pyro Damage to enemies in the path and inflicting [Laceration] on them.

SKILL_310102_DESC.ContentEN:
Switches the ranged weapon to [Hansel and Gretel]. In this state, Lynn can shoot and use skills, but cannot move.\
Shooting deals damage to all enemies in front. During shooting, gains 1 stack that increases Lynn's ATK Speed every 0.2s, up to 35 stacks.\
Using [Hansel and Gretel] continuously consumes Sanity, during which Lynn is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. When Sanity reaches 0 or the skill is used again, withdraws [Hansel and Gretel].

SKILL_310103_DESC.ContentEN:
When not firing, gains 1 stack of [Preload] per second, up to 6 stacks.\
When firing, consumes all [Preload] stacks to gain [Suppressing Fire] for a period of time.\
[Suppressing Fire]: Increases the damage based on the number of the consumed [Preload] stacks. \
Cannot gain [Preload] stack during [Suppressing Fire].

SKILL_310104_DESC.ContentEN: Immediately removes [Laceration] and deals damage once the [Lacerated Wound] count reaches its maximum.

SKILL_310201_DESC.ContentEN:
Commands all [Dirtexpellers] to continuously revolve around Hilda and fire [Hyperthermal Purgejets], during which the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers] pauses.\
[Hyperthermal Purgejets] deal Pyro Damage to enemies. \
Defeating an enemy with [Hyperthermal Purgejet] has a chance to restore Sanity for Hilda.

SKILL_310202_DESC.ContentEN:
Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies and inflicts [Disarm] on targets with ranged weapons. For each target hit, summons 1 [Light Dirtexpeller] around Hilda and resets the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers].\
Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] around. [Heavy Dirtexpellers] and [Light Dirtexpellers] automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage.\
A maximum of 6 [Light Dirtexpellers] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_310203_DESC.ContentEN:
Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] that automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage.\
When dodging, Hilda reloads her ranged weapon Magazine to maximum and gains [Elegant Anger] for a period of time.

SKILL_310204_DESC.ContentEN:
Gains 1 stack of [Dust Off] when dealing ranged weapon damage, up to 5 stacks.\
During [Pyrolytic Cleaning], gains 1 stack of [Deep Cleaning] per second, up to 5 stacks.

SKILL_310301_DESC.ContentEN: Drops a bomb named [Tot Popper], assuming the form of either [Tot Popper: Yale's Make] or [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make]. Upon landing, the bomb explodes after 3s, dealing Pyro Damage to enemies within a cross-shaped area and detonating any other [Tot Poppers] within range. A maximum of 10 [Tot Poppers] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_310302_DESC.ContentEN: Generates [Nightmare Lab] around Yale and Oliver. Using the skill again can close [Nightmare Lab].

SKILL_310303_DESC.ContentEN: When a [Tot Popper] is deployed, if it's no less than 2 metres above the ground, it deals Pyro Damage to nearby enemies upon landing.

SKILL_310304_DESC.ContentEN:
Each time a [Tot Popper] is deployed, gains 1 stack of [Bombing Frenzy], up to 3 stacks.\
[Bombing Frenzy]: Increases Skill Efficiency.

SKILL_320101_DESC.ContentEN: Gains [Retribution]. Re-using the skill during [Retribution] extends its duration.

SKILL_320102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies and taunts them.

SKILL_320103_DESC.ContentEN: Increases Max HP and continuously restores HP.

SKILL_320104_DESC.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to taunted enemies.

SKILL_330101_DESC.ContentEN: Attack enemies in front, dealing Pyro Damage and stunning them. When using this skill by long press, Margie makes a continuous attack.

SKILL_330102_DESC.ContentEN:
Casts 3 [Margie's Combustible Bins] forward. They immediately explode upon hitting anything, dealing AoE Pyro Damage and consuming a certain stacks of [Jackpot!] for enhancement:\
When consuming 3 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Increases the explosion range and explosion damage.\
When consuming 6 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Creates a Zealous Zone after the explosion, dealing Pyro Damage once every 2s to enemies within the zone.\
When consuming 9 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Deals additional AoE Pyro Damage 2 times after the explosion.

SKILL_330103_DESC.ContentEN: When Margie or her nearby teammate(s) pick up any loot, Margie gains 1 stack of [Jackpot!] that lasts throughout the battle. Each stack increases Margie's Skill Damage, up to 20 stacks.

SKILL_330104_DESC.ContentEN: Increases the ATK of nearby teammate(s).

SKILL_420101_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage and then leaps into the air. Increases the plunge range of the following Plunging Attack. If in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state, the following Plunging Attack deals additional Electro Damage to the target(s).

SKILL_420102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage to enemies in front and enters [Xuanjiao Manifest] state.

SKILL_420103_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing damage with a Plunging Attack or using a skill, gains 1 stack of [Allegiance], up to 10 stacks.\
[Allegiance]: Increases CRIT Damage and Plunge Damage.

SKILL_420104_DESC.ContentEN: Increases Plunging Attack Speed based on the Combo Level.

SKILL_420201_DESC.ContentEN:
Deploys a [Barrier] in front of Randy and deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.\
[Barrier] consumes Sanity over time, during which Randy cannot move or use any weapon and is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. [Barrier] inflicts [Overwork Grudge] on nearby enemies.\
Using the skill again can withdraw the [Barrier].

SKILL_420202_DESC.ContentEN:
Throws 1 [Bespoke Shield] forward, causing [Impact] 1 time when it halts. [Bespoke Shield] triggers [Impact] once every 3s when it's on the battlefield.\
[Impact] deals damage only against target's Shield based on Randy's DEF, and grants an Ultra Shield based on Randy's DEF to teammate(s) within range.\
For targets with Shield that has reached 0, [Impact] paralyses them.

SKILL_420203_DESC.ContentEN: When Randy successfully grants an Ultra Shield to a teammate, applies 1 stack that increases their DEF based on Randy's DEF to them, up to 10 stacks.

SKILL_420204_DESC.ContentEN: Once [Barrier] has absorbed damage equivalent to 70% of Randy's Max HP, consumes Sanity to reset the [Barrier] and deals the same Electro Damage of [Legitimate Slackness] barrier deployment 1 time.

SKILL_430101_DESC.ContentEN:
Press to summon 1 [Thunderbolt] to attack 1 enemy in front. Long press to continuously summon [Thunderbolts] to randomly attack the enemies in front. If there is a [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] nearby, [Divine Conqueror] prioritises attacking it.\
Consuming 30 points of [Might of Thunder] will relocate the [Thunderbolt] targeting range to the area around Sibylle and summons 1 additional [Thunderbolt] to attack the same enemy.

SKILL_430102_DESC.ContentEN:
Summons 1 [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb]. A maximum of 1 can exist at the same time.\
Consuming 100 points of [Might of Thunder] will summon 1 enhanced [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb]. Each time the enhanced [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] receives damage equal to a percentage of its Max HP, it calls forth [Devastating Storm].

SKILL_430103_DESC.ContentEN: Gains [Might of Thunder] points when triggering bonus effects, up to 300 points. [Divine Conqueror] and [Stormcaller] can be empowered by consuming [Might of Thunder] points.

SKILL_430104_DESC.ContentEN: When nearby teammate(s) consume Sanity to use skills, automatically summons 1 [Thunderbolt] to attack 1 nearby enemy. If there is a [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] nearby, the [Thunderbolt] prioritises attacking it.

SKILL_510101_DESC.ContentEN:
Commands [Filbert] to charge forwards, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path. Upon hitting any obstacles, deals AoE Anemo Damage at the endpoint. When using this skill, heals Truffle and Filbert and her nearby teammate(s) and increases their damage.\
When Truffle rides on [Filbert], this skill is replaced with [Trotters Charge-Charge].

SKILL_510102_DESC.ContentEN:
Truffle rides on [Filbert] and gains 100 points of [Passion For Work] and a Movement Speed boost, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path.\
While riding on [Filbert], Truffle is unable to use any weapon but can command [Filbert] to attack. When this skill is used again, Truffle dismounts and unleashes [Trotters Trot-Trot] once.

SKILL_510103_DESC.ContentEN:
Gains 1 stack of [Heavyweight] for every second Truffle keeps moving, up to 10 stacks.\
[Heavyweight]: Increases Damage Dealt and decreases Damage Taken.

SKILL_510104_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing skill damage, there is a chance to drop 1 [Ammo Supply Chest].

SKILL_530101_DESC.ContentEN: Creates 1 [Phantasm] and then flashes forward. This skill can be used at any time without interrupting Psyche's current action. In [Flamboyance] state, this skill is replaced with [Phototaxis].

SKILL_530102_DESC.ContentEN: Enters [Flamboyance] state and gains the ability to fly. When in [Flamboyance] state, Psyche can only use skills and shoot, and the skill [Chrysalis' Dreamscape] is replaced with [Phototaxis]. [Flamboyance] state continuously consumes Sanity; when Sanity drops to 0 or this skill is used again, [Flamboyance] state ends.

SKILL_530103_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing CRIT damage, gains one of the following buffs at random: ATK Increase, Skill Damage Increase, or Berserker Increase.\
Increases Damage Dealt for each buff Psyche gains, up to 12 buffs.

SKILL_530104_DESC.ContentEN:
When Psyche's HP percentage is above 10%, [Flamboyance] state consumes Psyche's HP per second instead of Sanity. The consumed HP is converted into an Ultra Shield in a certain percentage.\
The lower the HP percentage, the less damage Psyche takes, max 40% damge taken reduce when Psyche's HP percentage is no more than 20%.

SKILL_DESC_4201FallAttackSpeed.ContentEN: Plunge SPD Increase Per Combo Level

SURVIVALPRO_LONGPRESS_PC.ContentEN: Approach the Potion Station, hold &Interactive& to acquire the Serum

SURVIVALPRO_LONGPRESS_PHONE.ContentEN: Approach the Potion Station, hold the button to acquire the Serum

StarterQuest_Des_102001_1_1.ContentEN: Level up any character to Lv. 20

StarterQuest_Des_102001_1_3.ContentEN: Open a total of 10 chests outside Commissions

StarterQuest_Des_102001_1_4.ContentEN: Complete Side Quest: The Wandering Luno

StarterQuest_Des_102001_1_5.ContentEN: Complete Main Story: Whispers of the Sands

StarterQuest_Des_102001_2_2.ContentEN: Open a total of 20 chests outside Commissions

StarterQuest_Des_102001_2_3.ContentEN: Level up any character's skill to Lv. 2 twice

StarterQuest_Des_102001_2_4.ContentEN: Successfully pass any Impression Check 5 times (excluding Impression Store checks)

StarterQuest_Des_102001_2_5.ContentEN: Make a purchase at Icelake: Lunoeggy's Impression Shop

StarterQuest_Des_102001_3_1.ContentEN: Complete Main Story: The Art of Survival

StarterQuest_Des_102001_3_4.ContentEN: Enhance at least 1 Demon Wedge to Lv. 3

StarterQuest_Des_102001_4_1.ContentEN: Successfully pass any Impression Check 10 times (excluding Impression Store checks)

StarterQuest_Des_102001_4_2.ContentEN: Level up any character's skill to Lv. 4 three times

StarterQuest_Des_102001_4_3.ContentEN: Complete Main Story: The Secret Behind the Door

StarterQuest_Des_102001_4_4.TextMapContent: 完成1次探险家皎皎的挑战

StarterQuest_Des_102001_5_1.ContentEN: Complete any Nocturnal Echoes Trial once

StarterQuest_Des_102001_5_4.ContentEN: Enhance at least 5 different Demon Wedges to Lv. 5 (duplicates do not count)

StarterQuest_Des_102001_6_1.ContentEN: Enhance at least 10 different Demon Wedges to Lv. 5 (duplicates do not count)

StarterQuest_Des_102001_6_2.ContentEN: Complete any Maze of Missteps Trial once

StarterQuest_Des_102001_6_3.ContentEN: Level up any character's skill to Lv. 4 twelve times

StarterQuest_Des_102001_6_4.ContentEN: Forge the Blueprint of any 4★ weapon once

StarterQuest_Des_102001_7_1.ContentEN: Complete the Maze of Missteps Trial on Difficulty 2

StarterQuest_Des_102001_8_1.ContentEN: Complete the Maze of Missteps Trial on Difficulty 3

StarterQuest_Des_102001_8_2.ContentEN: Clear Nocturnal Echoes: Sibylle on Difficulty 50 once

StarterQuest_Des_102001_8_3.ContentEN: Clear Nocturnal Echoes: Crystalophile on Difficulty 50 once

StarterQuest_Des_102001_8_4.ContentEN: Clear Nocturnal Echoes: The Eclosioner on Difficulty 50 once

StarterQuest_Des_102001_9_1.ContentEN: Complete the Maze of Missteps Trial on Difficulty 4

StarterQuest_Des_102001_9_2.ContentEN: Enhance at least 10 different Purple-tier or better Demon Wedges to Lv. 5 (duplicates do not count)

System_Des_Achievement.ContentEN: <Highlight>Achievements</> is now unlocked. A testament to our endeavours.

System_Des_Armory.ContentEN: <Highlight>Armoury</> is now unlocked. Set up your loadouts and prepare for more challenges ahead.

System_Des_Bag.ContentEN: <Highlight>Inventory</> is now unlocked. You can view all the items you possess there.

System_Des_BattleWheel.ContentEN: <Highlight>Tactical Backpack</> is now unlocked. Make good preparations for any imminent battles.

System_Des_CardLevel.ContentEN: <Highlight>Introns</> is now unlocked. Trace back to the origins and unlock more potential.

System_Des_Chat.ContentEN: <Highlight>Chat</> system is now unlocked. Time to catch up with a friend.

System_Des_Enterntainment.ContentEN: <Highlight>Sojourns</> is now unlocked. It's always a delight to spend some quality time with a companion.

System_Des_Forging.ContentEN: <Highlight>Forge</> is now unlocked. Try crafting more powerful weapons and useful items.

System_Des_Friend.ContentEN: <Highlight>Friends</> is now unlocked. Join hands with friends for an adventure across the land of Atlasia.

System_Des_Gacha.ContentEN: <H>Chrono</> is now unlocked. Send heartfelt prayers and call for allies in memories to your side.

System_Des_GameEvent.ContentEN: <Highlight>Events</> is now unlocked. Check it regularly so you won't miss out.

System_Des_GuideBook.ContentEN: <Highlight>Tutorials</> is now unlocked. You can revisit the tutorials you have missed or forgotten here.

System_Des_HardBoss.ContentEN: <Highlight>Nocturnal Echoes</> is now unlocked. Face the enemies from your past — what doesn't break you makes you stronger.

System_Des_Invite.ContentEN: <Highlight>Invite</> is now unlocked. In your downtime, why not invite a friend over for a chat?

System_Des_Mail.ContentEN: <Highlight>Mailbox</> is now unlocked. Let's see who's thinking of you today~

System_Des_Map.ContentEN: <Highlight>Map and Teleport</> are now unlocked. Summon the Avian Spirit to record your footprints so you can revisit these places in a flash.

System_Des_Match.ContentEN: <Highlight>Match</> is now unlocked. Join forces to defeat powerful enemies.

System_Des_Mod.ContentEN: <Highlight>Demon Wedges</> are now available. Strategically equip various Demon Wedges to greatly empower your characters and weapons.

System_Des_Notice.ContentEN: <Highlight>Notices</> is now unlocked. For the latest game updates, this is the place to check.

System_Des_Pet.ContentEN: <Highlight>Geniemon</> is now unlocked. Embark on an adventure with these marvellous creatures!

System_Des_PhotoCamera.ContentEN: <Highlight>Camera</> is now unlocked. Capture every memorable moment so it will last forever.

System_Des_Play.ContentEN: <Highlight>Combat</> is now unlocked. Complete more commissions to become an excellent Phoxhunter.

System_Des_Polarity.ContentEN: <Highlight>Track Adjustment</> is now unlocked. Time to maximise the potential of your Demon Wedges.

System_Des_Quest.ContentEN: <Highlight>Quests</> is now unlocked, where you can check all your ongoing quests.

System_Des_Rouge.ContentEN: <Highlight>Maze of Missteps</> is now unlocked. Step into the tangled pathways of time — explore, fight, and grow stronger.

System_Des_Shop.ContentEN: <Highlight>Shop</> is now unlocked. Go stock up on supplies for unexpected needs.

System_Des_Skill.ContentEN: <Highlight>Skills</> is now unlocked. Time to empower your characters greatly.

System_Des_SwitchMaster.ContentEN: The <Highlight>Protagonist Switch</> function is unlocked. You can now switch to the protagonist for exploration and interaction in safe areas.

System_Des_Temple.ContentEN: <Highlight>Avian Spirit Trials</> is now unlocked. Delve into the realm of dreams and face the trials ahead.

System_Des_Uweapon.ContentEN: <Highlight>Consonance Weapons</> is now unlocked. Time to empower your characters greatly.

TARGET_DUNGEON_102.ContentEN: Use Serum to ensure you survive before evacuating

TARGET_DUNGEON_104.ContentEN: Head to the evacuation point now!

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_103.ContentEN: Catch up to and defeat the designated target.

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_104.ContentEN: Approach the target and hold the interaction key <Highlight>within the time limit</> to complete the capture.

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_105.ContentEN: Then, go to the evacuation point to complete the commission.

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_106.ContentEN: The target is about to break free

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_107.ContentEN: Commission fails if the target manages to make their escape.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_108.ContentEN: Protect <Highlight>Lunoxplorer</> from the <Highlight>three waves</> of enemy attacks. The commission fails if the device she's inspecting is destroyed.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_109.ContentEN: You can choose to evacuate after every three waves or continue.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_110.ContentEN: Protect <H>Lunoxplorer</> before the countdown ends. The Commission fails if the device she's inspecting is destroyed.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_111.ContentEN: After successfully defending Lunoxplorer for a period of time, you can choose to retreat or continue.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_102.ContentEN: Continue to activate the Excavator and collect modules to keep it running

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_104.ContentEN: Go activate the Excavators. <Highlight>Three</> Excavators can be activated in each round. Excavators with different levels have different excavation efficiency.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_105.ContentEN: Excavators require <Highlight>Excavator Modules</> to run, which can be obtained by <Highlight>defeating</> certain monsters.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_106.ContentEN: After collecting an Excavator Module, approach an Excavator for automatic installation.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_107.ContentEN: Keep an eye on the <Highlight>excavation progress</> and the remaining number of Excavator Modules. Safeguard the Excavators to ensure their uninterrupted operation.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_108.ContentEN: Excavators dispense <Highlight>Coins</> during excavation. The commission is completed after three Excavators have been activated and at least one of them reaches full excavation progress.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_109.ContentEN: Completing an Excavation commission allows for a choice between retreating or continuing to activate new Excavators for more Coins.

TARGET_DUNGEON_RESCUE_102.ContentEN: Find the cell that's holding the target

TARGET_DUNGEON_RESCUE_103.ContentEN: Escort the target to the evacuation point

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_103.ContentEN: Head to the next level of the Abyss

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_109.ContentEN: Head to the next level of the Abyss

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_109_Sub.ContentEN: (Optional) Make a trade with the Mysterious Merchant

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_111.ContentEN: Interact with the campfire to see the flickering reflection

TERMEXP_1801_Skill02.ContentEN:
Generates an elemental field that corresponds to the element type of the [Tea Party Guests], with [Nightingale] for Hydro, [Hound] for Pyro, [Unicorn] for Electro, and [Butterfly] for Anemo.\
When [Boisterous Tea Party] starts, Fina and her nearby teammate(s) can deal additional elemental damage based on the element type of the field. In addition, it deals corresponding elemental damage to enemies within [Boisterous Tea Party] once every 2 seconds.

TERMEXP_2101_Dot.ContentEN: Deals Hydro Damage once every 2s. Enemies inflicted with [Poison of Love] transfer their remaining stacks of [Poison of Love] to nearby enemies based on the current stack count and remaining duration.

TERMEXP_2101_Summon.ContentEN: Inherits 100% of Rebecca's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies.

TERMEXP_2301_Summon.ContentEN: Inherits 100% of Tabethe's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies and capturing up to 2 enemies to immobilise them.

TERMEXP_2401_Skill02Buff.ContentEN: Increases Skill Damage based on a percentage of the amount by which Fushu's Skill Damage exceeds 100%, with a Skill Damage increase cap.

TERMEXP_2401_Summon.ContentEN:
Inherits 100% of Fushu's stats and deals Hydro Damage to 3 nearby enemies.\
[Summon: Yunchi] restores HP and Sanity for nearby teammate(s) once every 3s.

TERMEXP_3101_Debuff.ContentEN:
When under the influence of [Laceration], every time the enemy takes ranged weapon damage, increases [Lacerated Wound] count by 1.\
When the [Laceration] duration ends, deals Pyro Damage equivalent to [Lacerated Wound] count × [Laceration] DMG to the enemy.

TERMEXP_3102_Buff.ContentEN: Increases the ATK Speed of [Dirtexpeller] and the rotation speed of [Pyrolytic Cleaning].

TERMEXP_3103_Skill02.ContentEN:
In the area of [Nightmare Lab]:\
Decreases the Movement Speed of enemies.\
The detonation timers of [Tot Poppers] on the ground are paused, and they won't be detonated by other [Tot Poppers].\
\
When [Nightmare Lab] closes:\
Detonates all [Tot Poppers] within range and the lab explodes to deal Pyro Damage to the enemies within range. For each [Tot Popper] is detonated, increases the explosion damage of [Nightmare Lab] and restores Sanity for Yale and Oliver.

TERMEXP_3103_Summon01.ContentEN: When dealing damage, causes greater Stance reduction to the target(s). The greater the difference between the Skill Range and Skill Damage provided by equipped Demon Wedges, the higher the chance of deploying [Tot Popper: Yale's Make]. If the difference is no less than 50%, it's guaranteed to be a [Tot Popper: Yale's Make].

TERMEXP_3103_Summon02.ContentEN: Deals higher damage. The greater the difference between the Skill Damage and Skill Range provided by equipped Demon Wedges, the higher the chance of deploying [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make]. If the difference is no less than 50%, it's guaranteed to be a [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make].

TERMEXP_3201_Skill01.ContentEN:
Increases DEF and deals Pyro Damage to nearby enemies once every 2s.\
If Hellfire takes damage during [Retribution], extends its duration and deals [Puncture Retribution] Pyro Damage to nearby enemies once every 2s.

TERMEXP_4201_Summon.ContentEN:
Immune to Hitstun when taking damage.\
Attacks 1 enemy within a 10-metre radius around Yuming once every 3s, dealing AoE Electro Damage.\
Xuanjiao absorbs damage dealt to Yuming's HP, and when the absorbed damage reaches a certain percentage of Yuming's Max HP, [Xuanjiao Manifest] state ends.

TERMEXP_4202_Skill01.ContentEN:
[Barrier] blocks frontal projectiles and absorbs their damage.\
[Barrier] expires once it has absorbed damage equivalent to 100% of Randy's Max HP.

TERMEXP_4202_Skill01Buff.ContentEN: Decreases ATK, and takes Electro Damage once every 2s.

TERMEXP_4301_Skill01.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage to enemies within range and inflicts [Legion's Foe] on them.

TERMEXP_4301_Skill02.ContentEN:
Inherits a percentage of Sibylle's Max HP with 0 DEF, and is considered an enemy unit.\
[Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] calls forth [Devastating Storm] once every 3s.\
Once summoned, [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] links to the furthest 5 enemies within range, linking 1 more enemy per second, up to 10 enemies, and deals Electro Damage to the linked targets once per second.\
When the [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] takes damage, it transfers the damage taken to the linked targets in a certain percentage. When taking damage from [Thunderbolt], the [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] inflicts [Legion's Foe] on the linked targets.

TERMEXP_4301_Skill02Damage.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.

TERMEXP_5101_Skill01.ContentEN: Long press to ride [Filbert] for a sustained charge, continuously consuming Sanity and dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path. Upon hitting any obstacle, Filbert stops charging, dealing AoE Anemo Damage at the endpoint.

TERMEXP_5101_Skill02_Value.ContentEN: [Passion For Work] loses 5 point per second, and restores 1 when dealing damage upon knocking into a target. During [Trotters Charge-Charge], [Passion For Work] will not lose. When all [Passion For Work] points are depleted, Truffle dismounts and unleashes [Trotters Trot-Trot] once.

TERMEXP_5301_Skill01.ContentEN: Charges forward in the air and releases 16 [Ethereal Powders]. The [Ethereal Powders] automatically lock onto 1 enemy, dealing Anemo Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Powder Stigma], up to 12 stacks.

TERMEXP_5301_Skill01Mark.ContentEN: When a target inflicted with [Powder Stigma] takes CRIT Damage from [Psyche], 1 stack of [Powder Stigma] is consumed to deal Anemo Damage to the target.

TERMEXP_5301_Summon.ContentEN:
Once created, the Phantasm continuously slows down nearby enemies. After 5 seconds, it deals Anemo Damage to nearby enemies and vanishes. \
When a new [Phantasm] is created, the existing [Phantasm] immediately deals Anemo Damage and vanishes.

TERMEXP_Common_AdditionalDmg.ContentEN: Upon dealing damage, inflicts additional damage 1 time based on the original damage.

TOAST_DUNGEON_CANCEL_LEAVETEAM.ContentEN: Someone has left the team. Commission cancelled.

TOAST_DUNGEON_CANCEL_REJECT.ContentEN: Someone has declined the Commission. Commission cancelled.

TOAST_DUNGEON_CANCEL_UNABLE.ContentEN: Commission cancelled: One or more teammates are currently unable to join the commission

TOAST_DUNGEON_FAIL_UNABLE.ContentEN: Commission start failed: One or more teammates are currently unable to join the commission

TOAST_PENALIZEINVALID.ContentEN: Cannot use Ask's Retribution at this location

TOAST_PHANTOM_ZERO.ContentEN: Combat Partner Rescue attempts used up

Tips_SpecialQuest_GiveUp.ContentEN: Are you sure you want to pause the quest?

Tips_SpecialQuest_Start.ContentEN: You are about to start a special quest. Leaving the designated area will interrupt your progress, requiring you to restart from the last save point. For the best experience, we recommend completing the quest when you have enough time to enjoy the full storyline.

Toast_DonglishiJiaoxue.ContentEN: Attack the active Phoxynamo Wheels to switch them off

Toast_PaoJi.ContentEN: Passage opened. Leave the turret and proceed to the central control room.

UIGUIDE_AMMO.ContentEN: There is a chance to obtain ammo supplies by defeating enemies, opening chests, or destroying breakable objects, which can be used to replenish the projectiles for ranged weapons.

UIGUIDE_EXECUTION_01.ContentEN: Powerful enemies will maintain their combat Stance, which can be <Highlight>weakened by attacks</>. The enemies will <Highlight>lose balance</> when their Stance is weakened to a certain extent, and once it's completely weakened, they will be <Highlight>briefly stunned</>.

UIGUIDE_EXECUTION_02.ContentEN: Enemies being stuned will become vulnerable and reveal their weakness. At this point, <H>they can be approached to perform a powerful strike</>. Some Daimons refer to this as <H>\

UIGUIDE_FALLATTACK.ContentEN: Tap &Attack& in mid-air to quickly land with a Plunging Attack.

UIGUIDE_GUN.ContentEN: Ranged weapons are ideal for defeating enemies far away or in an elevated position. Note the limits on their Magazine and Ammo.

UIGUIDE_HPSHIELD.ContentEN: When a character is attacked, the <Highlight>Shield</> displayed below is usually consumed first. Once the <Highlight>Shield</> is breached, further attacks will reduce <Highlight>HP</>.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_01.ContentEN: Some enemies have glowing parts that are destructible, and each part has its <Highlight>own HP</>.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_02.ContentEN: When the HP of a destructible part is reduced to 0, the enemy enters <Highlight>Broken State</>, which <Highlight>significantly weakens the enemy's Stance</>.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_03.ContentEN: When their Stance is weakened to a certain extent, the enemy will <Highlight>lose their balance</>.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_04.ContentEN: Once an enemy's Stance is disabled, they'll be <Highlight>briefly stunned</>. <Highlight>During Stance recovery</>, the enemy's <Highlight>Weakness will be exposed</> and their damage taken will be greatly increased.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_05.ContentEN: Crystalophile's armour is destructible, and each destructible part has its <Highlight>own HP</>.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_06.ContentEN: In the presence of <Highlight>any</> armour, Crystalophile remains <Highlight>invincible</>. When the HP of a destructible part is reduced to 0, Crystalophile enters <Highlight>Broken State</> and loses balance.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_07.ContentEN: When Crystalophile <Highlight>loses its balance</>, it will be <Highlight>stunned</> for a short period and <Highlight>lose its invincibility</>.

UIGUIDE_PARTIALDAMAGE_08.ContentEN: When all the armour is destroyed, Crystalophile will be <Highlight>completely stunned</> and its <Highlight>Weakness will be exposed</>. Using <Highlight>\

UIGUIDE_SKILL2_01.ContentEN:
Inspired by the power of Resonance, Berenica's <Highlight>Ultimate Skill</> has been awakened.\
Press &Skill2& to unleash Berenica's Ultimate Skill [Netherflames]. [Netherflames] <Highlight>continuously consumes Sanity</> during its activation, releasing Swordwaves in the attacking direction. Press &Skill2& <Highlight>again</> to <Highlight>end the Ultimate Skill</>.

UIGUIDE_SKILL2_01_phone.ContentEN:
Inspired by the power of Resonance, Berenica's <Highlight>Ultimate Skill</> has been awakened.\
Tap the button to unleash Berenica's Ultimate Skill [Netherflames]. [Netherflames] <Highlight>continuously consumes Sanity</> during its activation, releasing Swordwaves in the attacking direction. <Highlight>Tap the button again to discontinue the Ultimate Skill</>.

UIGUIDE_SLIDEATTACK.ContentEN: Tap &attack& when sliding to perform a Sliding Attack

UIGuide_AssistanceSkill.ContentEN: You can gain power from <H>Geniemons</> to help your team in battle through Resonance Support.

UIGuide_BattleWheel_1.ContentEN:
The <H>Tactical Backpack</> is vital for combat. It allows you to <H>summon allies</>, <H>use items</>, and <H>perform special actions</> to facilitate combat.\
You can equip it in <H>Armoury</>.

UIGuide_BattleWheel_2_PC.ContentEN: Hold &OpenBattleWheel& to summon a combat partner, who will fight alongside your current character.

UIGuide_BattleWheel_2_Phone.ContentEN: Tap the button to summon a combat partner, who will fight alongside your current character.

UIGuide_Biography.ContentEN: Folk stories provide detailed backstories of people from around the world. You will be able to access these stories once you get to know them.

UIGuide_BonusDamage.ContentEN:
When dealing damage with a weapon, deals additional damage <H>1 time</> based on the type and amount of the original damage dealt.\
The additional damage may trigger the corresponding Bonus Effect based on the <H>Weapon Trigger Probability</>.

UIGuide_BulletJump_1_PC.ContentEN: Press &Slide& and then &Jump& to Helix Leap over cliffs or cover long distances.

UIGuide_BulletJump_1_Phone.ContentEN: Hold the Jump button and <H>swipe upwards</> to Helix Leap over cliffs or cover long distances.

UIGuide_BulletJump_2.ContentEN: Tilt the camera upward and use Helix Leap to reach <H>higher</> areas.

UIGuide_Chest_1.ContentEN: Certain Chests require a <H>key</> to open. Keep an eye out for keys scattered around throughout your journey.

UIGuide_Combo_01.ContentEN: Each time you deal damage to an enemy with a <H>melee weapon</>, you gain 1 <H>combo point</>. Gain a certain number of combo points to increase your <H>Combo Level</>.

UIGuide_Combo_02_PC.ContentEN: Hold &Attack& to perform a <H>Charged Attack</>. The damage of this Charged Attack is increased according to the <H>current Combo Level</>, and then the <H>Combo Points will reset to 0</>.

UIGuide_Combo_02_Phone.ContentEN: Hold the button to perform a <H>Charged Attack</>. The damage of this Charged Attack is increased according to the <H>current Combo Level</>, and then the <H>Combo Points will reset to 0</>.

UIGuide_ConnectMechanism.ContentEN: A common door lock mechanism. Drag the hexagonal widget along the correct path to the endpoint within the allotted time to unlock this type of magic lock.

UIGuide_CursorActivation.ContentEN: Hold &ShowCursor& to show the cursor, so you can interact with the icons on the page.

UIGuide_DamageMechanism_1.ContentEN: Auto-defence mechanisms target <H>all units</> within range.

UIGuide_DamageMechanism_2.ContentEN: They can either be avoided or neutralised.

UIGuide_Delivery_01.ContentEN: Press &Interactive& to summon the Oneiric Avian Spirit to record the current location.

UIGuide_Delivery_01_phone.ContentEN: Interact to summon an Oneiric Avian Spirit to record the current location.

UIGuide_Delivery_02.ContentEN: Press &OpenMap& to open Map and <H>teleport</> to any recorded locations.

UIGuide_Delivery_02_phone.ContentEN: Open Map and select a recorded location to <H>teleport</> there.

UIGuide_Destructible.ContentEN: Some items can be damaged upon attack and will drop supplies.

UIGuide_Dodge_PC.ContentEN: Press &Avoid& to dodge incoming attacks. You can only dodge a <H>limited number of times</> within a specified time frame. Consecutive dodges are possible when you have sufficient Dodge Attempts.

UIGuide_Dodge_Phone.ContentEN: Tap the button to dodge incoming attacks. You can only dodge a <H>limited number of times</> within a specified time frame. Consecutive dodges are possible when you have sufficient Dodge Attempts.

UIGuide_Dot.ContentEN: Deals damage <H>once every 2s</> for their duration. Periodic damage <H>cannot</> trigger Bonus Effects.

UIGuide_DynStory_1.ContentEN: From time to time, dynamic quests will occur throughout the world. Your involvement may alter their outcomes.

UIGuide_DynStory_2.ContentEN: In some dynamic quests, your choices will affect your Impression ratings across five different dimensions.

UIGuide_EX01Map.ContentEN: In <H>Map</>, select the <H>top right corner</> to open the <H>World Map</> where you can switch between <H>Chapter Noctoyager</> and <H>Chapter Twilight</>.

UIGuide_EX01Mechanism_1.ContentEN: Interact with the <H>Transformers</> to <H>activate or deactivate</> their connected devices. Check the colour of the <H>cables</> to tell which devices are <H>active</>.

UIGuide_EX01Mechanism_2.ContentEN:
Check the colour of the <H>cables</> connected to the devices to determine their status:\
<H>Blue</>: The device is <H>active</>.\
<H>Orange</>: The device is <H>inactive</>. Look nearby for the necessary transformers to activate it.

UIGuide_Elevator.ContentEN: Lifts are standard mechanisms for vertical transport.

UIGuide_ExplorationMechanism_1_PC.ContentEN: Lunoxplorer has set challenges worldwide. Approach one and press &Interactive& to start the challenge.

UIGuide_ExplorationMechanism_1_Phone.ContentEN: Lunoxplorer has set challenges worldwide. Approach one and <H>interact</> with it to start the challenge.

UIGuide_ExplorationMechanism_2.ContentEN: Complete the challenge by following the guide to reach the target location within the specified time.

UIGuide_ExplorationMechanism_3.ContentEN: Complete the challenge by following the navigation to shoot the designated targets within the time limit.

UIGuide_FireMechanism.ContentEN: <H>Flame Traps</> will <H>activate</> when attacked, dealing damage to <H>all targets</> passing through. Some <H>Flame Traps</> deal higher damage but require a longer cooldown before reactivation.

UIGuide_Fort_1_PC.ContentEN: Approach Turret 4 and press &Interactive& to activate it. Turret 4 is equipped with <H>High-Explosive Shells</> and <H>Rapid-Fire Rounds</>.

UIGuide_Fort_1_Phone.ContentEN: Approach Turret 4 and <H>interact</> to activate it. Turret 4 is equipped with <H>High-Explosive Shells</> and <H>Rapid-Fire Rounds</>.

UIGuide_Fort_2.ContentEN: <H>High-Explosive Shells</> deal area damage but have a <H>longer reload time</>. <H>Rapid-Fire Rounds</> deal single-target damage quickly but will cause <H>overheating</> after a certain number of shots, temporarily <H>preventing further firing</>.

UIGuide_HardBoss_01.ContentEN: Defeating the bosses of certain main quests unlocks the corresponding <H>Nocturnal Echoes</> challenges.

UIGuide_HardBoss_02.ContentEN: Bosses in Nocturnal Echoes challenges are much stronger than regular ones. You can acquire rewards from Nocturnal Echoes challenges <H>50 times per week</>.

UIGuide_ImpressionCheck_1.ContentEN: Occasionally, Impression Checks are triggered during side quests and NPC dialogues. Successfully passing these Checks advances the dialogue and gives rewards. Earn Impression points in the 5 dimensions to improve your success chances in these Checks.

UIGuide_ImpressionCheck_2.ContentEN: If you fail to pass an Impression Check, you can still use dice to try again. Dice can be obtained through side quests or forged by Lunosmith.

UIGuide_ImpressionShop_1.ContentEN: Lunoeggy's shop offers a wide selection of valuable items.

UIGuide_ImpressionShop_2.ContentEN: Complete Lunoeggy's designated Impression Checks to earn generous rewards.

UIGuide_ImpressionSystem_1.ContentEN: Your actions in a region continuously influence the <H>Impressions</> locals have of you.

UIGuide_ImpressionSystem_2.ContentEN: In main quests, side quests, and NPC dialogues, certain <H>choices</> will affect your social image, which will be reflected through an evaluation system consisting of 5 dimensions: Benefit, Morality, Wisdom, Empathy, and Chaos.

UIGuide_ImpressionSystem_3.ContentEN: <H>Lunoeggy</> admires those with personality. Once you've built up a strong reputation with enough Impression scores, you can challenge <H>Lunoeggy</> in the city to a dice game for a chance to win <H>Lunoeggy's Rewards</>!

UIGuide_LayeredMap_1.ContentEN: Some areas feature multi-layered structures, allowing you to switch between different map floors for easier navigation.

UIGuide_LayeredMap_2.ContentEN: Setting and tracking markers on the map makes exploration easier. To remove markers you no longer need, simply select on them again.

UIGuide_LockMonster_PC.ContentEN: Press &LockMonster& to lock onto a <H>boss</>; press again to cancel.

UIGuide_LockMonster_Phone.ContentEN: Tap &LockMonster& to lock onto a <H>boss</>; press again to cancel.

UIGuide_LongPressedSkills.ContentEN: Some skills trigger different effects based on whether they are <H>long pressed</> or <H>pressed</>.

UIGuide_ModTendency_1.ContentEN: The upper right corner of a <H>Demon Wedge slot</> shows its <H>Track</> (if any).

UIGuide_ModTendency_2.ContentEN: The upper left corner of a <H>Demon Wedge</> shows its <H>Track</> (if any).

UIGuide_ModTendency_3.ContentEN: Equipping any Demon Wedge in a <H>neutral</> slot <H>does not change</> the required Tolerance. Equipping a <H>neutral</> Demon Wedge in any slot <H>does not change</> the required Tolerance.

UIGuide_ModTendency_4.ContentEN: When equipping a Demon Wedge in a slot with the <H>same Track</>, the required Tolerance will be <H>lowered</> due to a kind of synergy between the Demon Wedge and the bearer.

UIGuide_ModTendency_5.ContentEN: When equipping a Demon Wedge in a slot with <H>different Tracks</>, the required Tolerance will be <H>increased</> due to a kind of mutual rejection between the Demon Wedge and the bearer.

UIGuide_MonsterExitMechanism_1.ContentEN: Enemy units periodically spawn from within this passage. The passage can only be sealed by <H>attacking specific weak points with the correct approach</>.

UIGuide_MonsterExitMechanism_2.ContentEN: Enemy units periodically spawn from within this passage. You can either <H>interact with certain devices</> or <H>defeat all the enemies</> to seal the passage.

UIGuide_Online_01_01.ContentEN: When doing a private commission alone or with friends, other players <H>cannot</> join halfway.

UIGuide_Online_01_02.ContentEN: When doing a public commission alone or with friends, other players <H>can</> join halfway.

UIGuide_Online_02_01.ContentEN: In solo mode, a private commission will start immediately once you select it.

UIGuide_Online_02_02.ContentEN: In co-op mode, a private commission will require all members to <H>confirm within 10 seconds</>. Once everyone confirms or the timer runs out, the commission begins.

UIGuide_Online_03_01.ContentEN: In solo mode for public commissions, the system will search for an ongoing commission for <H>10 seconds</> for you to join halfway. If no match is found, you will start the commission from the beginning. The search can be cancelled anytime during the 10-second window.

UIGuide_Online_03_02.ContentEN: In co-op mode for public commissions, the system will search for an ongoing commission for <H>10 seconds</> for your team to join halfway; if one is found, it will start after <H>all team members have confirmed</>. If no match is found, your team will start the commission from the beginning. The search can be cancelled anytime by anyone on the team during the 10-second window.

UIGuide_Online_04_01.ContentEN: Whether in solo or co-op mode, the objectives of commissions remain the same. But the <H>difficulty</> <H>increases</> with the number of players. The larger the team, the more enemies will spawn, and the higher their levels will be.

UIGuide_Online_04_02.ContentEN: At the end of each round in any Commission ∞, a vote is held. Players who vote to continue will proceed to the next round, while those who choose to retreat will exit. Each player's choice <H>doesn't affect that of the others</>.

UIGuide_Online_04_03.ContentEN: Once any team member reaches the evacuation point, a <H>30-second</> countdown will begin. The commission will automatically finalise when the timer expires, or if all team members reach the evacuation point during the countdown, the commission will finalise immediately.

UIGuide_Online_05_01.ContentEN: Each team member has a limited number of revival chances. When defeated, a 20-second timer will begin. If you don't select \

UIGuide_Online_05_02.ContentEN: When a team member chooses to revive during a co-op commission, other players can assist by approaching them, speeding up the revival process.

UIGuide_Online_06_01.ContentEN: Teams formed prior to starting a public commission will remain intact after the commission ends, while players who joined halfway will leave the team after completion.

UIGuide_OverloadShield.ContentEN: A character's bonus shield gained through certain means will be <H>consumed first</> when taking damage. The cap of Ultra Shield increases as your <H>character level</> rises.

UIGuide_PerfectDodge.ContentEN: When facing strong enemies, <H>dodging</> at the last moment before an attack hit will <H>slow</> nearby enemies for a brief period.

UIGuide_Pet_1.ContentEN: The <H>Geniemons</> system is now available. You can now capture <H>Geniemons</> from various locations across the world. They can enhance the power of Resonance to better help your teammates in battle.

UIGuide_Pet_2.ContentEN: Use high-quality Treats and time your capture attempts wisely to greatly increase your chances of success.

UIGuide_Phantom_1_1.ContentEN: During <H>world exploration</> or a <H>Solo Commission</>, you can summon up to <H>2</> Combat Partners at the same time.

UIGuide_Phantom_1_2.ContentEN: During a <H>2-player Commission</>, each player can only summon <H>1</> Combat Partner.

UIGuide_Phantom_1_3.ContentEN: During a <H>Commission with 3 or more players</>, <H>no Combat Partners can be summoned</>.

UIGuide_Phantom_2_1.ContentEN: While exploring the <H>world</>, you can use <H>[Sigil: Recall]</> to <H>recall</> your Combat Partner(s) at any time.

UIGuide_Phantom_2_2.ContentEN: During <h>Commissions</> or when challenging <H>Nocturnal Echoes</>, you <H>cannot recall</> your Combat Partner(s).

UIGuide_Phantom_3_1.ContentEN: During <H>world exploration</>, if a Combat Partner falls, they can be <H>resummoned</> by the corresponding Sigil.

UIGuide_Phantom_3_2.ContentEN: During <H>Commissions</>, if a Combat Partner falls, approach them and <H>hold</> &Interactive& to <H>rescue</> them.

UIGuide_Phantom_3_2_Phone.ContentEN: During <H>Commissions</>, if a Combat Partner falls, approach them and <H>hold</> the interactive button to <H>rescue</> them.

UIGuide_Phantom_3_3.ContentEN: In <H>Nocturnal Echoes</> stages, fallen Combat Partners <H>cannot be resummoned</> or <H>rescued</>.

UIGuide_Reading.ContentEN: You can find readable items such as books, notes, and letters scattered around the world.

UIGuide_RelayMechanism_1.ContentEN: Attacking a <H>Phoxynamo Wheel</> will toggle its activation status. If the <H>Phoxynamo Wheel</> is <H>blue</>, it is <H>active</>. If it appears <H>orange</>, it is <H>inactive</>.

UIGuide_RelayMechanism_2.ContentEN: Some <H>Phoxynamo Wheels</> will <H>automatically revert</> to their <H>original state</> after a set time following a status change.

UIGuide_Shadow_1.ContentEN: Use <H>Combat Partner Sigil</> to summon allies in battle. Drag Combat Partner Sigils into the Tactical Backpack to enable summoning.

UIGuide_Shadow_2.ContentEN: Hold &OpenBattleWheel& to summon allies, who will fight alongside your current character.

UIGuide_Sp.ContentEN: The primary resource needed for using skills in battle. It <H>recovers</> over time.

UIGuide_SpecialDestructible_1.ContentEN: Some objects can only be destroyed by <H>specific Bonus Effects</> or <H>specific Skill Damage</> that deal specific damage.

UIGuide_SpecialDestructible_2.ContentEN:
For example, <H>Cryolite</> that covers some chests can be shattered with <H>Bonus Effect: Smash, Bonus Effect: Pyro, or skills that deal Pyro Damage</>.\
(The character's and weapon's <H>attributes</> and the <H>probability</> of triggering Bonus Effects can be viewed in Armoury.)

UIGuide_SpecialDestructible_3.ContentEN:
Some objects can only be destroyed by <H>specific Bonus Effects</> or <H>Combat Skills</> that deal specific damage.\
<H>Umbro Vines</> that cover some chests can be shattered with <H>Bonus Effect: Slash, Bonus Effect: Lumino, or combat skills that deal Lumino Damage</>.\
(The character's and weapon's <H>attributes</> and the <H>probability</> of triggering Bonus Effects can be viewed in Armoury.)

UIGuide_SpecialDestructible_4.ContentEN:
Some objects can only be destroyed by <H>specific Bonus Effects</> or <H>Combat Skills</> that deal specific damage.\
<H>Gravel</> that covers some chests can be shattered with <H>Bonus Effect: Smash</>.\
(The character's and weapon's <H>attributes</> and the <H>probability</> of triggering Bonus Effects can be viewed in Armoury.)

UIGuide_SpecialDestructible_5.ContentEN:
Some objects can only be destroyed by <H>specific Bonus Effects</> or <H>Combat Skills</> that deal specific damage.\
<H>Lumino Shield</> that covers some chests can be shattered with <H>Bonus Effect: Spike, Bonus Effect: Umbro, or combat skills that deal Umbro Damage</>.\
(The character's and weapon's <H>attributes</> and the <H>probability</> of triggering Bonus Effects can be viewed in Armoury.)

UIGuide_SwitchMaster_PC.ContentEN: In safe areas, <H>long press</> &Skill3& to switch to the protagonist for exploration and interaction.

UIGuide_SwitchMaster_Phone.ContentEN: In safe areas, <H>long press</> the specified button to switch to the protagonist for exploration and interaction.

UIGuide_TaskAcceptance.ContentEN: While exploring a town, interacting with certain local residents may trigger hidden side quests.

UIGuide_Team_1.ContentEN: You can invite friends to form a team to complete a commission together.

UIGuide_Team_2_PC.ContentEN: The <H>team status</> is displayed at the <H>bottom left</> of the <H>Friends</>, <H>Commissions</>, and <H>Main</> pages.

UIGuide_Team_2_Phone.ContentEN: The <H>team status</> is displayed at the <H>top right</> of the <H>Friends</>, <H>Commissions</>, and <H>Main</> screens.

UIGuide_Temple_1.ContentEN: You can challenge [Avian Spirit Trials] by meditating at the recorded Waypoints.

UIGuide_Temple_2.ContentEN: You will receive star-rated rewards after your first successful completion of the Trials. You can replay these Trials to achieve higher ratings and earn better rewards.

UIGuide_Title_BattleWheel_2.ContentEN: Make the Most of the Tactical Backpack

UIGuide_TrainingGround_1.ContentEN: Sandrealm Meditation lets you revisit and battle past enemies in a controlled environment, helping you familiarise yourself with their moves and hone your combat skills.

UIGuide_TrainingGround_2.ContentEN: Within the <H>Gritty Vortex</> in Sandrealm Meditation, you'll find combat supplies such as <H>Ammo Supply Chests</>, <H>Sal Volatile</>, and <H>Cognizing Sal Volatile</> to facilitate your combat.

UIGuide_TrainingGround_3_PC.ContentEN: Access <H>Armoury</> at the <H>top right</> of the screen to swiftly switch characters.

UIGuide_TrainingGround_3_Phone.ContentEN: Access <H>Armoury</> at the <H>top left</> of the screen to swiftly switch characters.

UIGuide_TrainingGround_4_Phone.ContentEN: Select <H>Exit Sandrealm Meditation</> in <H>Menu</> at the <H>top left</> to leave.

UIGuide_TriggerEffect_1.ContentEN:
When dealing damage with weapons or certain skills, there is a chance to trigger <H>Bonus Effects</> based on the elemental type of the attack. Each element has its own bonus effect(s):\
Hydro: Deals periodic Hydro DMG.\
Pyro: Deals periodic Pyro DMG.\
Electro: Deals periodic Electro DMG.\
Anemo: Deals periodic Anemo DMG.\
Lumino: Deals periodic Lumino DMG and <H>refreshes</> the remaining duration of all bonus effects.\
Umbro: Deals periodic Umbro DMG and <H>reduces</> the target's Stance recovery speed.

UIGuide_TriggerEffect_2.ContentEN:
Slash: Increases damage to the target's <H>Shield</>. \
Spike: Increases damage to the target's <H>HP</>.\
Smash: Weakens the target's <H>Stance</> more effectively.

UIGuide_TurnTable.ContentEN: A common door lock mechanism. Light up all white areas within the allotted time to unlock this type of magic lock.

UIGuide_ValveMechanism.ContentEN: A common door lock mechanism. Continuously moving the pointer to break through the drag ranges within the time limit can unlock this type of magic lock.

UIGuide_WallJump_PC.ContentEN: When near any wall, <H>repeatedly</> press &Jump& to jump up onto the wall.

UIGuide_WallJump_Phone.ContentEN: When near any wall, <H>repeatedly</> tap the button to jump up onto the wall.

UIGuide_content_203001.ContentEN: While exploring the world, you may encounter <H>Geniemons</>. Use <H>Treats</> to capture them. You can draw energy from Geniemons to empower yourself and assist allies in battle through Resonance Support.

UIGuide_content_203501.ContentEN: In towns and other <H>safe areas</>, <H>long press</> &Skill3& to switch to the protagonist for exploration and interaction.

UIGuide_content_203601.ContentEN: You can challenge [Avian Spirit Trials] by meditating at the recorded Waypoints.

UIGuide_content_203602.ContentEN: Receive star-rated rewards after your first successful completion of the Trials. You can replay these trials to achieve higher ratings and earn better rewards.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10001.ContentEN: The protagonist of the well-known fairy tale \

UI_Accessory_Desc_10003.ContentEN: Vivacious, adorable, lively, beautiful... No words in the world do justice to the magical allure of these feline ears.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10004.ContentEN: Filled with the boundless inspiration and fervour of Lunosmith, this portable Cinder always reminds you of the vibrant forge flames fanned by it.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10005.ContentEN: An emblem of elegance, the embodiment of grace — or perhaps, just a butterfly unable to flutter its wings.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10006.ContentEN: Dragons have thousands of admirers in any era. They are powerful, wild and yet distant and hazy because they are seldom seen. It is precisely this hazy concept that builds up a boundless hotspot for people to freely spread their imagination.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10007.ContentEN: Under the eggshell is still eggshell, absolutely not luno, never!

UI_Accessory_Desc_10008.ContentEN: This is how I feel today.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10013.ContentEN: A mask that honours the forebears of Huaxu. Wearing it evokes an epic vision of innumerable warriors arrayed in armour, their faces veiled, sculpting the cosmos for a realm of everlasting peace.

UI_Accessory_Desc_10014.ContentEN: In the past, this mask was used as a medium for divine communication. Today, those who seek the grace of the divine turn their prayers towards the lofty towers of Elysium from afar.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20001.ContentEN: Wisdom precisely encircled in those round frames, greatly magnifying the wearer's aura of sagacity.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20002.ContentEN: Eyes are but obstacles to truly observing and perceiving the world.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20003.ContentEN: A butterfly that waltzes through tempests, providing a silent vigil for those unsettled by the roar of thunder, until the storm quiets and the fear subsides.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20004.ContentEN: According to the lore of certain Charon tribes, this ethereal butterfly emerges each day from the white blossoms of Mother Embla, only to fade into the dusky mists of Father Ask.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20005.ContentEN: A swift solution for sudden discomfort.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20006.ContentEN: Poisonous fog, fire, smoke, sand and dust... This simple structure interprets that sustaining the possibility of survival is never easy.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20007.ContentEN: Yearnings for the sky could not transcend earthly bounds. The outstretched wings speak volumes of the longing for freedom.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20008.ContentEN: This item always keeps the audience wondering whether the next moment will reveal a dove or a rose.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20010.ContentEN: This fake moustache lends its wearer an air of gravitas and wisdom, though it demands occasional adjustments to ensure it stays firmly in place.

UI_Accessory_Desc_20011.ContentEN: Broaden your perspective and see the world unfold before your eyes.

UI_Accessory_Desc_30001.ContentEN: A beacon of light to keep by your side. A constant source of comfort on your journey.

UI_Accessory_Desc_30002.ContentEN: With cirrus rolling the sun and moon, a thousand thoughts scattered in; with a gourd contains a universe, ten thousand rhymes hidden in.

UI_Accessory_Desc_30003.ContentEN: Life is like a lonely cruise through the boundless darkness of the night. The river weeps, with thorny thickets lining its sorrowful shores.

UI_Accessory_Desc_40001.ContentEN: The most subtle changes in humidity can not escape the perception of a phoxfox tail. Sophisticated travelers often observe whether a phoxfox in a rainy night would solo dance or not, thus to determine when the clouds will be dispersed, and when the moonlight will return.

UI_Accessory_Desc_40002.ContentEN: The blade is protective but also hurtful, who carries the dignity and faith of the successive masters of itself. Over the years, it has passed on exhortations from ancient times to the present world.

UI_Accessory_Desc_90001.ContentEN: Berenica's favorite cloak. When the sea breeze blows, it rattles like a seabird spreading its feathers in silence.

UI_Accessory_Desc_90002.ContentEN: Although the tulle material was not effective in protecting against the wind, Rebecca simply loved the lightness of being wrapped in a gauzy drapery.

UI_Achievement_Des_100101.ContentEN: Make a total of <highlight>#1</> Chrono Retraces

UI_Achievement_Des_10051701.ContentEN: Clear any Avian Spirit Trial <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_10051702.ContentEN: Clear any Avian Spirit Trial with a 3★ rating <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_10104.ContentEN: Collect all <highlight>Scattered Diaries</> in Purgatorio Island - Ruins

UI_Achievement_Des_1021.ContentEN: Restore <H>#1</> points of HP in one action

UI_Achievement_Des_1022.ContentEN: Deal <H>#1</> points of damage in one action with any weapon

UI_Achievement_Des_1023.ContentEN: Deal <H>#1</> points of damage in one action with any skill

UI_Achievement_Des_14000.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得20级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_14001.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得30级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_14002.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得40级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_14003.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得50级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_14004.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得60级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_14005.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得70级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_14006.TextMapContent: 120秒内取得80级难度“驱离”委托的胜利

UI_Achievement_Des_200101.ContentEN: Successfully pass any Impression Check <highlight>#1</> times (excluding Impression Store checks)

UI_Achievement_Des_2002.ContentEN: Defeat <highlight>#1</> enemies from the Hyperborean Legion

UI_Achievement_Des_2003.ContentEN: Defeat <highlight>#1</> enemies from the Elysian Church

UI_Achievement_Des_2011.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with a melee weapon <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_2012.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with a ranged weapon <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_2013.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with a Plunging Attack <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_2014.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with a Charged Attack <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_2015.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with a Sliding Attack <highlight>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_2016.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with any Beam attack <H>#1</> times

UI_Achievement_Des_2017.ContentEN: Finish off any enemy with any explosive projectiles <H>#1</> times

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010101.ContentEN:
For as long as you can remember, Berenica has always been by your side. \
You may have spent more time with her than with anyone else in the world, yet there are still parts of her that remain a mystery to you — just as there are aspects of yourself that you don't fully understand.\
Who are you? Who is she? Where did you come from, and how did you meet? Whenever you pose these questions, Berenica hesitates, her words faltering, eventually retreating into prolonged silence. Over time, you stopped asking.\
There's much you don't know, but of one thing you're certain—\
You can always trust her, no matter what.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010102.ContentEN:
Berenica is unflinchingly straightforward and sincere. Unlike most, she never lies and often struggles with the subtleties of unspoken words. In a harsh world where people often disguise their true intentions with deceit and pleasantries, Berenica's candid remarks cut through these facades, always resulting in uncomfortable silences. As a child, her blunt honesty was often dismissed as mere youthful innocence. However, as she grew older, this trait increasingly alienated her from others in the village.\
Consequently, from a young age, you mastered the art of reading people and skillfully adapting your words to deal with different individuals. For the things she disliked or struggled with, you stepped in. You decided that you would be her mask and her voice.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010103.ContentEN:
In stark contrast to her meticulous protection of you, Berenica is ruthlessly hard on herself. Whenever she's attacked by wild beasts or Filthoids, she fights back with a self-destructive fervour, sparing no part of herself from exposure to danger as she charges forward with resolute determination. The outcome is invariably the same: her dark blade strikes true, killing the creature with a single blow. Naturally, the cost is often severe injuries to herself.\
Each time this happens, as you bandage her wounds, you plead with her not to be so reckless. Yet, she stubbornly insists it's the most efficient way she knows how to fight. \

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010104.ContentEN: Many people, even in their twilight years, love to reminisce about their earliest days, which they fondly refer to as their \

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010105.ContentEN:
Ever since arriving in the Empire, you've exhausted every possible means — both legitimate and otherwise — to find any trace of Berenica, but to no avail. Occasionally, from The Asphodel, you'd receive commissions that involved anonymous tips directing you to liberate a mysterious individual from an Imperial prison. Each time, you harboured a quiet hope of hearing that familiar voice from behind one of the cell doors you breached... Yet it never happened. Not even once.\
Nevertheless, whenever you wield that pristine white sword, it feels as though she's still by your side. You hold onto the belief that you will reunite one day — for you will never break your promise, and neither will Berenica.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010201.ContentEN:
People often nurture idyllic fantasies about isolated places, yet not all secluded spots are sanctuaries of peace. Purgatorio Island, adrift in the desolate sea, is far from a paradise. On this beautiful little island, the malice that festers in hardship and isolation is all too familiar. The strong prey on the weak, and the weak, in turn, target those even weaker — it's a natural law that the villagers of Purgatorio Island know well and follow to the letter.\
However, this brutal \

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010202.ContentEN:
It was a midsummer morning, an otherwise unremarkable day on Purgatorio Island. The fishermen rose early, collecting freshly mended nets and sails from their wives before heading to the small pier where their boats awaited. They were set to face the briny breeze at sea for days, hoping to return laden with fish to sustain their families in the coming weeks.\
Amid the hustle of farewells at the dock, no one noticed a young girl, Abigail, sneaking away in the opposite direction, up the muddy mountain path. As she ran, the clamour of the village receded, and the wind whistling through charred branches filled the air with mournful sounds. Abigail reassured herself it wasn't the Filthoids, pressing a hand to her chest to steady her racing heart before keeping on.\
For the villagers, the mountains were not a place to visit these days. Just two days ago, they had heard a deafening roar from the abandoned temple in the mountains, followed by a fire that was fortunately doused by a sudden downpour. Some claimed it was the goddess punishing them for their irreverence; others whispered it was the work of the woman who lived in the mountains, or that the Filthoids had been roused. Despite the varied theories, everyone agreed on one thing: stay away from the mountain, at least for now.\
But Abigail had no choice. Her mother's gout had worsened, and Abigail had heard her mother's pained groans echoing through the night. She knew of a medicinal herb near the temple that might offer relief. Despite the risks, she resolved to make the journey.\
Preoccupied with her destination, she failed to notice what lay hidden in the undergrowth and was brought down by something soft underfoot. Rubbing her bruised knee, she glanced at the thicket, and the sight made her gasp and stumble back in terror.\
\

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010203.ContentEN:
On the first evening, the two children lay huddled in the grass, their faint, laboured breaths were the only sign of life. Abigail had seen similar scenes during childhood hunting trips with her father, where she encountered orphaned young animals helplessly huddled in thickets without their mothers.\
Abigail placed a jug of fresh water beside the older girl, alongside some dried fish and stale bread arranged on a scrap of cloth — it was the best she could do. When she had pleaded with the villagers to help save the children, she was met with stark indifference. While the kinder villagers explained that the community was too poor to take on the burden of two more mouths to feed, those less kind chastised her for even venturing up the mountain. Some recognised the horns on the children's heads — a feature unwelcome back in their homeland of Hyperborea. Even her usually compassionate mother frowned, saying their own family was barely getting by and couldn't afford additional burdens.\
\

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010204.ContentEN: During her time in the Legion, Berenica was often referred to as the \

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010301.ContentEN:
Berenica has a soft spot for anything fluffy and cuddly, like the silky fur of small animals.\
Unfortunately, the feeling isn't mutual. Whenever they lock eyes with her, even the gentlest cats suddenly arch their backs and bolt away like startled, furry projectiles.\
This leaves Berenica frustrated, with no choice but to wrap an arm around your head and playfully ruffle your soft hair until it's a tousled mess.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010302.ContentEN:
Berenica's sleep has always been shallow, a consequence of old, ingrained habits. Yet, occasionally, she's haunted by unsettling dreams — sometimes she finds herself back in past confinements, sometimes lost in a desolate forest, or adrift alone on an endless sea. More often, she finds herself trapped in a vast glass chamber, where ominous waters rise from every direction, engulfing her limbs, her chest, her ears, and her eyes, submerging her every sense in a suffocating dread.\
These dreams often jolt her awake in a cold sweat, overwhelmed by stark fear and solitude. Her panic only subsides when she detects the steady rhythm of your breathing beside her, a gentle reminder that she is not alone.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010303.ContentEN: Berenica never cries. Regardless of the intensity of her pain or the depth of her despair, she merely clenches her teeth and endures without shedding a single tear. For a child, crying serves as an expression of discomfort and a plea for solace. However, for a weapon, tears are a sign of weakness, merely moisture that would rust the steel. Long before she found a family who truly cared for her, Berenica had already lost the ability to cry.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010304.ContentEN: Berenica has always been vaguely aware of the extraordinary powers within her. In tales told by minstrels and bards, characters endowed with significant strength usually bear grand destinies — like saving the world or ascending to a throne. But Berenica harbours no interest in such fates. Should she ever come to harness her powers fully, she intends to use them solely to safeguard her loved ones. While others might consider it a waste, for Berenica, protecting her family is what matters most.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010305.ContentEN: Berenica has always seen protecting you as her paramount mission, viewing you as a younger, less robust child who could not possibly manage without her. Yet, that day on the cliff, when she saw you make that signal for the first time, she suddenly realised it was she who could not live without you.

UI_CHAR_DATA_TEXT_11010405.ContentEN:
Perhaps it was a stroke of luck that Berenica's rigorous childhood training made adapting to a nomadic life almost effortless. In the early days after escaping the Legion, she followed the woman who had rescued her, enduring nights in damp, dark caves, braving tempests on churning seas, and evading Imperial pursuers along precipitous cliffs. No matter how harsh or dangerous the circumstances, she never once complained or paused for rest.\
Yet, more difficult than enduring pain was the challenge of forgetting it.\
Even after escaping that prison and successfully evading endless pursuit, the shadows of her past lingered. Even after settling down on Purgatorio Island, remnants of her old life persistently haunted her: she would wake up before dawn, sitting blankly for long moments before realising there was no longer a need for early morning training.
